translation.en: How corpse of missing Civil Defence officer was discovered in a shallow grave
translation.pcm: How dem take see dedi bodi of pesin wey be civil defence officer for grave wey no deep.

translation.en: The remains of a female officer of the Nigerian Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC) who went missing 18 months ago has been discovered in a shallow grave in Obi Local Government Area of Benue State.
translation.pcm: di dead bodi of woman officer wey dey work for Nigeria  Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC) wey dem don dey find for 18 month, na im dem don see for grave wey no deep inside Obi Local Goment area for inside Benue state.

translation.en: Until she went missing, the deceased, Josephine Cynthia Inalegwu Onche, was serving at an NSCDC post in the Otukpo area of the state.
translation.pcm: until by di time wey dem no see am again, Josephine Cynthia Inalegwu Onche, dey work for NSCDC office wey dey for Otukpo.

translation.en: Cynthia, an Idoma native of Otukpo origin, suddenly went missing while her wedding plans were underway.
translation.pcm: Cynthia na Idoma, and na Otukpo she for come, just miss wen dem be dey plan her marriage.

translation.en: Some of her colleagues who didn't want their names on print, narrated that the family of the deceased had reported her disappearance few days to her wedding in December 2019.
translation.pcm: some of her work pipo wey no want make we write dem name tok say na her family pipo kom report say dem no fit find am again when her marriage remain small days.

translation.en: She was said to have gone to the market to buy some items in preparation for her wedding but never made it back home.
translation.pcm: Wetin dem tok be say she be go market go buy things as she dey prepare for her marriage, but she no return home since.

translation.en: One of the deceased colleagues said several efforts to locate her did not yield results until a commercial motorcyclist disclosed where she was buried.
translation.pcm: one of di office pipo of di pesin wey die tok say as dem try to find am reach, dem no see am until one okada man kom show dem wia dem burry am.

translation.en: The cyclist was said to have told the family of the deceased that their daughter was allegedly killed and buried by her husband-to-be for ritual purposes.
translation.pcm: Di okadaman na im tell di family pipo say na di oga wey wan marry dem pikin kill am, use am do rotual for money.

translation.en: Thereafter, he (cyclist) had led the family and security operatives to arrest the groom who in turn led the police to Ogun State where they arrested the native doctor alleged to have performed the ritual at Obi LGA before his relocation to a south west state.
translation.pcm: Afta na im di okadaman carry di family pipo and security dem go arrest di man, di man kom carry dem go the baba wey do the ritual for Obi local goment, before im waka enter South-West state.

translation.en: While the suspected killer groom and the native doctor had been allegedly held by the police in Otukpo, the family of the late security personnel exhumed her remains and organised a burial on Tuesday, June 1st, 2021.
translation.pcm: wen police don catch di husband and im herbalist for Otukpo, di family pipo of di pesin wey die don go komot di bodi for wia dem bury am, kom organise burial for am on to June 1, 2021.

translation.en: Spokesperson of the Benue Police command, DSP Catherine Anene, did not answer calls or react to messages sent to her over the development.
translation.pcm: Call, or answer message wey dem sent give am on top di thing wey apun. DSP Catherine Anene, wey be toktok pesin for Benue police dem no gree carry.

translation.en: Contacted, the State Command Public Relations Officer of NSCDC, ASC Ejelikwu Michael, declined comments, promising that he would speak on the issue at a later date.
translation.pcm: Di toktok persin for NSCDC for di state, Asc Ejelikwu Micheal no gree tok anytin when we meet am, he tok sya he go tok when time reach.

translation.en: But an insider said the news of Cynthia's corpse being found has thrown the command into mourning again.
translation.pcm: But persin wey be insider tok say di news of di dedibodi wey dem find don put sadness for di security pipo mind again.

translation.en: Constitution review: Shariah was in south west before Christianity MURIC
translation.pcm: For di review wey wan do for constitution: MURIC tok say sharia don dey for SouthWest  before Christianity enter.

translation.en: The Muslim Rights Concern (MURIC) has asked the Pentecostal Fellowship of Nigeria (PFN) to mind its business and stop opposing the Muslims right to operate Shariah.
translation.pcm: Di joinbodi wey be Muslim Right Concern don tell di Penticostal Fellowship of Nigeria (PFN) say make dem stop to dey oppose muslim, make dem mind dem business.

translation.en: MURIC Director, Prof. Ishaq Akintola, said this in a statement on Sunday.
translation.pcm: Di director of MURIC, Professor Ishaq Akintola na im tok  am on Sunday.

translation.en: This followed a warning the PFN  issued against the move by any group to introduce Sharia law to the South-West through the ongoing constitutional review being carried out by the Senate.
translation.pcm: He tok dis one afa di warnin wey  PFN give say make any group no use di review of constitution wey senate dey do carry shariah law enter south-west.

translation.en: PFN and other Christian groups are fully aware that Shariah was in the South West decades before the arrival of Christianity in 1842.
translation.pcm: PFN and oda Christian joinbodi know say shariah be dey for south-west before christianity enter for 1842.

translation.en: Shariah was practiced in Ede under Oba Abibu Olagunju (Habeeb, a Muslim name) and
translation.pcm: Dem be dey practice shariah for Ede, during by di time of oba Abeeb Olagunju (Abbeb na muslim name) and say

translation.en: the Ede Shariah Court operated up till 1913 at Agbeni area of the town.
translation.pcm: Di shariah court for Ede still dey work enter 1913, for Agbeni inside di town.

translation.en: It was moved to Agbongbon area in 1914.
translation.pcm: Dem carry am go Agbongbon for 1914.

translation.en: Shariah was applied in Iwo under Oba Momodu Lamuye (Muhammad Lamuye) who died in 1906.
translation.pcm: Dem use shariah for Iwo durin by Di time of Oba Momodu Lamuye (Muhammad Lamuye), wey die for 1906.

translation.en: Even the seventh Akirun of Ikirun, Oba Aliyu Oyewole (died 1912), instituted Shariah in Ikirun in 1910.
translation.pcm: Even sef, di nomba svevn Akirun of Ikirun, wey be oba Aliyu Oyewole (wey die for 1912) carry shariah enter Ikirun for 1910.

translation.en: These are just examples of the existence and spread of Shariah in Yorubaland and the Christian leaders are not oblivious of the fact that it was the British Christian colonialists who stopped Shariah in Yorubaland and imposed Christian common law, Akintola said.
translation.pcm: All dis na example say shariah don dey, and e don dey spread for Yorubaland, and to tok say di christian people sef sabi say na christian people stop shariah for Yorubaland, wey dem comeimpose christian common law. As Akintola tok am.

translation.en: He added that the PFN and other Christians are equally aware of the rising tide of Islamic awareness in the same South West and that they were only afraid that the sleeping giant is waking up to take back what belongs to it.
translation.pcm: He tok say PFN and some oda christian joinbodi sef sabi say islamic waka don dey grow for south west, and na fear dey catch dem say di giant wey dey sleep don wake to kom carry wetin belong to am.

translation.en: He said, Our Christian neighbours know well that Shariah is the Allah-given fundamental human right of Muslims.
translation.pcm: He tok say di christian dem know say shariah na di right wey Allah don carry dash Muslims.

translation.en: But they are determined to deprive us of it using unorthodox methods.
translation.pcm: But dem don determin say dem no go allow Muslims use am, say na di new way dem go dey use.

translation.en: They believe they are at war with Muslims and to them, everything is fair in war.
translation.pcm: Dem get am for mind say na war dem dey follow muslim people fight, and say nothingg bad for war.

translation.en: They are using both fair and foul means to achieve their objective.
translation.pcm: Dem dey use both good and bad ways to take do wetin dey dem mind.

translation.en: We call on Nigerians to understand the siege mentality of our Christian neighbours.
translation.pcm: Dem don dey call Naija pipo say make dem follow understand di mentality of di Christian pipo wey dey here.

translation.en: Like all aggressors, they believe that attack is the best form of defence.
translation.pcm: As e dey be for evribodi wey dey quick vex, dem belif say na to dey attack pipo, na di only way wey dem fit take defend be dat.

translation.en: As the benefactors and inheritors of colonial rampage that lasted more than a century, they are determined to keep all the loot which their principal bequeathed to them.
translation.pcm: As per say na dem gain from di colonial jaguda wey reach a century that time,  dem wan kip all di things wey dem colonial oga fit carry give dem.

translation.en: They are determined to keep the Muslims in a concentration camp into which the colonial masters drove them.
translation.pcm: dem don get am for mind say dem go put muslim pipo inside di place wey colonial dem dem be chase dem put.

translation.en: The Constitution Review Panel asked Nigerians to forward their views regarding what they want in the constitution.
translation.pcm: Di joinbodi wey dey review constitution don tok say make Nigeria pipo write wetin dem want for inside constitution kom.

translation.en: Each group is supposed to submit its needs.
translation.pcm: Each group suppose bring di things wey dem need kom.

translation.en: But instead of telling the panel what the Christians want, PFN has gone ahead to say what they do not want Muslims to ask for.
translation.pcm: Instead make PFN tell di joinbodi wetin  di christians dem want, na wetin dem think say make di christians no ask dem dey tok.

translation.en: It is an attempt to gag Muslims in the South West and it will not work.
translation.pcm: Dem wanuse am block muslim pipo wey dey for south, but e no go work.

translation.en: He said that the claim of religious tolerance in the South-West is a sham and a mantra designed to keep Yoruba Muslims in perpetual slavery.
translation.pcm: E tok say as dem dey tok say religious tolerance dey for south, say na lie, and dem dey tok am to put Yoruba pipo wey be muslim for inside slavery.

translation.en: Muslims in the region are waking up and asking for freedom.
translation.pcm: Muslim pipo wey dey for di region don dey open eye, kom dye ask for freedom.

translation.en: We demand a halt to the forceful use of Christian school uniform, Christian education, Christian law.
translation.pcm: we deamnd say make dem stop as dem dey force us to dey wear christian school uniform, to dey go christian school, to dey use christian law.

translation.en: We demand civil Shariah, not criminal Shariah that involves the cutting of hands but civil Shariah to regulate Muslim marriages, inheritance, family affairs.
translation.pcm: we want shariah wey no dey cut pipo hand, but di shariah wey go dey regulate muslim marriage dem, inherritance and family affair dem.

translation.en: It has nothing to do with Christians.
translation.pcm: Di thing no concern christians at all.

translation.en: We will use every peaceful and constitutional means available to attain this objective,he added.
translation.pcm: We go use all di way wey no go kos fight, wey follow law, to do di thing. As e take tok am.

translation.en: Stakeholders in Edo South affirm Obaseki as party leader
translation.pcm: stakeholder dem for Edo don tok say Obaseki na parti leader.

translation.en: Following the internal crisis rocking the Edo State chapter of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) over who controls the party structure, members of the Edo South Senatorial district of the party Sunday passed a vote of confidence on the state Governor, Godwin Obaseki and his Deputy, Philip Shaibu.
translation.pcm: As di People's Democratic Party for Edo state get crisis of who go dey control di parti, member or Edo South of the parti, dem don tok say na di state govnro, Godwin Obaseki and im deputy, Philip Shaibu dey good.

translation.en: Edo South PDP in a communique issued at the end of its stakeholders meeting in Benin City, at the weekend, also affirmed Governor Obaseki as the leader of the party in the state.
translation.pcm: Edo South PDP for iside one communique wey dem issue at di end of di stakeholder meetin for weekend inside Benin city, tok say Godwin Obaseki na leader of di parti for inside di state.

translation.en: The communiqu read by its Secretary, Wilson Evbuomwan, also said the stakeholders supported harmonisation and integration of new entrants into the executive committee of the party for effective development of the state.
translation.pcm: For di communiques wey di secretary, Wilson Evbuonwam read, he tok say dem support di harmonization and integration of new pipo into di executive committee of di parti, say make di state for develop welwel.

translation.en: Police nab suspected kidnappers, recover guns in Abuja
translation.pcm: police don catch persin wey dem thingk say na kidnapper for Abuja, dem even kolekt guns.

translation.en: The FCT Police Command has arrested eight suspected kidnappers along Shenegu-Tunga Maje, Gwagwalada, Kabusa village and Durumi axis of Abuja.
translation.pcm: Di Police komand wey dey for FCT don arrest eight suspected kidnappers for Shenegu-Tunga Maje, Gwagwalada, Kabusa village and Durumi axis of Abuja.

translation.en: Spokesperson of the command, ASP Maryam Yusuf, who disclosed this in a statement in Abuja, yesterday, gave the names of the  suspects as Yakubu Ahmadu, Ibrahim Mallam Musa, and Bello Haruna.
translation.pcm: Di toktok persin for di comand, dat ona na ASP Maryam Yusuf, wey tok am one siddon tok for inside Abuja, tok say di name of di suspect na Yakubu Ahmadu, Ibrahim Mallam Musa, and Bello Haruna.

translation.en: She said the suspects were  members of a syndicate also linked to the kidnap attempt on the Vice President of the Nigerian Bar Association (NBA)
translation.pcm: She tok say di suspect dem be  member of a syndicate wey dem  also link join the kidnap attempt on di Vice President of di Nigerian Bar Association (NBA)

translation.en: Gwagwalada branch, Barrister David Aigbefoh.
translation.pcm: Gwagwalada branch, Barrister David Aigbefoh.

translation.en: She said the suspects were arrested during a coordinated intelligence operation by police operatives from the command anti-kidnapping squad at Shenegu mountain on the border of the FCT and Niger State.
translation.pcm: She tok say dem be arrest di suspect during one coordinated intelligence operation wey police pipo from di command anti-kidnapping squad for Shenegu mountain on di border of di FCT and Niger State.

translation.en: She said the suspects have provided useful information on the activities of their syndicate.
translation.pcm: She tok say di  suspect dem don give beta informate on di things wey dem do for dem group..

translation.en: Yusuf  further disclosed that one Nwite Jideofor was arrested for staging his own kidnap along Durumi axis, saying the suspect confessed to conniving with his abductors to defraud his sister of the sum of N5 million which he demanded as ransom.
translation.pcm: Yusuf later tok say dem arrest one Nwite Jideofor wey stage im kidnap from Durumi area, sey di suspect confess say im conive with pipo wey come kidnap am to collekt reach 5 million from im sister as ransom.

translation.en: She said exhibits recovered from all the suspects included three Dane guns, seven cutlasses, one black painted Honda Accord, four mobile phones and other items, adding that effort was on to arrest other members of the syndicates now at large.
translation.pcm: she tok some of di exhibit wey dem kolekt from di suspect na three dane guns, seven cutlas, one Honda Accord wey dem paint bleck, four mobile fone and oda item dem. She add am say dem don dey work on top how dem go arrest other member of di group wey don run.

translation.en: She said all the suspects would be arraigned in court upon conclusion of investigation, while she urged residents of the FCT, particularly parents and guardians to prevail upon their wards to desist from engaging in any form of criminality.
translation.pcm: she tok say dem go carry all di suspect go court when dem don investigate welwel, as she dey warn pipo wey dey stay for FCT, especially parent and guardian say make dem draw ear fro dem children not do crime.

translation.en: Suarez strikes as Atletico win La Liga title
translation.pcm: Suarez strike, Atletico sef kom  win La Liga title

translation.en: Luis Suarez's goal has secured a 2-1 victory for Atletico Madrid over Real Valladolid on Saturday that clinched his team another remarkable La Liga title.
translation.pcm: Di goal wey Luiz Suarez score don make Athletico Mardrid beat Real Valladolid 2-1 on Saturday, na im make di team get anoda remarkable La Liga victory.

translation.en: Suarez began the season crying after being forced out of Barcelona but ended it with his 21st goal of the season earning Atletico a first league triumph since 2014, this one at the expense of Real Madrid.
translation.pcm: Suarez be dey crying for di begiing of di season seek of say Barcelona force am komot, but as di season go end, na im 21st goal for di season make Athleticoto win first league since 2014, dis one wey dem win ahead of Real Madrid

translation.en: Atletico knew victory would guarantee them the title regardless of what Real Madrid did at home to Villarreal
translation.pcm: Athletico know say if dem, dem go win di trophy, e no matter wetin Madrid do for Villareal for dem home.

translation.en: but it was never comfortable, with Valladolid taking a shock early lead.
translation.pcm: But no be say e dey comfortable, as Valladolid take early lead.

translation.en: Real Madrid were behind too for most of the afternoon but Karim Benzema equalised in the 87th minute and Luka Modric even scored a late winner for 2-1 at Valdebebas, leaving Atletico hanging on at the end, as they were suddenly one goal away from squandering it all.
translation.pcm: Real Madrid sef be dey behind fr di game, before Karim Benzema kom equalize for 87 minute, and Luka Modric kom score late winner for 2-1 at Valdebebas, na dat one hang Athletico for a long time, as e remain small make dem scatter di thing with just one goal.

translation.en: When the final whistle blew, the players ran onto the pitch, Suarez underneath a pile of red and white shirts, with Europe's most nerve-wracking and unpredictable title race finally complete.
translation.pcm: when dem blow final whistle, players dem run enter field, red and white shirt cover Suarez, seek of say di title race wey tight pass, wey even dey unpredictable don end.

translation.en: Suarez Zone
translation.pcm: Suarez Zone

translation.en: Just over a week ago
translation.pcm: E just pass one week small

translation.en: , coach Diego Simeone said this was the Suarez Zone
translation.pcm: coach Diego Simone tok say na di Suarez zone be dis

translation.en: and so it proved, the Uruguayan scoring the winner against Osasuna last week to keep the title in Atletico's hands and then again on the last day to put their name on the trophy.
translation.pcm: and na so e take prove am, as na di Uruguayan score di wey kip title for Athletico hand last week, na im kom score on di last day again make dem for write dem name for trophy.

translation.en: This is only the second time in 17 years that a team other than Barcelona or Real Madrid have won the title, with Atleti claiming the other one under Simeone in 2014.
translation.pcm: dis na di second time in 17 years wey anoda team apart from Barcelona or Real Madrid don win di league, na Athleti still win di oda one under Simeone for 2014.

translation.en: Atletico went into the game having been top since December and on the back of beating Osasuna with two goals in the last eight minutes, a victory that was so dramatic it felt like it would prove decisive.
translation.pcm: Athletico start di game, say na dem dey top table since December, and as dem take score two goals for inside di last eight minutes to beat Osasuna,

translation.en: But Atletico have done nothing the easy way this season, with their 10-point lead in February cut to two in May and their position at the top of the table relying on numerous slip-ups from both Real Madrid and Barcelona.
translation.pcm: But di thhing no easy for Athletico dis season, as dem get 10 point lead for February, and di point reduce to 2 for May, and dem position as nomba one for table dey rely on top make Real Madrid and Barcelona slip.

translation.en: So it was apt that faced with beating Real Valladolid, who were 19th on the table, they still had to scrape over the line.
translation.pcm: So e no surprise pesin say as dem wan face Valladolid wey dey 19 for table, na still patch patch dem do.

translation.en: Several hundred Atletico fans gathered in Valladolid's Plaza Mayor in the hours before kick-off to sing songs and a similar number made it outside the stadium, where they were cordoned off in a cess-pit of nerves and anticipation.
translation.pcm: Plenty Athletico fan dem don gather for Valladolid Plaza Mayor to dey sing song, and plenty fan dem also reach outside of di stadium, wia dem komot dem make e for no kos wahala.

translation.en: Gulak's assassination sparks outrage
translation.pcm: Di kilin wey dem kil Gulak don kos make pipo dey shout.

translation.en: There was outrage and mourning Sunday over the assassination of Barr.
translation.pcm: people dey shout and mourn on sunday as dem take kill barr.

translation.en: Ahmed Gulak, a former political adviser to President Goodluck Jonathan, by gunmen in Imo State.
translation.pcm: Ahmed Gullak, wey be before before adviser to former presido Goodluck Jonathan on top  politiks matter, by pipo wey carry gun.

translation.en: Gulak was shot dead by assailants who trailed him to Obiangwu village as he made way to Sam Mbakwe Airport, in Owerri, the Imo State Capital, on his way to Abuja.
translation.pcm: Na pipo wey dey follow Gulak shoot am for Obiangwu village as e dey try enter Sam Mbakwe airport for Owerri, wey be capital of Imo state, say e wan enter Abuja.

translation.en: Funeral prayers for the Adamawa-born politician were conducted yesterday evening at the National Mosque, Abuja, after which his remains were interred at the Gudu Cemetry at around 8 pm.
translation.pcm: Na yesterday evening dem do funeral paryer for di politician wey from Adamawa kom inside national mosque for Abuja, na afta dat one dem burry im bodi for inside Gudu cemetary around 8pm

translation.en: Police in Imo last night said they had tracked down suspected killers of the of the All Progressives Congress (APC) chieftain, and killed at least six of them, after a fierce encounter.
translation.pcm: Police pipo for inside Imo state tok say dem don kill at least six of di pipo wey kill di All Progressives Congress (APC) oga, afta dem follow dem fight.

translation.en: A statement signed by the Police Public Relations Officer, SP Bala Elkana, said that On 30th May, 2021 following a distress received by the Command on the gruesome murder of Ahmed Gulak, Police Special Forces made up of Intelligence Response Team (IRT), Police Mobile Force (PMF) and Tactical Units from the command were deployed to the scene at Obiangwu Junction at Ngorokpala LGA of Imo state.
translation.pcm: One statement wey Police Public Relation Officer, SP Bala Elkana, tok say on 30 may, 2021, as police pipo receive call say jaguda pipo don kill Ahmed Gulak, special force for police pipo, wey include Intellingence Response Team (IRT), Police Mobile Force (PMF), and tactical unit wey from di command kom, na im dem send go di place for Obiagwu junction, for Ngorokpala LGA of Imo state.

translation.en: The teams were given a clear instruction to identify and apprehend the perpetrators of the act with a view of bringing them to justice.
translation.pcm: DI instruction wey dem give di team be say make dem catch di pipo wey do di thing, make dem fit face justice.

translation.en: Vehicles belonging to the suspected killers of Ahmed Gulak intercepted by Police in Imo yesterday
translation.pcm: Di mot wey dem thingk say na pipo wey kill Gulak get am, na im Imo police pipo don stop since yesterday.

translation.en: Eyewitnesses account, especially the account given by the Driver of the vehicle that was conveying Ahmed Gulak to the Airport before the attack, gave a vivid description of the assailants and the vehicles they used in carrying out the attack.
translation.pcm: wetin pipo wey dey dere tok, especially di driver of di moto wey Gulak dey inside, wey dey carry am go airport, don describe di jaguda pipo, and di kin moto wey dem use carry out di jaguda waka.

translation.en: The assailants were said to have used a Toyota Camry 2005 model with silver color; Toyota Sienna 1998 Model with golden color;
translation.pcm: Dem tok say na Toyota Camry wey be 2005 model, wey be silver color di jaguda pipo use, with sienna wey be 1998 medel and  golden color.

translation.en: Toyota Hilux with white color; and a Lexus RX 330 with golden Color.
translation.pcm: Toyota Hilux wey dem paint white, and one Lexus 330, wey dem paint gold.

translation.en: (Registration numbers are withheld for security reasons).
translation.pcm: (Dem no put registration number, because of security matter)

translation.en: Having established the identity of the assailants and the description of the vehicles used in carrying out the attack, the teams further got details of the direction the hoodlums have taken.
translation.pcm: As dem don sabi di kind pipo wey di killer be, and di kind motor wey dem carry out di attack, dem later tell dem di way wey di killer pipo follow komot.

translation.en: With further leads, the team was able to establish the location of suspects.
translation.pcm: with some kind lead, di team kom later establish wia di killer pipo dey.

translation.en: The suspects were rounded up at Afor Enyiogugu junction in Aboh-Mbaise Local Government Area.
translation.pcm: Na for Afor Enyiogugu dem for catch di suspect dem, inside Anoh-Mbaise local goment area.

translation.en: The hoodlums where met distributing onions to locals from a trailer they confiscated.
translation.pcm: na as di jaguda pipo dey dustribute onion wey dey inside trailer wey dem confisticate dem catch dem.

translation.en: The trailer was loaded with Onions from the Northern region of Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Na onions full inside di trailer wey from Northern Naija kom.

translation.en: On sighting the Police, the hoodlums providing security coverage to those sharing the onions opened fire on the Police teams.
translation.pcm: as dem see di police pipo, di jaguda pipo wey dey protect dem fellow jaguda begin shoot gun to polic pipo,

translation.en: The Gallant and battle ready
translation.pcm: Di gallant and one wey don ready for battle

translation.en: Police Officers swiftly returned the fire.
translation.pcm: police officer sef return with gun shoot too.

translation.en: The six hoodlums who carried out the killings and four other members of their gang were fatally injured.
translation.pcm: Di six jaguda pipo wey follow do di killin, and four other member of di group get serious injury.

translation.en: Three out of the four vehicles used in attacking Gulak were recovered.
translation.pcm: dem don kolekt three out of di four moto wey dem take attack Gulak.

translation.en: Three AK 47 Rifles, one Pistol, five AK 47 magazines with ninety two rounds of live ammunition and criminal charms were recovered.
translation.pcm: Three Ak47 riffle, one pistol, five AK47 magazine wey get 92 round of live amunation, and criminal charm na im dem kolekt from dem.

translation.en: The assailants were identified as members of the proscribed IPOB and ESN.
translation.pcm: Dem identify di jaguda pipo as member of IPOB and ESN wey dem don ban.

translation.en: The driver who drove late Ahmed Gulak and a co- victim who survived have all identified the dead body of the IPOB/ESN members positively as their attackers and also identified the three vehicles recovered as those used by the attackers.
translation.pcm: Di driver wey drive late Ahmed Gulak, and di victim wey survive don identify di dedi bodi of di IPOB/ESN member as say na dem attack dem, and di motor wey dem kolekt as di same motor wey dem use.

translation.en: During the encounter, two of the police armored personnel carriers (APC) were riddled with bullets but survived the gun battle.
translation.pcm: During di face to face with di jaguda pipo, two armored personel carriers wey belong to police pipo na im dem take gun scater, but dem no spoil finish.

translation.en: A video clip on the aftermath of the attack shows Gulak in a pair of Jean trousers and a blue T-shirt lying in a pool of his own blood, besides the abandoned car.
translation.pcm: and Di video wey dem make afta di afta di attack show say Gulak wear jean trouser, and a blue shirt as im dey sleep inside im own blood, near di car wey dem abandon.

translation.en: Gulak was the chairman of the controversial Imo All Progressives Congress (APC) governorship primary election that produced Hope Uzodinma as the party's flagbearer.
translation.pcm: Na Gulak be di chairman of di Imo All Progressives Congress (APC) governorship primary election wey carry Hope Uzodinma enter as persin wey go represent di parti.

translation.en: He was also said to have remained close to the governor visiting the state frequently.
translation.pcm: Dem even tok say e close to di governor, e dey visit di state welwel.

translation.en: Why he was in Owerri
translation.pcm: Why im dey for Owerri

translation.en: Though Gulak is said to be a regular visitor to Owerri since the ascension of Uzodinma, his last trip was however to attend the public hearing of the constitution review committee held in the city.
translation.pcm: Though dem tok say Gulak dey visit Owerri welwel since Uzodinma don enter sit, na to attend di public hearing of review of constitution wey dem do for di city carry am go di last time.

translation.en: After the conclusion of the committee's sitting, Gulak stayed back while other members of the committee departed the city on Friday.
translation.pcm: As di committee be don conclude dem sitting, Gulak be saty back when oda member of di committee be komot di city for Friday.

translation.en: A source close to Senator Orji Uzor Kalu, who chaired the public hearing in Owerri said the deceased was offered to fly on Kalu's private jet after the public hearing, but he declined.
translation.pcm: Pesin wey dey close to Senator Orji Uzor kalu, wey be chairman for di public hearing wey apun for inside Owerri, tok say dem offer di deceased private wey be Kalu own afta di siddon tok, but e refuse am.

translation.en: According to the source, Kalu's team left Owerri on the day the public hearing ended but Gulak stayed behind saying he had things to do in the city.
translation.pcm: According to di source, Kalu team be leave di city di day wey di public hearin end, but Gulak stay back, tok say e get things to do for di city.

translation.en: The source said:  We left Owerri on the day the public hearing ended and we asked him to join us on our private jet and we had enough security with us.
translation.pcm: Di source tok say " we komot Owerri di day wey di publik hearin finish, and we tell am say make e join us inside awa private jet, say we get enough security with us.

translation.en: But he said he had things to do in the city.
translation.pcm: But e tok say e get sometin to do for inside di city.

translation.en: Nigerians knock FG, political actors over killing
translation.pcm: Naija pipo don carry knock give FG, and oda politics pipo concerning di kilin

translation.en: Nigerians on social media berated the federal government and political actors for his killing.
translation.pcm: Naija pipo wey dey for inside social media sef don put hand for ear give federel goment and polical leader dem ova di kilin.

translation.en: A commentator on the Facebook link of the story published by Daily Trust, Ifeanyi Maduako, while describing Gulak death as distasteful, linked the incident with politics.
translation.pcm: One pesin wey comment for di Facebook link wey carry di tori wey Daily Trust publish, Ifeanyi Maduako, as e tok say di death of Gulak dey bitter, kom link am with politics.

translation.en: This killing is very distasteful to me.
translation.pcm: Di kilin bitter for my mouth welwel.

translation.en: It appears political and those behind it should be unraveled.
translation.pcm: E be like say na politiks dem take am do, and di pipo wey do, make we open dem face.

translation.en: The killing will expose those behind the current insecurity in Imo State.
translation.pcm: Di killin go expose pipo wey behind di security wahala for Imo state.

translation.en: Who invited him and why killing a northerner in Imo State?
translation.pcm: Na who invite am kom, and why dem go kill northerner for Imo state.

translation.en: I am very afraid what fate awaits innocent Imo State people in the coming days in the hands of northern controlled security agencies, he wrote.
translation.pcm: I dey fear wetin go do innocent Imo pipo in some days for di hand of security people wey north dey control, na so he write am.

translation.en: Another commentator on the thread, Oloruntobi Micheal Omo, noted:  The police report proves that this killing is political and hence calls for an in-depth investigation.
translation.pcm: Another pesin wey comment for di thread, Olurombi Micheal Omo, tok say as police report don prove say na political kilin, say dem suppose investigate am welwel.

translation.en: Police I guess have some questions to answer.
translation.pcm: E dey thingk say police pipo sef get question to nswer to.

translation.en: On his part, Comr Umar Hassan Ahmad wrote, The soul of our innocent people is more important than this scam which is called Nigeria unity.
translation.pcm: For im own part, Comr Hassan Ahmad write say di soul of innocent pipo dey important pass di scam wey dem dey call Unity for naija.

translation.en: This illiteracy will not be acceptable to us, enough is enough we are peacemakers
translation.pcm: We no go gree dis illiteracy, enof is enof, na peacemaker we be

translation.en: but those are pushing us to the wall that this peacemaking can no longer be sustained.
translation.pcm: but doe wey dey push us go meet wall dey see say we no fit kontinu wit di peace

translation.en: I am warning our retaliation will be worst.
translation.pcm: I dey send warning, we go retaliate and e go worst.

translation.en: Buhari you failed us woefully, am urging Imo police to confront the culprit
translation.pcm: Buhari you don fail us woefully, and we face di Imo police pipo to follow di jaguda pipo.

translation.en: Nasiru Inuwa wrote, A wake up call to the northern elites, they've started with the innocent Fulani herders & now turned to northern govt officials & prominent politicians
translation.pcm: Nasiru Inuwa sef write say na wake up call to di big pipo wey dey for north, dem begin wit innocent Fulani herders, now dem don turn to northern goment officials, plus prominent politicians.

translation.en: The outlawed IPOB, in a statement by its secretary, Emma Powerful, faulted reports linking it to the murder of Gulak, noting that the assassination of politicians is not part of its agenda.
translation.pcm: Emma Powerful wey be secretary for IPOB joinbodi wey government no support, don tok for statement say make dem no link IPOB to di murder of Gulak. E tok say to kill politician dem no dey di agenda of di joinbodi

translation.en: We, therefore, state without equivocations that IPOB knows nothing about the said assassination.
translation.pcm: So, we tok am say IPOB no sabi anytin about di killin wey apun.

translation.en: In the first place, what threat did the late Gulak constitute to our cause to warrant his elimination?
translation.pcm: To beging with sef, how Gulak dey take threatin awa mission wey don warrant make we kill am.

translation.en: We had nothing in common with him and could not have in any way killed him.
translation.pcm: We no get anytin with am, and we no for don kill am.

translation.en: Pointing accusing fingers at IPOB for this barbaric act is only meant to divert attention away from the real masterminds.
translation.pcm: To dey point hand for IPOB for dis kin barbaric act na just to divert attention away from di real pipo wey do am.

translation.en: This is the same way terrorists in security uniform commit various atrocities in South East and turn around to blame IPOB for their crimes just to tarnish our global reputation.
translation.pcm: Na di same way wey terrorist wey wera security uniform dey take komit atrocities for inside south east, and dem go kom IPOB for dem crime, sekk of say dem wan spoil awa reputation.

translation.en: This is purely a smokescreen to justify their long-awaited plan to declare another special military operation in the Eastern region to kill more innocent Biafrans.
translation.pcm: Na opportunate wey dem don dey find for long be dis to take start anoda special military operation for inside Eastern Region to take more Biafra pipo wey dey innocent.

translation.en: Instead of the security agencies to properly investigate the incident and possible factors, they switch to accuse IPOB of a crime we know nothing about.
translation.pcm: Instead make scurity pipo for do proper investigate on top di incident and things wey cause am, dem don face IPOB ova crime wey dem no do.

translation.en: Did IPOB have the itinerary of the late Gulak to have waylaid him at the airport?
translation.pcm: Shey IPOB get di informate for di movement of di late Gulak reach say make dem stop am for airport road?

translation.en: The group said security agencies should first investigate Gulak's host, Hope Uzodinma, as well as his political opponents to establish their possible involvement.
translation.pcm: Di group tok say make security pipo first investigate pesin wey host Gulak, dat one na Hope Uzordinma, and im political opponent, to establish if dem dey involve.

translation.en: Those behind Gulak's murder won't go unpunished
translation.pcm: Dos wey kill Gulak no go escape punishment.

translation.en: President Muhammadu Buhari has said that those behind the murder of Gulak and other incidents across the country will not go scot free.
translation.pcm: Presido, Muhammadu Buhari don tok say di pipo wey kill Gulak and oda wahala for inside we obodo no go go scot free.

translation.en: President Buhari, in a statement issued Sunday by his spokesman, Garba Shehu, expressed outrage and disgust over the heinous murder.
translation.pcm: Presido, Buhari, for one statement wey in toktok persin, Garba Shehu, don express im outrage and disgust ova di heinous murder.

translation.en: The president, who expressed sadness over the incident, said: I'm repulsed by such premeditated and gruesome murder of Gulak by evil people who are determined to undermine the peace, unity and territorial integrity of our country.
translation.pcm: Di president, wey don show say di incident make am sad, tok say: I dey repulsed by di gruesome murder of Gulak wey dey premeditated by evil pipo, wey be say dem don detrmine to dabaru di peace, unity and teritorial integriti of awa kontri.

translation.en: Let me warn however that nobody or group of people who engages in such despicable acts should expect to go free.
translation.pcm: Make I kom warn say nobodi, or joinbodi wey dey do dat kind thing wey dey despicable go expect to go free.

translation.en: We will deploy all resources at our disposal to ensure that such callous and criminal elements are brought to justice.
translation.pcm: We go use evritin wey we get to see say pipo wey do dis kind calous and criminal thing go face justice.

translation.en: Gulak's killing unacceptable Akeredolu
translation.pcm: Akeredolu tok say di kilin of Gulak dey unacceptable.

translation.en: Ondo State Governor, Oluwarotimi Akeredolu described the news of the assassination as very shocking and disturbing.
translation.pcm: Governor for Ondo state wey be Olwarotimi akeredolu be describe di news of di kilin as shockin and disturbin

translation.en: In a statement personally signed by the governor, he said this is one murder too many, describing the action as senseless and wicked.
translation.pcm: Inside one statement wey di Governor imsef sign, he tok say dis one na murder too many, say do thing dey senseless and wicked.

translation.en: The perpetrators of this heinous act are enemies of this country.
translation.pcm: Di pipo wey do dis kind bad thing na enemy of di kontri dem be.

translation.en: This contrivance is meant to mislead, confuse and destroy.
translation.pcm: Di corner-corner way na to mislead, confuse and destroy.

translation.en: It bears the unmistakable, despicable imprints of fifth columnists bent on setting the country on the path of conflagration.
translation.pcm: he get di  unmistakable, despicable imprints of fifth columnists bent on setin di kontri on di path of conflagration.

translation.en: These criminals must not be allowed to succeed.
translation.pcm: dey must not allow dis criminal dem to succeed.

translation.en: We want to use this medium to express our solidarity with our brother, Governor of Imo State, Hope Uzodinma.
translation.pcm: We wan use dis medium to tell awa brother, Governor of Imo state, Hope Uzordinma say we dey with am.

translation.en: We admonish him and other governors in the South Eastern States to brace up, and confront the current security challenge to put an end to the bloodbath in the land.
translation.pcm: We encourage am and oda Governor dem for South Eastern states to brace up, make dem confront di security wahala to take end bloodbath for dem lan.

translation.en: The enemies of the people always employ the weapon of fear to create disaffection in the polity.
translation.pcm: Di enemy of di pipo dey always use weapon of fear to create disaffection.

translation.en: This cowardly act is calculated to instigate Nigerians against each other, particularly Northerners, against the Igbo living outside the South East.
translation.pcm: Di coward act na to instigate Naija pipo make dem for face each oda, make northerners for face Igbo pipo wey dey live outside South East

translation.en: We must confront the enemies of the people with a view to neutralising them.
translation.pcm: We must face di enemy of di pipo, to see say we komot power for dem hand.

translation.en: This is definitely not the time for political correctness.
translation.pcm: Dis one no be time to dey argue who sabi politiks pass.

translation.en: Banditry should not be allowed to subvert the legitimacy of the current government at all levels.
translation.pcm: We no suppose allow bandit waka spoil di legitimacy of dis goment for all level.

translation.en: We call on all security agencies to collaborate with a view to unveiling the criminal elements sponsoring and undertaking terrorist acts.
translation.pcm: we dey call on all security pipo dem to kolabo to see say dem show di criminal pipo wey dey sponsor, and dos wey dey do terorist waka.

translation.en: They must be punished, severely.
translation.pcm: Dey must to punish dem severely.

translation.en: Fintiri mourns
translation.pcm: Fintiri dey mourn

translation.en: The Governor of Adamawa State, Ahmadu Umaru Fintiri described as shocking the gruesome murder of Gulak who was a former Speaker of the Adamawa State House of Assembly.
translation.pcm: Di Governor for Adamawa state, dat na Umara Ahmadu Fintiri don tok say di way dem kill Gulak shock am, say e be former speaker for Adamawa state.

translation.en: Governor Fintiri said the death was painful and a reflection of the wickedness of the wicked.
translation.pcm: Governor Fintiri tok say di death dey painful, how wicked pipo take wicked reach.

translation.en: Governor Fintiri described the late Gulak as a witty, determined and practical politician whose rise in life was as a result of sheer hard work.
translation.pcm: Governor Fintiri tok say Late Gulak na pesin wey dey witty, determined, and politician wey dey practical, wey be say as im take rise, na result of im hardwork.

translation.en: It is unfortunate that death has taken from us
translation.pcm: E dey unfortunate say di death don kolekt from us

translation.en: Hon Ahmed Gulak in such a gruesome manner.
translation.pcm: Hon Ahmed Gulak in day kind gruesome manner.

translation.en: He was a lively politician who loved and worked with everyone, and always held the interests of the country at heart.
translation.pcm: Gulak be dis kind lively politicin wey follow evribodi work, and he dey always get di interest of di kontri for im mind.

translation.en: Recalling his interactions with the late Gulak, Governor Ahmadu Umaru Fintiri said, He was a brother and a mentor, and a fighter for human rights as a lawyer.
translation.pcm: As he dey remember im interaction with late Gulak, Governor Ahmadu Umaru Fintiri tok say na broda and mentor e be, and seek of say na lawter, na human right fighter e be.

translation.en: Madagali community has lost a true son.
translation.pcm: Madagali community don loss better son.

translation.en: In a statement issued yesterday in Yola through his Chief Press Secretary, Hunwashi Wanisoukou, the governor noted that Our country has lost an astute fighter for human rights.
translation.pcm: For inside one statement wey im Chief Press Secretary Hunwashi Wanisoukou release for inside Yola yesterday, di governor tok say we kontri don loss one of di strong persin wey dey fight for human right.

translation.en: We all remember how passionate he fought for the plight of those displaced by insurgency and the downtrodden.
translation.pcm: We all remember how passionate he fight for di pipo wey insurgency jaguda don send komot for house,  and pipo wey no too get means.

translation.en: ACF condemns assassination
translation.pcm: ACF condenm di kilin

translation.en: The Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF) has condemned Gulak's assassination, describing it as a monumental loss to the nation.
translation.pcm: Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF) don condenm di kilin of Gulak, dem tok say na big loss for we kontri.

translation.en: The ACF in a statement issued by its National Publicity Secretary, Emmanuel Yawe, said it was sad to receive news on the assassination of Ahmed Gulak describing him as a dynamic and progressive politician from the north.
translation.pcm: Di ACF for one statement wey di national publicity secretary, Emmanuel Yawe carry komot, tok say dem dey sad to hear di kilin of Gulak, dem describe as one politician wey dey dynamic, and progressive politician wey from notrth komot.

translation.en: You liked or hated him that was your business.
translation.pcm: If you like am, or you no like am, na your business be dat.

translation.en: May God bless him and give his family and his state, Adamawa the strength to bear this monumental loss, it stated.
translation.pcm: Make God bless, and make he give im family and state, Adamawa, di ability to take bear di loss.

translation.en: Assassination part of plans to replicate 1966 coup CNG
translation.pcm: Di kilin na part of di plan to take repeat do coup wey apun for 1966 CNG

translation.en: The Coalition of Northern Groups (CNG) has described Sunday's assassination of Ahmed Gulak, a prominent northern leader and former Political Adviser to former President Goodluck Jonathan as coordinated and as well as incessant attacks on police formations in Nigeria's southeast as part of a wider plan to replicate the coup of 1966.
translation.pcm: Di coalition for Norther Groups (CNG) don describe di kilin of northern politician Ahmed Gulak wey be before before political adviser to former presido Goodluck Jonathan, say na sometin wey dem plan, and all di attack wey dem dey attack police pipo for inside Southeast of Naija, na to try repeat di coup wey apun for 1966.

translation.en: The CNG in a statement signed by its Spokesperson, Abdul-Azeez Suleiman said it was the reason why the northern part of the country cannot be reasonably expected to live with the south east as a nation alleging that the violent rascality by the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), the Eastern Security Network (ESN) and other armed Igbo gangs are funded, fully supported and emboldened by every component of the Igbo society at home and in the diaspora.
translation.pcm: Di CNg for inside one statement wey dem toktok pesin Abdul-Azeez Suleiman sign tok say  na di reason why norther part of di kontri no fit live with southeast as one kontri, as dem allege say di violent way of di Indigenous Pipo of Biafra, Di eastern Security network (ESN), and oda Igbo gand dey fund, get confidence, by everi part of di Igbo society, both pipo wey home and di one wey dem dey obodo oyinbo.

translation.en: West Ham top-four hopes dented by loss to Everton
translation.pcm: Westham hope make dem fit reach top-four don spoil wit how dem lose to Everton

translation.en: West Ham United blew their chance to apply real pressure in the race for a Premier League top-four finish as they slumped to a 1-0 home defeat by an Everton side who maintained their European qualification hopes on Sunday.
translation.pcm: Westham hope to reach top-four don spoil bikos dem no play wella against Everton wey dey hope to enta European league for Sunday

translation.en: Dominic Calvert-Lewins 24th-minute goal proved decisive against a West Ham side who huffed and puffed but never really hit their stride on a crucial afternoon.
translation.pcm: Di goal wey Dominic Caivert-Lewin score for di 24th minute of dia game show say dey don determine to win Westham wey don make mouth finish say dem go score for dat serious afternoon

translation.en: The closest West Ham came to an equaliser was when Vladimir Coufals shot hit the post and Jarrod Bowen could not bundle in the rebound from point-blank range.
translation.pcm: Di closest wey Westham reach to equalize na wen Vladmir Coufal go shoot ball wey chop bar and Jerron Bowenno no fit hit am back enta post upon say hin dey the goal post front.

translation.en: Supporters of the Vice-President Yemi Osinbajo have shown support for him by portraying him as a presidential candidate come next election.
translation.pcm: Pipo wey dey support Vice-president Yemi Osinbajo don show say dey still dey hin back as dem dey showcase am as pesin wey go be presidential candidate for di election wey dey kom.

translation.en: Osinbajo has not declared interest in presidential race, says spokesman
translation.pcm: Osinbajo tok tok pesin say hin no tok say he wan be president

translation.en: Vice-President Yemi Osinbajo has described the speculations that he will contest the 2023 presidential election as a distraction.
translation.pcm: Vice-president Osinbajo tok say all di small tok say hin get mind to be president for 2023 Presidential Election na distraction

translation.en: There have been unconfirmed reports that Osinbajo is eyeing the highest office in the land.
translation.pcm: Tori wey no dey confam don dey town say Osinbajo eye dey President post for di land

translation.en: In a statement which Laolu Akande, his spokesman, issued on his behalf on Monday, the vice-president said it is not true that he has declared interest in the race.
translation.pcm: Laolu Akande, wey be Vice-president tok tok pesin tok say Vice-president neva declare hin interest to be president for hin statement on Monday

translation.en: The attention of the Office of the Vice President has been drawn to a website:
translation.pcm: Di Vice-president office don put dia eye for one Website bodi

translation.en: supportosinbajo.ng that is calling on Nigerians to join a volunteer group mobilizing support for Prof. Yemi Osinbajo, SAN, ahead of the 2023 presidential election.
translation.pcm: supportosinbajo.ng wey dey call Nigeria pipo dem make dey join volunteer group to use support Prof. Yemi Osinbajo, SAN, dey prepare for di 2023 Presidential election

translation.en: Details of this website and the solicitation of the group are currently trending on WhatsApp with a suggestion that Prof. Osinbajo has quietlydeclared interest in the 2023 election.
translation.pcm: Details of di website and how dem dey beg don full Whatsapp plus di fact say dem dey tok say Osinbajo don declare interest for di 2023 election

translation.en: The Office of the Vice President is not in any way connected to this website or the group behind it and considers such an enterprise an unnecessary distraction.
translation.pcm: Di vice president office no get any konnet wit di group or di website wey stand for am and dey feel say di whole thin na distraction wey no necessary

translation.en: Prof. Osinbajo has not declared any interest whatsoever in the 2023 election, but he is rather focused on working in his capacity as Vice President in the current administration to address all the compelling issues in the country and concerns of Nigerians, including finding effective and lasting solutions to the security challenges.
translation.pcm: Prof Osinbajo neva tok say he wan be president for di 2023 election, hin dey focus to dey work as Vice president for di current administration to dey face serious mata for di kontri

translation.en: Therefore, we ask that people desist from such unhelpful permutations while we all deal together with the challenges confronting us as Nigerians, and resolve them for the benefit of our people, peace and prosperity in the land,the statement read.
translation.pcm: Di statement tok say; We dey ask awa pipo make dem stop all di wahala, make we dey face di challenges wey dey face us as Nigeria pipo, make we do well for awa pipo, make peace and prosperity dey we land.

translation.en: Ndidi and Iheanacho has made Nigeria proud again as the players in Leichester City, the team that won FA Cup this season, showing off the country's flag.
translation.pcm: Ndidi and Iheanacho don make Nigeria proud again for Leicester City wey dem dey play as dem carry di Kontri flag dey show off, as e be say na dia team win FA Cup.

translation.en: NFF congratulates Ndidi, Iheanacho on FA Cup win with Leicester City
translation.pcm: NFF don congratulate Ndidi Iheanacho for di FA cup wey hin win for Leichester City

translation.en: President of the Nigeria Football Federation (NFF)
translation.pcm: President of di Nigerian Football Federation (NFF)

translation.en: Mr Amaju Melvin Pinnick, has sent a message of congratulations to Super Eagles midfielder Wilfred Ndidi and forward Kelechi Iheanacho on the duos triumph with Leicester City over much-fancied Chelsea FC in Saturdays
translation.pcm: Mr Amaju Melvin Pinnick, don send messasge wey hin use congratulate Super Eagles Midfielder Wilfred Ndidi and Forward Kelechi Iheanacho for dia win for Leichester city against Chealsea wey pipo been dey hype for Saturday

translation.en: FA Cup final in England.
translation.pcm: FA Cup final for England

translation.en: Both players featured in the encounter at Wembley and at the end celebrated enthusiastically with Nigerias flag as they joined a list of only seven other Nigerian players to have lifted Englands most glamorous diadem.
translation.pcm: Di two of dem dey di march for Wembley and dey celebrate afta di march wit Nigeria flag as dey join di list of di oda seven Nigerian Players wey been carry di England Cup

translation.en: I am very happy for both Ndidi and Iheanacho.
translation.pcm: I dey veri hapi for Ndidi and Iheanacho

translation.en: They worked very hard for Leicester City throughout the campaign and themselves and the Club deserve the honour.
translation.pcm: Dey work wella for Leichester City throughout di campaign and both dem and dia team deserve di honor.

translation.en: I believe this triumph will serve as a major psychological boost for the two players ahead of our friendly games this summer and FIFA World Cup qualifiers starting in September.
translation.pcm: I get believe say dis win go work as high morale for dem for di friendly march wey we wan play dis summer and di FIFA World Cup wey  wan start for September

translation.en: I am also very happy seeing the two players celebrating with the Nigerian flag at the end of it all.
translation.pcm: I also dey hapi wit di Nigeria Flag wey two of dem use celebrate wen evrithin finish

translation.en: That was awesome.
translation.pcm: Dat one dey awesome

translation.en: Ndidi and Iheanacho became only the second pair of Nigerians to have celebrated The FA Cup win in England, after Nwankwo Kanu and John Utaka triumphed with Portsmouth against Cardiff in 2008.
translation.pcm: Ndidi and Iheanacho kom be di second pair of pipo from Nigeria wey celebrate FA Cup wey dem win for England, dat one na afta Nwankwo Kanu and John Utaka win for Portsmouth against Cardiff for 2008

translation.en: Before then, Daniel Amokachi had won with Everton in 1995; Celestine Babayaro with Chelsea in 2000; Kanu with Arsenal in 2002 and 2003 and John Mikel Obi with Chelsea in 2007.
translation.pcm: Before dat time, Daniel Amokachi don win for Everton for 1995; Celestine Babayaro sef for Chelsea for year 2000, Kanu for Arsenal for year 2002 and John Mikel Obi for Chelsea for 2007

translation.en: After the Kanu/Utaka feat in 2008, John Mikel Obi won again with Chelsea in 2009, 2010 and 2012; Alex Iwobi won with Arsenal in 2017 and; Victor Moses won with Chelsea in 2018.
translation.pcm: Afta Kanu/Utaka win for 2008, John Mikel Obi win again for Chelsea for 2009, 2010 and 2012, Alex Iwobi win for Arsernal for 2017, Victor Moses too join dem win for 2018.

translation.en: While in the Federal Government College, Enugu, in the early 70s, my primary mode of transportation from Kaduna to Enugu was the train.
translation.pcm: Wen I dey di Federal Goment College wey dey Enugu for early 70s, na train I dey use pass to transport mysef from Kaduna go Enugu.

translation.en: Djokovic warms up for Roland Garros with Belgrade title
translation.pcm: Djokovic warm up for Roland Garros wit Belgrade title

translation.en: Novak Djokovic completed a successful warm-up for Roland Garros when he beat Slovakian Alex Molcan 6-4, 6-3, on Saturday in the final of the ATP clay tournament in Belgrade.
translation.pcm: Novak Djokovic don complete hin warm-up wit success for Roland Garros wen hin beat Slovakian Alex 6-4, 6-3 on Saturday for di final of di ATP Clay tournament for Belgrade

translation.en: This was the second event in the city in just over a month but where the Serbia Open in April was played in an empty stadium, fans were allowed for this tournament.
translation.pcm: Na dis be di second event for di city for ova one month wey be say fans kom, wey no be like Serbia Open wey apun for April wey di stadium dry.

translation.en: Its been a while since I last played here in front of a crowd,said Djokovic, a Belgrade native who lost in the semifinal in the Serbia Open, a tournament he last won in 2011.
translation.pcm: Djokovic tok say he don tey wey hin play for pipo front, Belgrade pesin wey lose semifinal for Serbia Open wey be say na 2011 he win am last

translation.en: Herder-farmer crisis in Nigeria has become an ever dominating topic on all news platforms in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di herder-farmer kasala for Nigeria don turn to wetin dey show face for news evriday now.

translation.en: Ending Nigerias herder-farmer crisis: The Livestock Reform Plan
translation.pcm: To end Nigeria herder-farmer kasala: Di Livestock reform Plan

translation.en: Nigerias federal and state governments are struggling to implement a National Livestock Transformation Plan that seeks to curb the movement of cattle across the country and reduce deadly herder-farmer conflict.
translation.pcm: Nigeria federal and state goment dey struggle to implement one National Livestock Transformation Plan wey dey wan use control cattle movement throughout di kontri wey go kom turn to herder and farmer fight

translation.en: While the Plan has earned the endorsement of many state governments, it faces significant challenges.
translation.pcm: Many state goment don endorse am, but e dey face some kind challenge.

translation.en: Deficient political leadership, popular misperceptions about its purpose, budgetary constraints aggravated by the COVID-19 pandemic, a lack of personnel with the expertise to carry it out and widespread insecurity, are all hindering progress.
translation.pcm: Political leadership wey o dey work well, perception about hin purpose wey no korrect, budget constraints wey increase bikos of COVID-19 pandemic,  experts wey no dey to do di work and insecurity wey dey evriwer, dey block di progress

translation.en: If the Plan fails as previous initiatives to modernise livestock management did, herder-farmer violence could escalate.
translation.pcm: If di plan go fail as like di oda plans to modernise livestock management, di farmer and herder fight go increase

translation.en: Approved by the National Economic Council in January 2019, the Plan represents the most comprehensive effort to overhaul Nigerias inefficient and grossly underperforming livestock system.
translation.pcm: National Economic Council approve am for January 2019, di plan na to represent di effort wey pipo go understand pass to examine di livestock system wey no dey work well

translation.en: At the core is a strategy to curtail migratory or open grazing, and thus, lower the risk of conflict between herders and farmers.
translation.pcm: Di main part of di strategy na to fit kontrol wia grazin dey  apun, so dem go fit reduce di fight wey go wan happen between herders and farmers

translation.en: It is animated by the hope that over a period of 10 years, predominantly nomadic pastoralists will be persuaded to move their cattle into ranches and public grazing reserves, where breedingg farms and other mechanised livestock management practices are to bolster the sectors productivity.
translation.pcm: Di movement get hope say afta 10 years,herders wey dey waka up and down mainly go get mind to dey put dey put dia cattle inside ranch and reserve for public grazin, wia breedin farms and oda mechanised livestock management go support wetin di sector go produce

translation.en: By the end of 2028, authorities aim to have at least 119 ranches operating in all participating states, creating over two million jobs in the livestock production, processing and marketing chains.
translation.pcm: By di time wey 2028 go end, di authority get am for mind to  don build like 119 ranch for all di state wey dey involve, make dem use am create like two million job for di livestock production, processin and market chain

translation.en: President Muhammadu Buharis administration came up with the Plan following a wave of violence between herders and farmers, particularly a surge in related violence afflicting rural dwellers in 2018.
translation.pcm: president Muhammadu Buhari administration na hin make di plan afta one period wia herders and farmers  dey fight,  particilarly wen  di fight to much and he dey affect pipo for ghetto for 2018

translation.en: The federal government, which has committed to funding 80 per cent of the transformation proposals submitted by participating states, has taken preliminary steps toward putting the Plan into practice, including providing technical support to help states prepare for implementation, such as help with field surveys and site mapping.
translation.pcm: Di Federal Goment wey get mind to drop moni wey go carry like 80 percent of di Transformation proposal wey di states wey dey involve submit, don dey take di first step to practice wetin dem plan, wey go include technical support wey go help dem state prepare to start work, tins like field survey and site mappin.

translation.en: Several states have reactivated earlier demarcated grazing reserves, opened offices and set up steering committees to administer the Plan.
translation.pcm: Plenti state don dey reactivate grazin reserve wey dem demarcate, dey open office, dey kom set up steerin committee wey go dey manage di plan join.

translation.en: Authorities have also held workshops and done other works to explain the benefits of livestock reform to a larger audience.
translation.pcm: Di authority dem don dey do workshop and oda work wey dem go use teach pipo di benefit wey livestock reform get

translation.en: But two years into the 10-year plan, the first new ranch is yet to be built, and the obstacles are many.
translation.pcm: As two years don comot for di 10-year plan wey dem do, dey neva build any ranch and dia obstacles plenti

translation.en: Opposition, partly among herders, predominantly from the Fulani ethnic group but also among farmers who resent the Plans benefits to pastoralists, hinders reform efforts.
translation.pcm: opposition wey dey kom from di herders, though na from di Fulani pipo e plenti pass, e kom still dey among di farmers wey no want make pastolist dem enjoy di benefit of di plan sef, dey spoil di reform effort

translation.en: Distrust is widespread in the Middle Belt, which has been the scene of violent disputes over land between herders and farmers, notwithstanding peacemaking and military efforts that since 2018 have reduced the bloodshed.
translation.pcm: Distrust don plenti for Middle belt, place wey be say fight between farmers and herders too plenti bikos of land, even though peacemakin and effort wey di military dey take since 2018 don reduce di blood shed

translation.en: Federal and state budgets are pinched, partly due to the pandemics economic fallout, and the country lacks sufficient technical expertise for managing ranches and grazing reserves.
translation.pcm: Shortage don dey federal and state goment budget, small part na bikos of di economy wey spoil bikos of di pandemic, and bikos di kontri no get technical experts wey know how dem take dey manage ranch and grazin reserve

translation.en: In many states, especially in the North-West, the proliferation of criminal gangs and other armed groups is cutting off access to grazing reserves and scaring away potential investors.
translation.pcm: For many states, especially for North-West, di way wey criminal gang and group dem wey get arm dey grow dey spoil access to grazin reserves and e dey make pipo wey wan invest before no do am again

translation.en: Unless addressed, these and other problems could delay or even scuttle the Plan, leaving the country vulnerable to an escalation of herder-farmer conflict, which could degenerate into wider ethnic, regional and religious violence.
translation.pcm: unless dey do somethin about am, dis kasala and oda ones fit delay or make e spoil di plan, wey go make di kontri dey helpless wen di fight between farmers and herders dey serious pass before own, wey fit kom turn fight between ethnic group, region and religion

translation.en: Tackling these challenges requires a concerted effort by federal and state authorities, with help from donors and investors.
translation.pcm: To tackle dis kasala,e go dey important make Federal and State authority join hand make effort, wit donors and investors help.

translation.en: First, Abuja and supportive state governments should provide stronger political leadership and improve public communication to dispel misgivings and misperceptions about the Plan.
translation.pcm: First, make Abuja and oda states wey dey support am provide political leadership wey strong pass before, make dey kom increase dia communication wit public, so dem go fit spoil pipo doubt and wrong understanding of di plan

translation.en: These are especially prevalent among pastoralists, who will be asked to change a centuries-old nomadic lifestyle, and who legitimately doubt the Plans promises about available pasture.
translation.pcm: Dis one dey common pass for pastoralists dia side, wey go ask dem make dem change dia nomadic lifestlye wey dey wit dia pipo for centuries, wey still get serious doubt say di plan promise about pasture na lie.

translation.en: But many farmers are fearful too, that they may lose land to livestock producers.
translation.pcm: But many farmers dey fear say dem go lose dia land give pipo wey dey produce livestock.

translation.en: Many in the Middle Belt and southern states remain deeply suspicious of the Plans long-term goals, which they see as creating privileges for herders, and more broadly, the Fulani.
translation.pcm: Many pipo for di middle Belt and oda states for di South still dey suspect di plan long-term goals, wey dem dey see as opportunity for herders and di Fulani people particularly

translation.en: With Abuja and other partners support, state governments must build expertise and technical capacity, especially for managing ranches and grazing reserves, dairy production and meat processing.
translation.pcm: Wit di support from Abuja and oda partners, state goments go need find pipo wey go be expert, wey go know technical aspect of thins, especially pipo wey go dey manage di ranch and grazin reserve, dairy production and meat processin

translation.en: Federal and state governments should also up budgetary commitments, hasten the release of funds and provide financial transparency to ensure accountability, working with donors and investors as necessary.
translation.pcm: Make Federal and State goment sef increase dia budget for di plan, release di fund quick and make dey kom create financial transparency to make sure say evrithin dey accounted for, to dey work wit donors and investors wey necessary

translation.en: Addressing rural insecurity, curbing impunity and rehabilitating communities adversely affected by earlier violence in participating states are also vital.
translation.pcm: E dey important sef to dey deal wit insecurities wey dey rural area, to dey curb impunity and to dey kom rehabilitate communities wey di fight affect seriously for di states wey dey participate.

translation.en: Plus, authorities will need to consider climate changes likely impact and reach a decision about how the transhumant herders who cross into Nigeria seasonally should or should not benefit from the Plan.
translation.pcm: Authorities go need consider weather change mata join, make dem decide if herders from oda kontris sometimes go benefit from di plan sef

translation.en: While some of these steps will take time, the Plans proponents should focus on delivering concrete, visible results on a relatively short-term basis.
translation.pcm: As some of dis step go take time,make di pipo wey dey plan am focus on how dem go fit bring result wey strong, wey pipo go fit see for small time

translation.en: Less than two years from now, the country will hold general elections.
translation.pcm: less dan two years from now, di kontri go hold general election

translation.en: If the Plan is to survive the change of government that will follow, politicians may need to be able to produce clear proof of its benefits (Having served two terms, President Buhari and many state governors are ineligible to compete, meaning that change is certain.)
translation.pcm: if di plan go survive di change of goment wey go follow, Politians go need bring proof wey clear say e get benefit (Change dey certain, as president Buhari and many state governor dem no go fit compete again as dey don serve two term)

translation.en: Ideally, by the time campaigning heats up in late 2022, the Plans backers should be able to point to at least a handful of newly constructed ranches or rehabilitated reserves, strong donor and investor commitments, and the first of a cadre of newly trained livestock management professionals.
translation.pcm: By di time wey champaign for election don dey hot for 2022 endin , di pipo wey dey back di plan suppose fit show some of di ranch wey dem build or di reserve wey dem repair,strong donor wey dem get and dia investors commitment and di first group of pipo wey dey don train to be professional for Livestock mamagement

translation.en: None of this will be easy, but the Plan is worth the effort.
translation.pcm: Nothin for dis thin dey easy but di plan worth di effort

translation.en: While far from perfect, it offers an important chance to reform Nigerias livestock system with a strategy that addresses the needs of both herders and small-scale farmers.
translation.pcm: No be say e perfect, but e bring chance wey dey important, chance to change Nigeria livestock system wit strategy wey go address wetin both herders and small-scale farmers need.

translation.en: About 70 per cent of Nigerias workforce earns an income through agriculture.
translation.pcm: About 70 percent  pipo wey dey work for Nigeria dey get moni from Agriculture

translation.en: Modernising the livestock sector could boost the countrys prosperity overall at the same time that it takes a big step toward resolving one of Nigerias most dangerous conflicts.
translation.pcm: To modernise di Livestock sector go boost di kontri prosperity and for di same time, na one big way to solve one of Nigeria kasala wey dangerous

translation.en: With the clock ticking down to the 2023 elections, federal and state authorities will need to move quickly to make a visible mark, lest the work they have done to create this moment of opportunity be lost.
translation.pcm: As time dey reach for di 2023 election, both federal and state authority go need do quick so pipo go see wetin dem dey do, or else all dia work to create dis kind moment of opportunity go spoil.

translation.en: For many farmers and other stakeholders in the agro sector, the year 2020 will remain one of the worst years in the history of Nigeria because it introduced new dynamics that millions of smallholder farmers have to contend with.
translation.pcm: for plenti farmers and oda stakeholders for di agro-sector, di year 2020 go remain as one of di years wey worse pass for di history of Naija unto say e introduced new dynamics wey millions of smallholder farmers go contend with

translation.en: The agricultural sector was confronted with many challenges ranging from the climate change-related issues, conflicts and the complications exacerbated by the global COVID-19 pandemic, which brought pains and heartbreak to farmers and agribusiness players.
translation.pcm: plenti challenges don dey confront di agricultural sector wey dey range from di issues wey dey climate change-related, conflicts and di complications wey don exacerbate from di global COVID-19 pandemic, wey bring come pain and heartbreak to farmers and agribusiness players

translation.en: First, the COVID-19 lockdown and restrictions happened at the time dry season farmers were about to harvest their crops and wet season farmers were about to commence cultivation.

translation.en: Many farmers could not access their farms while for others getting labourers to harvest their farms since mechanization is a huge challenge and harvest is manual, is the problem.
translation.pcm: plenti farmers no fit go dia farms while odas wey get labourers wey go harvest dia farms since mechanization be huge challenge and harvest wey be manual, be di problem.

translation.en: Movement restrictions introduced to curb the spread of the coronavirus locked-down markets had disrupted the rural economy.

translation.en: Many farmers could not sell their produce to enable them to buy seeds and fertilizer, pay labourers/tractor services.

translation.en: Even when the lockdown was lifted for the agricultural sector, the price of fertilizer became so high that many smallholder farmers could not afford it.

translation.en: In some places, the price went as high as N13,000 for a 50kg bag of Indorama and Notore Urea.

translation.en: Niger Republic's new president blasts terrorists for war crimes
translation.pcm: New oga Presido for inside Niger Republic don chook hand for terrorist eye on top crime wey dem commit.

translation.en: Niger Republic's newly-elected president, Mohamed Bazoum, hit out at terrorist groups whose barbarity has exceeded every limit after taking the helm Friday of a country struggling with two jihadist insurgencies.
translation.pcm: Niger Republic new oga Presido Mohamed Bazoum don put hand for terrorist dem wey dem barbaric act don pass limit afta im enter power for Friday inside kontri wey dey face two jihadist insurgency dem.

translation.en: These groups carry out large-scale massacres of innocent civilians, and in doing so, commit real war crimes, Bazoum declared.
translation.pcm: Bazoum tok say di groups dem dey kill plenty innocent pipo, and by dat, say na real war crimes dem dey commit.

translation.en: The leaders of these groups are from other countries, he said, adding that Niger was being attacked without any cause.
translation.pcm: He tok say di leaders of di groups kom from oda kontri dem, say dem just dey attack Niger for nothing.

translation.en: No terrorist leader has ever formulated any grievance against our state, he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say no terrorist leader don get any vex with dem kontri

translation.en: Bazoum, 61, was elected in a two-round vote in December and February.
translation.pcm: Bazoum, wey be 61 years old, na im dem elect for two rounds wey apun for December and february.

translation.en: He was previously right-hand man to Mahamadou Issoufou, 68, who has voluntarily stepped down after two five-year terms.
translation.pcm: right hand pesin of Mahamadou Issoufou, wey be 68 years, im step down by imsef afta im soend two fove yaer term for office.

translation.en: His inauguration marks the first handover between elected leaders in Niger's 60-year post-independence history, but jihadist attacks and an alleged attempted coup have overshadowed ceremonies.
translation.pcm: Na im inauguartion be di first time wey elected leaders dey handova give each oda for Niger history for over 60 years wey dem don get independence, but di attack from jihadist and some kind plan to do coup don spoil di celebrate.

translation.en: Niger is being hit by insurgents linked to Al-Qaeda or the so-called Islamic State (IS), crossing from Mali and Burkina Faso in the west, and by Boko Haram, crossing from Nigeria in the southeast.
translation.pcm: Niger dey suffer insurgency wey get close conect to Al-qaeda or Islami State (IS), wey dem dey enter west from Burkina Faso and Mali, and from nigeria as Boko haram dey enter from southeast.

translation.en: More than 300 people have been killed in three attacks in the west since the start of the year.
translation.pcm: E pass 300 pipo wey dem don kill for inside three attacks for di west since di year start.

translation.en: In the most recent of these, 141 members of the Tuareg community were massacred on March 21 in Tahoua, a vast desert region abutting Mali.
translation.pcm: Di one wey recent pass na when dem kill 141 member of di Tuareg community for march 21, inside Tahoua, one big desert wey enter Mali.

translation.en: Bazoum said Niger's diplomatic efforts under his presidency will be centred on Mali.
