translation.pcm: E go stop qualifyin and proffesional joinbodi dem, education institution, pipo wey dey do employment and oda sector dem to dey discriminate against person, student or personnel based on dem religion or di manifestation.

translation.en: When passed, the law will bury issues such as what we saw in Kwara for good.
translation.pcm: When passed, di law will bury issues such as what we saw in Kwara for good. When dem pass am, di law go bury issue wey be like wetin we see for Kwara patapata.

translation.en: It will also address the bigotry of some employers, or those executives who take their prejudice to public office and allow it to becloud their sense of judgment.
translation.pcm: E go also address di bigot behaviour of executive dem wey dey carry dem prejudice enter public office and dem go still allow am cover dem sense of judgement.

translation.en: The law should be a welcome development.
translation.pcm: Dem Suppose welkom di law.

translation.en: After all, it is only to expand and expatiate the provisions of Nigeria's constitution and the UDHR document as explained above.
translation.pcm: After all, na only to expand and expatiate di provision dem wey dey for inside di Nigeria constitution and for UDHR document as we take tok am above.

translation.en: It is in line with similar laws passed recently in the country seeking to tackle social menace and harmful cultural practice the Disability Law and the Violence Against Persons Prohibition (VAPP).
translation.pcm: E follow line with similar law dem wey dem pass for di kontri to take tackle social wahal and cultural practice dem wey dey harmful di law wey dey Prohibit violence against pipo and disability law (VAPP).

translation.en: While disability seeks to eradicate all forms of discrimination based on a persons disabilities, VAPP is addressing domestic and other gender-based violence in the country.
translation.pcm: As disability dey try to komot any discrimination wey dey face pipo wey get disability, VAPP dey face domestic plus oda gender violence dem for inside di kontri.

translation.en: One at a time, our representatives in the legislative chambers are tackling the social menaces bedeviling our country through legal instruments.
translation.pcm: One by one, pipo wey dey represent us for inside di legislative chamber dem don dey use legal instrument dey  tackle all social wahala  wey dey face awa kontri.

translation.en: They are addressing these social ills not because there were no prior generic laws that cover them but because they need to be addressed more comprehensively to leave no room for opacity.
translation.pcm: Dem dey address all dis social roughness no be to say law be no dey before wey dey address dem, but dem wan carry evritin togeda make dem for no allow see finish.

translation.en: While UDHR may seem like a far, distant document with no instrument of enforcement, the RDPP Law and others like it are provided to allocate punishments for offenders.
translation.pcm: As e be like say road still far for UDHR, and instrument to take enforce am neva dey, di RDPP law and oda law dem wey resemble am dey ground to carry punishment give offenders.

translation.en: Contrary to the view of its critics, as far as the RDPP Bill is concerned, there is nothing to show attempts at seeking the enthronement of a state religion on any state that may domesticate the law eventually.
translation.pcm: As e dey contradict di view of critics, as far as di RDPP Bill dey concerned, no prove dey say dem wan dem wan put state of religion on top any state wey fit domesticate di law.

translation.en: It does not go against Section 10 of the Nigerian Constitution that says The Government of the Federation or of a State shall not adopt any religion as State Religion.
translation.pcm: E no go against Section 10 of di Constitution for Nigeria wey support make Di Goment of do Federation or for State fit no adopt any religion as State Religion.

translation.en: To peddle this argument, because the bill calls on the general public to respect the rights of Muslim women that wear Hijab in public spaces smacks of Islamophobia only.
translation.pcm: To push di argument, bikos di bill dey call for general public to dey respect di right of womn dem wey be muslim wey dey wear Hijab for public place, say na to only quench Islamaphobia.

translation.en: In the final analysis, to deny a Nigerian  male or female  his or her religious freedom negates our multicultural pretenses.
translation.pcm: For di final analysis, e dey go against awa multicultural pretenses to dey deny any Nigerian be it male or female dem religios freedom.

translation.en: It negates the concept of equality, and basic human right as enshrined in Nigeria's constitution and the Universal Declaration of Human Rights legal document.
translation.pcm: E dey against equality, and basic human right as e take dey inside constitution for Nigeria and di legal document for Universal Declaration of Human Rghts.

translation.en: A bill that will criminalize such decimations based on religious grounds, like the RDPP bill, is a welcome development.
translation.pcm: Bill wey go make dat kind decimation on religion bikom criminal, like di RDPP bill go get welkom nod.

translation.en: Bashir wrote from Abuja
translation.pcm: Na from Abuja Bashir dey write.

translation.en: Niger's President Issoufou wins N1.905bn African leadership prize
translation.pcm: President for Niger Issoufou don win N1.95bn wey be leadership prize for inside Africa

translation.en: Nigers President Mahamadou Issoufou has been announced the 2020 winner of the $5m (N1.905 billion)
translation.pcm: Dem don announce say na President of Niger wey be Mahamadou Issoufou be winner of $5m (N1.905bn) for 2020

translation.en: Ibrahim prize for African leadership.
translation.pcm: Ibrahim prize for African leadership.

translation.en: Issoufou has served two five-year terms as president from 2011 to 2020.
translation.pcm: Issoufou don serve two terms wey be five years each as president from 2011 go enter 2020.

translation.en: He is set to be succeeded by former interior minister, Mohamed Bazoum, who won the presidential election last month.
translation.pcm: Na Mohamed Bazoum wey be former interior minister go enter office afta am as e take win presidential election last month

translation.en: The prize committee praised the Nigerien president's leadership after inheriting one of the worlds poorest economies.
translation.pcm: Di committee wey dey give di prize be praise di leadership of di Niger president afta im meet di economy wey dey among di one wey poor pass for di world.

translation.en: It said he fostered economic growth, shown unwavering commitment to regional stability and to the constitution, and championed African democracy.
translation.pcm: Im tok say he cause economy to grow, say e show better commitment to regional stability and di constitution, and im champion democracy for inside Africa.

translation.en: Mr Issoufou is the sixth recipient of the Ibrahim Prize.
translation.pcm: Na Mr Issoufou be di nomba six pesin wey go kolekt di Ibrahim Prize.

translation.en: He has tweeted that the prize honours all Nigerien people.
translation.pcm: He don send tweet say di prize dey honour evribodi for Nigeria.

translation.en: I consider this award an encouragement to continue to think and act in such a way that promotes democratic values and good governance, not only in Niger, but in Africa and around the world, he added.
translation.pcm: I see dis award as ecncouragement to take kontinu to thingk and act in way wey be say e go dey promote democracy value and better goment, no be for Niger alone, but for Africa and di world, as e take tok.

translation.en: Previous winners of the prize include Ellen Johnson Sirleaf of Liberia (2017), President Hifikepunye Pohamba of Namibia (2014), President Pedro Pires of Cabo Verde (2011), President Festus Mogae of Botswana (2008) and President Joaquim Chissano of Mozambique (2007).
translation.pcm: Pipo wey don win di prize before include Ellen Johnson Sirleaf of Liberia (2017), President Hifikepunye Pohamba of Namibia (2014), President Pedro Pires of Cabo Verde (2011), President Festus Mogae of Botswana (2008) and President Joaquim Chissano of Mozambique (2007).

translation.en: KEDCO gets taskforce to enforce collection, check meter bypass
translation.pcm: KEDCO don get taskforce wey dey enforce collection, and dey check who bypass meter

translation.en: The Management of Kano Electricity Distribution Company (KEDCO) has formed a taskforce to enforce payment of electricity bills.
translation.pcm: Di pipo wey dey manage Kano Electricity Distribution Company (KEDCO) don form taskforce to take make sure dem pay for electricity.

translation.en: In a statement by Ibrahim Sani Shawai, the Head of Corporate Communications, KEDCO, the taskforce has been empowered to ensure that current and outstanding bills are collected as this would help KEDCO consolidate on the numerous  reforms to improve power supply.
translation.pcm: Inside one staement wey Ibrahim Sani Shawai , wey be head of Corporate Communication, KEDCO, give, dem don give di taskforce power to make sure say dem collect all dem don dey owe plus di one wey dem just dey use to take help KEDCO to consolidate on top di plenty reform to improve power supply.

translation.en: The taskforce is also to check issues of meter bypass, illegal connections, energy theft and other forms of sabotage.
translation.pcm: Di taskforce go also dey check issue of bypass of metre, illegal connections dem, tif tif of energy and oda form of sabotage.

translation.en: In this regard, anyone found engaging in any forms of sabotage would be dealt with in accordance with the laws of the land, it stated.
translation.pcm: For dis regard, anybodi wey dem see say dem dey sabotage in any way, dem go deal wit dem as di law take tok.

translation.en: We are appealing to all customers to remain vigilant on all our installations while ensuring that their meters are properly protected against vandals.
translation.pcm: We dey appeal to awa customer dem to open eye for all awa intallation and to make sure dem protect dem meters welwel against vandals.

translation.en: We also assure all our customers that our metering initiative which is aimed at ending estimated billing and giving customers the opportunity to pay for what they consume, is still ongoing, the statement stated.
translation.pcm: We dey assure all awa customer say awa initiative to give meter wey we wan take quench estimated billing and to give customers di opportunity to dey pay for wetin dem dey use still dey kontinu, as di statement take talk.

translation.en: IBEDC warns traders under power lines
translation.pcm: IBEDC don carry give pipo wey dey sell under powerline

translation.en: The Ibadan Electricity Distribution Company (IBEDC) has warned against trading under high-tension wire to avoid disasters.
translation.pcm: Di Ibadan Electricity Distribution Company (IBEDC) don carry warnin out against to sell market under high-tension wire to avoid badness.

translation.en: Chief Operating Officer (COO), Engr John Ayodele, gave the charge against the backdrop of the increasing trading activities under high tension wires.
translation.pcm: Chief Operating Officer (COO) wey be Engr John Ayodele give di charge against di backdrop of di increasing tradin activities wey dey unde high-tension wire.

translation.en: In Osogbo, the Osun State capital, mechanic shops, block industries, car wash shops, POS shops and petty trading are common features sighted under high tension wires along Power Line and Ring roads.
translation.pcm: For inside Oshogbo, wey be capital of Osun state, mechanic shop, block industry, car wash shops, POS shops and smallsmall tradin be common things wey we see under high-tension wire along Power Line and Ring road.

translation.en: Engr Ayodele, therefore, pleaded with residents to take safety precautions as very important and advised those trading under high tension wires to move away to safe areas.
translation.pcm: Engr Ayodele don beg wit residents dem to take safety precautions dem veri important and advice pipo wey dey sell under high-tension wire to move to place wey dey safe.

translation.en: He also pleaded with residents not to engage quacks to fix power faults and assured that IBEDC technical crew would be available to rectify any fault that might arise.
translation.pcm: He also beg residents say make dem no call pipo wey no sabi to kom repair light and he assure dem say technical crew for IBEDC go dey available to rectify any fault wey kom.

translation.en: He cautioned those in the habit of harassing IBEDC staff while going about their lawful duties to desist, saying IBEDC would explore all available legal options to seek redress should any of its staff become a victim of harassment.
translation.pcm: He caution say pipo wey get habit of harassin IBEDC staff when dem dey do dem duty as di law take tok to stop am, he tok say IBEDC go explore all available legal options to take seek redress if dem harass any of im staff.

translation.en: He said, It is also important that other safety precautions such as proper supervision of children is ensured to prevent electrical accidents.
translation.pcm: He tok say, e also dey important say make dem dey take oda safety precaution, like make dem dey supervise childrem important, to take avoid eletrical accidents.

translation.en: 10 newborn babies die in Indian hospital fire
translation.pcm: 10 pikin dem wey dem just born don die for fire incident inside India hospital

translation.en: Ten newborn babies died on Saturday in a fire at a state-run hospital in western India, officials said.
translation.pcm: Ten new pikin dem die on Saturday for inside fire wey happen for hospital wey state dey run inside western Idia, as officials dem take tok.

translation.en: There were 17 infants in the unit for sick newborn babies when the fire broke out in the early hours of Saturday at the Bhandara District General Hospital in Maharashtra state.
translation.pcm: Na 17 new pikin dey di unit wey dem put pikin dem wey sick when di fire break for early Saturday for di Bhandara District General Hospital in Maharashtra state.

translation.en: Seven infants died due to smoke suffocation, and three from burn injuries, Maharashtra health minister Rajesh Tope told reporters.
translation.pcm: Seven new pikin die as smoke choke dem, and three die bikos fire burn dem, Maharashtra health minister Rajesh Tope told reporters.

translation.en: Seven babies were rescued by the nurses and ward staff.
translation.pcm: Nurses and ward staff dem rescue seven babies.

translation.en: All the infants were aged between a few days and three months, Bhandara district health official Prashant Uike said.
translation.pcm: Di age of all di new pikin dem na from few days to three months, as Prashant Uike wey be health district official for inside Bhandara tok.

translation.en: The government has ordered a probe into the incident and a safety audit of all neo-natal care units in the state.
translation.pcm: Di goment don order say make dem probe inside di incident and to do safety audit inside unit wey dem take care of new pkini for di kontri.

translation.en: Initial reports indicated that the fire may have been caused by a short circuit in one of the incubators, Tope said.
translation.pcm: Initial report don indicate say di fire fit don apun bkos of one of di short circuit wey dey inside one of di incubators, as Tope take tok.

translation.en: The staff said the ward quickly filled with lots of black smoke, the minister added.
translation.pcm: Di staff tok say plenty black smoke fill di ward quick quick , as di minister take add am.

translation.en: Legal requirements for a post-mortem had been waived and the bodies of the children handed to their families, Tope added.
translation.pcm: Dem don waive legal requirement for post-mortem, and dem don carry di children bodi give dem family, as Tope take tok.

translation.en: Families of the victims would be given compensation of 500,000 rupees (about 6,814 dollars) each.
translation.pcm: Family of di victim dem go get compensation of 500,000 rupees (wey reach 6,814 dollars) for each family.

translation.en: Police go after newspaper vendors over reports on IPOB
translation.pcm: Police don pursue pipo wey dey sell newspaper bikos of dem report on top IPOB

translation.en: Newspaper vendors and readers in Aba, the commercial hub of Abia State, are currently being harassed by the police.
translation.pcm: Police don dey harass pipo wey dey sell newspaer and pipo wey dey read am for inside Abia State.

translation.en: Daily Trust gathered since the weekend, policemen from the Aba Area Command  have been carrying out arrest of newspaper vendors and readers over reports on the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB).
translation.pcm: Daily Trust be get news say na since weekend police from Aba Area Command don dey arrest pipo wey dey sell newspaper and pipo wey dey read am concerning dem report on di Indigenous Pipo of Biafra (IPOB).

translation.en: Residents said there was tension at Ama-Ogbonna Junction in the commercial city when police raided the place on Sunday.
translation.pcm: Resident tok say fear be dey for Ama-Ogbonna Junction inside di commercial city when police raid di place on Sunday.

translation.en: An eyewitness said residents scampered for safety, as police officers shot sporadically, while trying to arrest a newspaper vendor and readers.
translation.pcm: One pesin wey di matter apun for im eye tok say residents dey run to safety, as police pipo dey shoot anyhow, when dem dey try to arrest pipo wey dey sell newspaper and pipo wey dey read am.

translation.en: The vendors were accused of distributing newspapers which had stories on the sit-at-home order by the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB).
translation.pcm: Dem accuse di pipo wey dey sell newspaper wey carry di tori wey contain di sit-at-home order wey di  Indigenous Pipo of Biafra (IPOB) give.

translation.en: Dr. Elendu Ukoh, one of the eyewitness, appealed to the state government and Igbo leaders to call the police authorities rein in on their men so as not to create crisis in the city.
translation.pcm: Dr. Elendu Ukoh, wey di matter apun for im eyes, beg di state goment and igbo leaders to call di police authority to call dem pipo make dem for no cause wahala for inside di city.

translation.en: The kind of people we put into police these days make me wonder if we really want anything good out of this country called Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di kind of pipo wey we dey put for police dey make me wonder f we want anything wey good to from dis kontri komot.

translation.en: How can someone be chasing newspaper vendors around in Aba, in this modern world?
translation.pcm: How pesin go dey pursue pipo wey dey sell newspaperfor Aba, inside di mordrn world?

translation.en: If you stop people from reading hard copies of newspapers, will you also stop them from reading the same stories on Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Telegram, among others?
translation.pcm: If you stop pipo say make dem no read hard copy of newspaper, shey you go still stop dem say make dem no read di same tori on top Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Telegram, plus oda pipo?

translation.en: What manner of primitive policing is this?
translation.pcm: Which kind old police style be dis?

translation.en: They caused panic on Sunday by their shooting and noisemaking.
translation.pcm: Dem cause panic on Sunday as dem dey shoot and make noise.

translation.en: The whole neighborhood thought that they were chasing kidnappers.
translation.pcm: Di whole neighborhood thingk say dem dey chase kidnappers.

translation.en: It was later that we discovered that police came to arrest a vendor and readers, who gathered in his newspaper stand.
translation.pcm: Na later dem discover say kom arrest one vendor and pipo wey dey read, weu gather for im newspaper stand.

translation.en: How can police be fighting newspaper vendors?
translation.pcm: How police go dey follow pipo wey dey sell newspaper fight?

translation.en: What manner of problem can paper cause that Social Media cannot cause 20 times over.
translation.pcm: Which kind problem paper fit kos wey social media no fit kos time 20.

translation.en: This people are not normal, he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say: dis pipo no normal.

translation.en: Michael Anorue, another resident, said almost all the vendor stands he visited in Aba
translation.pcm: Micheal Anorue wey be anoda resident tok say almost all di pipo wey dey sell newspaper wey im visit for Aba

translation.en: on Tuesday were empty.
translation.pcm: Dem dey empty for Tuesday.

translation.en: He said, We learnt they were saying on Saturday and Sunday that the newspapers had stories on the sit-at-home order in honour of Biafran heroes and my question is what is wrong with it?
translation.pcm: He tok say, we hear as dem dey tok for Saturday and Sunday say di newpaper dem carry tori wey concern di sit-at-hom order wey dem take honour hero for Biafra matter, and my question be say, wetin wrong with am?

translation.en: The early political leaders in South East, remind these reckless police officers that Biafra is bigger than IPOB the better for them.
translation.pcm: Di early political leaders dem for South East, dey remind dis reckless police officers say Biafra big pas IPOB, di better for dem.

translation.en: Does proscription of IPOB mean that Biafra has been proscribed too?
translation.pcm: Shey as dem proscribe IPOB mean say dem don proscribe Biafra too?

translation.en: We're all Biafrans!
translation.pcm: All of us na Biafra pipo.

translation.en: On the 30th of May, the World Igbo Congress (WIC) held a zoom conversation, talking about Biafran fallen heroes.
translation.pcm: On di 30th of May, do World Igbo Congress (WIC) hold zoom conversation, wehere dem dey tok about hero wey fall for Biafra.

translation.en: Why can't police go to YouTube, Zoom and other social media that aired it?
translation.pcm: Why police no go Youtube, Zoom and oda social media wey carry di matter for air?

translation.en: All they do is to come to streets and start looking for unnecessary trouble.
translation.pcm: All di thing wey dem do na to kom street and begin make trouble wey no necessary.

translation.en: I wish the leaders in Igboland will warn those reckless police officers not to allow what's happening in Imo State to enter Aba, because it will be worst for everybody.
translation.pcm: I wish say di leader for Igboland go warn dis reckless police officer dem make dem no allow wetin dey apun for inside Imo State to enter Aba, bikos e go worst for evribodi.

translation.en: SP Geoffrey Ogbonna, Abia State Police Public Relations Officer (PPRO), denied that the police arrested newspaper vendors and readers in Aba.
translation.pcm: SP Geoffrey Ogbonna, wey be Abia State Police Public Relations Officer (PPRO), deny say police dey arrest pipo wey dey sell newspaper and pipo wey dey read am.

translation.en: NAMA kicks as air traffic controllers lament poor tools
translation.pcm: NAMA dey frown face as air traffic controller dey lament poor tools

translation.en: Air Traffic Controllers (ATC) in Nigeria on Sunday cried out over dilapidated navigational equipment at most airports in the country.
translation.pcm: Air Traffic Controllers (ATC)) for Nigeria on Sunday cry out concernin di dilapitated navigational equipment wey dey for most airport inside di kontri.

translation.en: The ATCs under the aegis of the National Air Traffic Controllers Association (NATCA), said the situation posed a threat to air safety.
translation.pcm: Di ATCs wey dey under di National Air Traffic Controllers Association (NATCA) tok say di situation na threat for air safety.

translation.en: They also claimed that the Kaduna International Airport had no control tower which would aid safe aircraft navigation.
translation.pcm: Dem also tok say di International Airport wey dey for inside Kaduna o get control tower wey fit help aircraft to navigate without wahala.

translation.en: The President of NATCA, Yomi Agoro, in a chat with newsmen at the weekend, said what existed at the Kaduna airport was a watch room used by other aviation personnel and not a control tower exclusive for air traffic controllers.
translation.pcm: Yomi Agoro wey be President for NATCA or one chat with news pipo for di weekend, to say di thing wey dey for Kaduna airport na watchroom wey oda aviation personnel dey use, say no be control tower wey dey for only air traffic controllers.

translation.en: He also said other airports in the country lacked the necessary equipment for seamless navigation.
translation.pcm: E also tok say oda airport for di kontri no get di equipment wey dey necessary to take navigate without wahala.

translation.en: He explained that Some airports do not even have functioning equipment.
translation.pcm: He explain say some airport no even get equipment wey dey function.

translation.en: Even Kaduna does not have a control tower.
translation.pcm: Even Kaduna no get control tower.

translation.en: What they are using there is a watch room (for firefighters), which is not built for that purpose, and we have been calling on the government to do something.
translation.pcm: Wetin deym dey use dere na watch room (for firefighters), and no be dat purpose dem build am for, and we don dey call goment to do something.

translation.en: We go to Sokoto, once it rains today, controllers will go to look for umbrellas to sit at the control tower, and what is it, some of the control towers attached to the terminal buildings were ceded to FAAN, while those standing alone were with NAMA, but we have approached the two organisations.
translation.pcm: We enter Sokoto, if rain fall, controller go carry umbrella to sit for di control tower, and wetin apun, dem don seed some of di control tower wey dem attach to di terminal building give FAAN, while di one wey dey stand alone dey with NAMA, but we don follow di two organisations dem tok.

translation.en: We are still battling with terrestrial radio frequency, communication here and there.
translation.pcm: We all still follow terrestial radio frequency fight, communication here and there.

translation.en: Calabar is there; there is no airport you will go to today that you would say things are working 80 per cent.
translation.pcm: Calabar dey dere; no airport wey you fit go today wey you go fit tok say dey work up to 80 per cent.

translation.en: NAMA had recently employed and trained 40 new controllers, but NATCA said the number was too low to meet the shortfall.
translation.pcm: NAMA don employ and train 40 new controllers recently, but NATCA said di nomba dey too low to meet di shortfall.

translation.en: However, the Managing Director of the Nigerian Airspace Management Agency (NAMA), Capt Fola Akinkuotu, told Daily Trust that the claims were not true.
translation.pcm: However, di Managing Director of di Nigerian Airspace Management Agency (NAMA), Capt Fola Akinkuotu, tell Daily Trust say di claim dem no be true.

translation.en: He said the federal government had invested hugely in improving navigational aids and aiding safe flight operations.
translation.pcm: He tok say federal goment don put huge investment to take improve navigational aids and to take help safe flight operations.

translation.en: He said, It is mere politics.
translation.pcm: He said, It is mere politics. Im tok say na ordinary politics.

translation.en: The government has spent so much in the recent past in improving aviation infrastructure.
translation.pcm: Goment don spend plenty not too long to take improve aviation infrastructure.

translation.en: I am saying this not because I am the MD of NAMA.
translation.pcm: I no just dey tok dis thing bikos say I be MD for NAMA.

translation.en: If you want to hear the truth, my suggestion has always been, ask the people on the streets, ask the people in NAMA, they would tell you, they have never had it so good under this administration.
translation.pcm: If you wan hear di true tori, my suggestion always be say, ask pipo wey dey street, ask pipo for NAMA, dem go tell you, dem neva see good wey reach like dis under dis administration.

translation.en: It is painful that people would be talking this way.
translation.pcm: E dey painful say pipo go dey tok like dis.

translation.en: We never had a Category Three (CAT3), this government put two in place, two others are coming.
translation.pcm: We neva any Category Three (CAT3), dis goment don put two for ground, anoda two still dey come.

translation.en: Government has just spent N1.7bn on a mobile control tower.
translation.pcm: Goment don spend N1.7bn on top mobile control tower.

translation.en: Also there is an ongoing revitalisation of the safe tower.
translation.pcm: Also revitalisation of di safe tower sef dey ongoin.

translation.en: We are revamping the TRACON (Total Radar Coverage of Nigeria) system.
translation.pcm: We don dey reconstruct di TRACON (Total Radar Coverage of Nigeria) system.

translation.en: Other sectors should be jealous of us.
translation.pcm: Oda sector dem suppose dey jealous us.

translation.en: E-commerce in Nigeria: Legal framework, challenges and prospect
translation.pcm: E-commerce for Nigeria: Legal framework, challenges and prospect

translation.en: E-commerce refers to the use of communications technology particularly the internet to buy, sell and market goods and services to customers.
translation.pcm: E-commerce dey refer to di use of communication technology especially di internet to buy, sell and market goods and services to customers.

translation.en: The internet has brought about a fundamental shift in national economies that are isolated from each other by barriers to cross-border trade and investment, isolated by distance, time zone and languages and isolated by the national differences in government regulations.
translation.pcm: Di internet don bring fundamental shift enter economy dem wey no near each oda bikos of brier enter ross-border trade and investment, wey distance far, time zone and language and wey national goment regulation different.

translation.en: E-commerce equally fosters direct access to distant markets and promotes globalisation and commercial activities and blur many of the current distinctions between domestic and foreign companies to an extent that it becomes practically impossible to determine the origin of the products.
translation.pcm: E-commerce dey foster direct access to market wey no near and e dey promote globalisation and commercial activities plus e dey komot distinction between domestic and foreign companies to di extent wey e no go possible to know wia di product from kom.

translation.en: E-commerce is not limited to the purchase of a product, it includes e-mail, and other communications platforms, all information or services that a company may offer to customers over the net, from pre-purchase information to aftersale service and support.
translation.pcm: E-commerce no dey limited to buying of product alone, e include e-mail, plus oda communication platform dem, all di informate or service wey company fit offer customer on top net, from pre-purchase information to aftasale service and support.

translation.en: The major significance of E-commerce thus lies in the fact that it encourages a single world trading system, which is facilitated by access through electronic means to goods and services from different parts of the world.
translation.pcm: Di major significance wey e commerce get dey for di fact say e dey encourage system of tradin wey be single world, wey access through electronic means to take get good and services dem dey facilitate from different parts of di world.

translation.en: Most of the existing statues in Nigeria lag behind towards the development and growth of e-commerce in particular and ICT as a whole.
translation.pcm: Most of di statue wey dey for ground for inside nigeria dey lag behind toward di development and growth of e-commerce in particular and di whole ICT.

translation.en: So many legal researches and studies on e-commerce in Nigeria have been conducted.
translation.pcm: For Nigeria, plenty legal research and study don dey conducted.

translation.en: Most of these studies are of the opinion that the Nigerian legal system lags behind ICT-based legislation and that the existing statutory laws are quite inadequate to address some of the legal issues affecting e-commerce.
translation.pcm: Plenty for inside di study dem carry opinion say di legal system for Nigeria ey lag behind for legislation wey involve ICT and say di statutory law dem wey don dey ground no dey adequate to take address some of di legal issue wey dey affect e-commerce.

translation.en: These issues include electronic evidence cybercrimes, security and data production, e-payment system and inevitably trans-border issues, and many more.
translation.pcm: Dis issue dem include electronic evidence cybercrimes, security and data production, e-payment system and inevitably trans-border issues, plus plenty oda ones.

translation.en: There is, therefore, the need to map out appropriate legal and regulatory measures, to govern the emerging regime.
translation.pcm: Therefore, need dey to bring out legal and regulatory measure wey dey proper, to take govern di regime wey just dey kom.

translation.en: It has been stated severally that in Nigeria, significant efforts at the regulation of e-commerce-related activities are still at the stage of Draft Bills before the National Assembly.
translation.pcm: Dem don tok plenty times say for inside Nigeria, significant effort to take regulate e-commerce-related activity demstill dey di stage of Sraft Bill before di National Assembly.

translation.en: It is important to note that, even where these bills are passed into law, Nigeria may still face new legal issues in this area that will call for legislative intervention.
translation.pcm: E dey important to know say, even wia dem pass dis bill into law, Nigeria fit still face new legal issue for dis area wey go call for legislative intervention.

translation.en: Given the speed with which the internet is permeating commercial transactions in Nigeria, especially in the banking and telecommunications sectors of the economy, the best that can be suggested is that the legal issues and problems presently confronting e-commerce in the country should be addressed directly and expeditiously, in the interests of the teeming population of Nigerian consumers.
translation.pcm: Wit di speed wey di internet dey take work on top commercial transaction for Nigeria, especially for inside banking and communication sector of di economy, di best wey dem fit suggest be say di legal issues and problems dem wey dey confront e-commerce presently for di kontri should be addressed directly and espeditiously, for di interest of di teeming population of Nigeria customer dem.

translation.en: To achieve this, the National Assembly should be pressuriSed into passing bills concerning electronic commerce, a top priority so that they can be enacted into law as quickly as possible.
translation.pcm: To achieve dis, make dem pressure di National Assembly to take pass bill concerning electronic commerce as top priority so dat dem go enact dem into law as quick as possible.

translation.en: In the interim, our courts should take a giant stride by interpreting the existing traditional laws liberally so as to bridge the gaps therein in order to make such laws amenable to electronic transactions, particularly in the emerging trend of the present-day information age.
translation.pcm: For small time, make awa court take giant step to interprete di traditional law dem wey dey ground in a liberal way make dem take cut gap in order to make di laws dem get ammend to electronic transaction, particularly for di emerging trend of dis information age wey we dey.

translation.en: Indeed, it was argued that legislation is not the only means by which electronic transaction and attendant documentation may be facilitated legally.
translation.pcm: Indeed, dem argue say legislation no be di only means wey electronic transaction and attendant documentation fit dey legal.

translation.en: The courts may also adapt to recognise electronic transactions in the absence of legislation or private contract.
translation.pcm: Di court fit also adapt to recognise electronic transaction for di absence of legislation or private contract.

translation.en: As the then Justice Bingham once put it thus:  the common law has in the hands of judges the same facility [as the law merchant] for adapting itself to the changing needs of the general public; principles do not  alter, but old rules of applying the change, and new rules spring into existence.
translation.pcm: As former Justice Bungham don tok am before: di common law dey di hand of judges di same kind facility [as law merchant dem] make e fit adapt to di need of di general public, principle no dey alter, but old rules to dey apply di change, and new rules go begin exist.

translation.en: It is hoped that this judicial activism would be adopted by other Nigerian judges, Supreme Court justices inclusive, especially in the areas where our existing legislation are grossly inadequate, comprehensive or elaborate enough to address legal challenges of the emerging technological advancements.
translation.pcm: We dey hope say goment go adopt dis activism wey Nigerian judges de do for inside judiciary, Supreme Court judges sef dey involve, expexially for area wia awa existin legislation dey grossly inadequate, comprehensive or elaborate enough to take address legal challenges for inside new technological advancements.

translation.en: This will certainly set a good precedence to ensure the protection of e-commerce consumers, entice investors and above all bring about economic development and sustainability in the country.
translation.pcm: Dis one go set better precedence to make sure say e-commerce consumer dem get protection, to bring investor dem and bring economic development plus stability inside di kontri.

translation.en: The germane issues with regards to contracts in E-commerce are documentation and signature.
translation.pcm: Di koko issue for contract inside e-commerce na documentation and signature.

translation.en: The provision of section 4 of the Statute of Fraud, 1677 or Lagos State Law Reform (Contract) Law and our various statutes on real property and landed instruments, all of which require certain contracts to be in writing and be duly executed .The
translation.pcm: Di provision for inside section 4 of di statute of Fraud, 1677 or  Lagos State Law Reform (Contract) Law and awa various statute on real property and landed instrument dem, all of which require make dem write certain contract dem and execute dem duly.

translation.en: question then is would an electronic mark or sign constitute a valid sign-off of a contract by email and be binding?
translation.pcm: Di question now be say shey electronic sign-off dey constitute valid sign-off contract by email or by binding?

translation.en: Many of these issues are still not quite settled even in the UK although some  decisions incline favourably towards interpreting electronic signature
translation.pcm: Dem still neva settle many of dis issues dem even for inside UK although some decision dey favour toward to interprete electronic signature

translation.en: so marks in emails as satisfying the traditional requirement of writing and due execution.
translation.pcm: So marks for inside email wey ey satisfy di tradional requirement of writing and due execusion.

translation.en: E-commerce transactions are paperless transactions made through magnetic materials such as tapes or disks.
translation.pcm: E-commerce transaction na transaction wey no involve paper wey dem dey do through magnetic material like tapes or disk.

translation.en: These are in contradistinction to the paper-based transactions that are embodied in a permanent form and typically expressed in words and figures usually authenticated by signatures.
translation.pcm: Dis one dem be contradiction to di transaction wey be say na paper dem dey take do am wey dey embodied for permanent form and typically expressed in words and figures wey dem dey use signature authenticate.

translation.en: Such transactions can therefore not be altered without an alteration on the face of the document.
translation.pcm: Dem no fit alter dat kind transaction without say dem alter di face of di document.

translation.en: With respect to signatures, by the provision of section 93(2)(3), evidence act 2011, an electronic signature in relation to a data message conveniently satisfies any requirement for a handwritten signature in so far as it sufficiently identifies an electronic record to the individual.
translation.pcm: As e concern signature, di provision for inide section 93 (2)(3), evidence act 2011, electronic signature wey relate to data message go conveniently satisfy any requirement for signature wey dem take hand sign as long as say e dey sufficient to take identify an electronic record to di person.

translation.en: The provision of article 7 of the United Nations Commission on International Trade Law (UNCITRAL) model law on e-commerce 1996 is equally trite on this issue.
translation.pcm: Di  provision for inside article 7 of di United Nations Commission on International Trade Law (UNCITRAL) model law for e-commerce 1996 dey equally trite on top dis issue.

translation.en: Thus, for the purpose of establishing proof of electronic signatures.
translation.pcm: Thus, for di purpose of establishing proof of electronic signatures.

translation.en: The use of a password, identification, user names etc may suffice.
translation.pcm: To dey use password, identification, user names etc fit suffice.

translation.en: Hence one may safely posit that electronic signatures for the purpose of execution are admissible in evidence provided it is certified and incorporated in an electronic communication in the course of an e-transaction.
translation.pcm: Hence one fit safely tok say electronic signature for purpose of execution dey admissible for evidence provided say dem certify and incorporate am for electronic communication during any e-transaction.

translation.en: Also, other legal challenges affecting e-commerce include the formation of contracts.
translation.pcm: Also, oda legal challenge dem wey dey affect e-commerce include di formation of contracts.

translation.en: The element for a valid formation of contract includes an offer, acceptance, consideration, intention to enter into legal relation.
translation.pcm: Di element for better formation of contract include offer, acceptance, consideration, intention to enter inside legal relation.

translation.en: The question is at what point can an offer be made with regards to an electronic business transaction or how to differentiate between invitation to treat and offer an electronic transaction, at what point can it be said that an intention to enter legal relation is made?
translation.pcm: Di question be say, for which point dem fit make offer wit regard to electronic business transaction or now to differentiate between invitation to treat and offer electronic transaction, at which point we fit tok say dem make intention to enter legal relation?

translation.en: E-commerce requires confidence and trust the satisfaction that transmitted orders or invoices have not been altered and emanate from whoever they appear to be from.
translation.pcm: E-commerce require confidence and trust di satisfaction wey dey transmit order or invoice neva get any matter and e dey kom from whoever e appear to kom from.

translation.en: There is a need for a guaranteed level of privacy /confidentiality with respect to information.
translation.pcm: Need dey for guarantee concerning level of privacy/confidenciality for information matter.

translation.en: Lastly, the alarming rate of cybercrimes in Nigeria, high level of illiteracy.
translation.pcm: Lastly, di alarming rate of cybercrime for inside Nigeria, plus high level of illiterate.

translation.en: Electronic commerce is no doubt an aspect of commercial transaction in Nigeria and it has come to stay in this time.
translation.pcm: No doubt say electronic transaction na aspect of commercial transaction for Nigeria and e don kom to stay dis time.

translation.en: The government should go beyond creating laws, to activate utilisation of the electronic delivery platforms in its commercial interactions and for delivery of government services.
translation.pcm: Make di goment go pass to dey make law, make dem activate as dem go take dey use di electronic platform for dem commercial interaction and for delivery of goment service.

translation.en: Chad passes new charter naming Deby's son president
translation.pcm: Chad don pass new chartes as dem call Deby son president

translation.en: Chad has passed a charter declaring Mahamat Idriss Deby president, despite rumours of his death trending on social media.
translation.pcm: Chad don pass charter wey declare Mahamat Idris Deby as President, even as rumour dey social media say he don die.

translation.en: Mahamat takes over in place of his father, Idriss Deby, who was killed this week.
translation.pcm: Mahamat don take over to take replace im papa, Idriss deby wey dem kill dis week.

translation.en: The charter said the 37-year-old son of the late war veteran, who on Tuesday was swiftly named transitional leader as head of a military council following his father's death, will occupy the functions of the president of the republic and also serve as head of the armed forces.
translation.pcm: Di charter tok say di 37-year old wey be son to late war veteran, na im dem name transitional leader quick quick on Tuesday as head for military council afta im papa death, e go dey do work of president for di republic and head of di armed forces dem.

translation.en: The charter repeals the preceding constitution and will be implemented as the basic law of the republic, according to its terms.
translation.pcm: Di charter repeal di preceding constitution and dem go implement am as di basic law of di republic, according to di temrs wey dey inside am.

translation.en: The younger Deby has also been named supreme head of the armed forces, it said.
translation.pcm: Dem also don name di young Deby as supreme head for armed forces, as e tok.

translation.en: Deby's son had overseen his father's security as head of the elite presidential guard and had often appeared alongside him.
translation.pcm: Deby son don oversee di security of im papa when im be head of di elite presidential guard and he dey appear along wit im papa often.

translation.en: Mahamat Deby is best known as a top commander of the Chadian forces assisting a United Nations peacekeeping mission in the restive north of neighbouring Mali.
translation.pcm: Di best wey dem take know Mahamat Deby na as top commander of di forces inside Chad wey dey help United Nation peacekeeping mission for inside di restive north of neighbouring Mali.

translation.en: He signed a decree Tuesday setting out a military council with 15 generals, including himself and 14 others known to have been part of the late president's circle of loyalists.
translation.pcm: Im sign one decree for Tuesday as he set out one military council wey get 15 generals dem, including imsef and 14 odas wey dem know say dey loyal to late president.

translation.en: The council is tasked with an 18-month transition toward free and democratic elections.
translation.pcm: Di task wey dem give di council na to move enter free and democractic election withing 18 months.

translation.en: Mahamat Idriss Deby also chairs the military transition council, the council of ministers, the councils and superior committees of national defence, according to the charter.
translation.pcm: Mahamat Idris Deby na chair for di military transition council, di council of ministers, di counil of superior committees of national defence, as di charter take tok.

translation.en: The new head of state will promulgate legislation adopted by the 69 members of the national transition council, who are named directly by Mahamat.
translation.pcm: Di new head of state go dey declare legislation wey di 69 members of di national transition council adopt, wey Mahamat name directly.

translation.en: The Transition Charter, which contains 95 articles, also guarantees freedom of opinion, conscience and worship.
translation.pcm: Di Transition Charter wey get 95 articles, e also guarantee freedom of opinion, conscience plus worship.

translation.en: A transition government has been set up, whose members are named by the new president.
translation.pcm: Dem don set transition goment, wey di new president go name di members.

translation.en: The members of the army who are called to the transition government are discharged from all military duties, the charter said.
translation.pcm: Di charter tok say dem don free all member of army wey dem call to di transitional goment from all military work.

translation.en: Chadian law
translation.pcm: Law for Chad

translation.en: The slain leader, who ruled with an iron fist for nearly 30 years, succumbed to wounds suffered during a visit to the battlefield in the country's north where Chadian soldiers fought against a rebel group, the military announced on Tuesday.
translation.pcm: Di leader wey dem kill, im rule wit strong hand for lmost 30 years, he give to wound wey im get wen im visit battlefield wia Chad soldier dem dey fight rebel group for di north, as di military announce for Tuesday.

translation.en: Calling for calm, the army also announced a 6pm curfew and shut the country's borders, while suspending the constitution and dissolving the National Assembly.
translation.pcm: Calling for calm, di army also announce curfew for 6pm and dem close di border for di kontri, as dem suspend di constitution and dissolve National Assembly.

translation.en: However,  opposition politicians in Chad have rejected the army's appointment of President Idriss Dby's son to take over in the wake of his death.
translation.pcm: However, politician wey be opposition for inside chad don reject di army appointment of President Idris deby's son to take over fter im papa die.

translation.en: Experts say that under Chadian law, the speaker of parliament should have taken power after Deby;s death and not his son.
translation.pcm: Expert dem tok say under di law for inside Chad, di speaker of parliament suppose don kolekt power aftr Deby die, no be im son.

translation.en: What the constitution says is that in the absence of the president or in case he dies, then the speaker of the parliament takes charge of the country for 40 days and so a transition is put in place until elections are held, Al Jazeera's Hiba Morgan, reporting from the capital, Ndjamena, said earlier on Tuesday.
translation.pcm: Wetin di constitution tok be say if di president n dey abi e die, then di speaker of di parliament go take charge of di kontri for 40 days and so dem go put transition in place until dem do election, Hiba Morgan wey dey Al Jazeera dey report from capital, Ndjamena tok for ealy Tuesday.

translation.en: [But] the military announced that the legislative assembly has been dissolved and that the constitution also has been dissolved, so what they are doing is that they replaced the constitution with their own set of rules.
translation.pcm: [But] di military announce ay dem don dissolve di legislative assembly and dem don dissolve di constitution, so wetin dem do be say dem replace di constitution wit dem own set of rules.

translation.en: Chelsea face possible points deduction after brawl with Leicester
translation.pcm: Dem fit komot Chelsea points afta di brawl wit Leicester

translation.en: Chelsea are facing possible points deduction by he FA for the team's failure to control their players, Mirror reports.
translation.pcm: Chelsea dey face deduction of point from FA for di team as dem fail to kontrol dem players, as Mirror report.

translation.en: In seven years, the team have been found pants down in seven hot-tempered rows with opponents.
translation.pcm: Inside seven years, dem don catch di team dey show hot temper to opponents seven times.

translation.en: The recent brawl during a clash on Tuesday night with Leicester marked the  seventh encounter Chelsea had with Premier League teams.
translation.pcm: Di recent brawl for inside one match on Tuesday night Leicester mark di seven encounter wey Chelsea get wit Premier League teams.

translation.en: Last week match between Chelsea and Leicester was marred by skirmishes between the players of both teams.
translation.pcm: Na katakata mark di match wey apun last week between Chelsea and Leicester among players of both teams.

translation.en: Citing similar offenses in the past, the FA decided to punish Chelsea.
translation.pcm: Wit di same kind of offence for di past, di FA decide say dem go punish Chelsea.

translation.en: Leicester have also been charged for their role in the brawl that involved players and coaching staff following Ricardo Pereira's challenge on Ben Chilwell.
translation.pcm: Leicester sef dey face charges for dem role inside di brawl wey involve players and coaches as Ricardo Pereira take challenge Ben Chilwell.

translation.en: In 2016, Chelsea were also charged for indiscipline that they had to be warned, after appealing against 375,000 dollar levy for their part in  a mass bust-up during a match against Tottenham.
translation.pcm: For 2016, dem also charge Chelsea for indiscipline wey make dem warn dem, afta dem appeal against 375,000 dollar fine for di part wey dem play for one burst-up during match against Tottenham.

translation.en: If affected, the points deduction will significantly affect their season as they head into a final campaign for a top four spot.
translation.pcm: If e affect dem, di point wey dem go komot go affect dem season very well as dem dey enter final campaign to take get spot for top four.

translation.en: US Africom in Nigeria? Heck No!
translation.pcm: US Africom for Nigeria? Heck No!

translation.en: Overpaid, oversexed and over here.
translation.pcm: Overpaid, oversexed and over here.

translation.en: That was the resentful and contemptuous opinion many British people came to have of the thousands of American GIs stationed in several military bases in Britain during the Second World War.
translation.pcm: Dat na di resentful and contemptuous opinion many British pipo get for di thousands of American GIs wey station for inside several military bases for Britain durin di Secon World War.

translation.en: The gum-chewing, brash, hard-drinking and womanising American soldiers frequently got into pub brawls and dangerous knife fights which built up a feeling of disdain for the yanks among the locals.
translation.pcm: Di gum-chewing, brash, hard-drinking and womanising  soldier dem wey from America comedey frequently get into pub fight and knife fight weu dey dangerous wey dey kos bad feeling for di yanks among di locals.

translation.en: And this has been the pattern of behaviour among American soldiers everywhere in the hundreds of American military bases overseas from Okinawa in Japan, Stuttgart in Germany, Incirlik and Diyarbakir in Turkey and Pampanga in the Philippines.
translation.pcm: And dis don be di pattern wey America soldiers dem dey take behave evriwia for di hundred of America military base oversea from Okinawa for inside Japan, Stuttgart inside Germany, Incirlik and Diyarbakir for Turkey and Pampanga inside  Philippines.

translation.en: That is why I am perturbed, like many Nigerians, that in a virtual meeting last week with the Secretary of State of the United States of America, Antony Blinken, President Buhari was reported to have asked that the United States considers relocating the African Command (Africom) of its military presently based in the southern German city of Stuttgart to Africa.
translation.pcm: Na why i dey upset, like plenty Nigeria pipo, say na for virtual meetin last week wit di di Secretary of State of di United States of America, Antony Blinken, na dem report say president Buhari ask United States to consider as dem go take relocate di African Command (Africom) of im military wey dey for Stuttgart for inside southern German city of presently kom Africa.

translation.en: It is presumed that with this call, President Buhari is making a pitch for Nigeria to host Africom.
translation.pcm: We dey thingk am say wit dis kin call, president Buhari dey make way for Nigeria to host Africom.

translation.en: In the first place, it was a breach of protocol for President Buhari to hold that meeting with the American Secretary of State.
translation.pcm: For di first place, na breach of protocol for  President Buhari to do dat meeting wit di American Secretary of State.

translation.en: The meeting should have been with Blinken's Nigerian opposite number, Geoffrey Onyeama, who would then transmit the details afterwards to the president.
translation.pcm: Dem suppose do di meetin wit Blinken's Nigerian opposite number, Geoffrey Onyeama, who o kom carri di detail go meet president later.

translation.en: Yes, America is a superpower and all that, but protocol is protocol and should be followed strictly in all circumstances.
translation.pcm: Yes, America na superpower and all, but protocol na protocol and dem soppose follow am strictly  for evri circumstance.

translation.en: Understandably, Nigeria is currently faced with gargantuan internal insecurity issues which seem to defy the best efforts of government and the nation's security establishment in tackling it.
translation.pcm: We understand say Nigeria dey face big internal security wahala wey be like say e pass di best effort wey goment and security establishment for inside di nation dey make to take tackle am.

translation.en: Unrelenting terrorist insurgency in the North East, banditry, kidnapping in the North West, farmers/herders clashes all over the country and the targeted killing of security and law enforcement personnel and other Nigerians coupled with the destruction of institutional buildings in the South East, constitute the cocktail of insecurity now ravaging the country.
translation.pcm: Terrorist insurgency wey no dey tire for di North East banditry, kidnapping inside di North West, farmers/herders clash dem all over di kontri and as dem dey target and kill security and law enforcement personnel dem and oda Nigeria pipo plus di destruction of institutional building for di South East, na dem join take be di cokctail of insecurity wey don dey ravage di kontri.

translation.en: But even at that, the call for the hosting of the Africom on Nigerian soil when considered against the various issues and implications of this move to Nigeria is hardly justified.
translation.pcm: But even at that, di call to take host Africom on top Nigeria siol when we consider m against various issues and implications of dis move to Nigeria difficult to justify.

translation.en: Africom is one of nine such commands by the American military establishment to exclusively serve American strategic interests around the world.
translation.pcm: Africom na one amng nine of dat kind command wey di America military establish say make e dey serve America strategic interest around di world.

translation.en: By their doctrine and operational modus, these commands, particularly those outside America like Africom, are not set up primarily to concern themselves with the security and law enforcement issues of their area of coverage.
translation.pcm: By dem rule and way of operation, dis commands, particularly di ones wey dey outside America like Africom, dem no set dem up primarily to concern demselves wit security and law enforcement issuefor dem area of coverage.

translation.en: They only do so when such issues directly affect American interests in the area and in such situations, they are not mandated to yield their modus operandi and share intelligence with the local security and law enforcement agencies.
translation.pcm: Dem only do so when such issue dey affect di interest of America directly for di area and for such situation, dem no dey mandated to yield dem modus operandi and share intelligence wit di local security and law enforcement agancy dem

translation.en: If Africom is set up in Nigeria for instance, it will be an island of its own restricting access to Nigerians of all categories and establishing a jurisdiction within the territorial area of the base that will be virtually off limits to Nigerian security and law enforcement agencies.
translation.pcm: If dem set Africom up for Nigeria for instance, e go be island on im ownas e go restrict access to Nigerians of all category and establishing a jurisdiction withing di teritorial area of di base wey go dey virtually off limit to Nigerian security and law enforcement agancy dem.

translation.en: As it always happens with American military bases outside America, Africom will be a forward operating base for disruptive intelligence operations and source of acts of sabotage and destabilisation against the host country.
translation.pcm: As e dey always apun wit America military base wey dey outside America, Africom go be forward operating base for disruptive intelligence operations and e go source for act of sabotage and destabilisation against host kontri.

translation.en: In the particular case of Africom, part of its original concept was actually to contain the growing strategic influence of Nigeria in West Africa and Africa following our successful peace enforcement efforts in Liberia and Sierra Leone and our sterling records of peace keeping around the world.
translation.pcm: For dis particular case of Africom, part of im original concept na to kontrol as di strategic influence of Nigeria dey grow for West Africa and Africa as we get successful peace enforecement efforts for Liberia and Sierra Leone and awa beta record of peace keepin around di world.

translation.en: Africom's precursor was the Africa Crisis Response Initiative (ACRI) set up by the Clinton administration to counter Nigeria's strategic interests in Africa.
translation.pcm: Di one wey dey before Africom na di Africa Crisis Response Initiative (ACRI) wey di Clinton administration set up to take counter di strategic interest of Nigeria for inside Africa.

translation.en: President Clinton's Secretary of State, the dour-faced California attorney, Warren Christopher, made many secret and open visits to a number of African countries to sell the idea.
translation.pcm: Di Secretary of State for president Clinton, di dour-faced California attorney, Warren Christopher, be visit a nomba of African countries secretly to sell di idea.

translation.en: But because Nigeria was the target, he pointedly left it out from his itinerary.
translation.pcm: But bikos Nigeria na di target, he pointedly komot am from im itinerary.

translation.en: Senegal, which is not far from Liberia and Sierra Leone, was to be the coordinating base of the ACRI and though it was touted as an initiative to facilitate American assistance to African humanitarian issues, its secret protocols were unmistakably military and strategically targeted at Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Senegal, wey no far from Liberia and Sierra Leone, na im suppose be di coordinating base of di ACRI and though dem see am initiative to facilitate assistance of America to African humanitarian issues, im secret protocol dem mistake for military and dem target Nigeria strategically.

translation.en: Due mainly to undisguised hostility to the idea from France, which was averse to seeing the Americans trying to butt into an area it considers its exclusive sphere of influence, the ACRI concept was reviewed.
translation.pcm: Due mainly to undisguised hostility to di idea from France, which was averse to seeing di Americans trying to butt into an area it considers its exclusive sphere of influence, dem review di concept of di ACRI.

translation.en: In the review, which drew the expertise of American military, intelligence, political and academic personalities and institutions midwifed by the American congress in secret sessions, the Americans considered and realised the need to set up an African command to add to the other commands already in place covering the various continents of the world.
translation.pcm: For di review, wey draw di expertise of america Military, intelligence, political and academic personalities and institutions wey di America congress carry kom for dem secret sessions, di Americans dem consider and realise di need to set up one AFrican command to add to di oda command wey don dey already and dey cover oda continent for inside di world.

translation.en: Thus based on recommendations of these assemblage of experts drawn from all facets of American political and security establishments, Africom was set up by the Bush Junior administration with a wider mandate not just to contain Nigeria but also to keep an eye on the growing Chinese strategic penetration of Africa.
translation.pcm: Thus, to follow on di reccomendation of experts wey gather, wey dem kom form all angle of political and security establishments for inside America, na di Bush Junior administration set Africom up wit mandate wey wide pass to contain Nigeria but also to keep eye on top di strategic penetration wey Chinese pipo dey do for inside Africa.

translation.en: Africom will be to Africa what US Central Command (USCENTCOM), based in Florida, is to the Middle East and Asia, European Command (EUCOM), based in Stuttgart, Germany, is to Europe and Southern Command (SOUTHCOM), also based in Florida, is to Latin America and the Caribbean.
translation.pcm: Na as US Central Command (USCENTCOM) take be to Middle East and Asia, na so Africom go be to Africa, as e base for Florida, European Command (EUCOM), as e base for Stuttgart, Germany, is to Europe and Southern Command (SOUTHCOM), also based in Florida, is to Latin America and di Caribbean.

translation.en: Nigeria is already surrounded by French military presence in Niger, Cameroon, Chad, and Benin.
translation.pcm: Di presence of French military don surround Nigeria already as dem dey for Niger, Cameroun, Chad and Benin.

translation.en: The Americans also have a drone base in Niger.
translation.pcm: Di America pipo also get drone base for inside Niger.

translation.en: Adding Africom to the mix in Nigeria will amount to a complete capitulation of our strategic interest to both France and America.
translation.pcm: To add Africom to di mix for inside Nigeria go amount to a complete capitulation of awa strategic interest to both France and America.

translation.en: Bearing in mind that our strategic interests and profile in Africa do not always cohere with those of France and America, the hosting of Africom in Nigeria will be the equivalent of letting in the wolf into the chicken coop.
translation.pcm: As we get am for mind say awa strategic interest plus profile for Africa no dey always follow wit di one for France and America, to host Africom for Nigeria go be di same thing like make we allow wolf enter chicken cage.

translation.en: There is nothing in the present insecurity challenges facing the country that our armed forces cannot cope with.
translation.pcm: Notin dey inside di insecurity cahllenge wey dey face di kontri wey awa armed forces no fit cope wit.

translation.en: This is after all the military force that eventually secured Liberia and Sierra Leone against a well-entrenched and organised army of insurgents in those countries from a long logistical supply line thousands of miles; the army of Joshua Dogonyaro, Victor Malu and Maxwell Khobe, to mention but a few of the many gallant Nigerian soldiers who distinguished themselves in those operations.
translation.pcm: Dis one na afta di military force wey eventually secure Liberia and Seirra Leone against army of insurgents wey dey well-entrenched and organised for inside di kontri dem from a long logistical supply line thousands of mile;  di army of Joshua Dogonyaro, Victor Malu and Maxwell Khobe, to mention few of di plenty gallant Nigeria soldier wey distinguish demsef for di operation dem.

translation.en: It is regrettable that the military of Nigeria, having fallen from the high standards known of it, is struggling now to cope with the activities of non-state actors internally.
translation.pcm: E dey regretable say di Nigeria military, don fall from high standard wey dem take know dem, dem dey struggle now to cope wit di activity of non-state actors internally.

translation.en: But intrinsically and essentially, the Nigerian military retains the capacity and capability to defeat these threats to our national security given the right leadership, doctrine and motivation.
translation.pcm: But intrinsically and essentially, di military for Nigeria still carry di capacity and capability to defeat dis threat to awa nationl security if dem get di correct leadership, doctrine plus motivation.

translation.en: We need all the assistance and cooperation that the Americans can give us if they are so willing.
translation.pcm: We need all di assistance and coopration wey di America pipo fit give us if dem wan give us.

translation.en: But despite our circumstances be arm-twisted into hosting the Africom in view of its antecedents and implications to our strategic interests, on our soil.
translation.pcm: But as dem don hold us for hand to take host Africom with awa circumstance in view of im antecedent and implication to awa strategic interest, for awa soil.

translation.en: Despite challenges, Plateau targets 7m metric tons of Irish potato
translation.pcm: Upon say dem dey face challenge, Plateau target 7m metric tons of Irish potato

translation.en: Plateau State is Nigeria's number one grower of Irish potato with the tuber currently produced in nine of the state's 17 local government areas.
translation.pcm: For Nigeria, na Plateau state be nomba one wey dey plant Irish potato as dem dey produce am for nine of di 17 local goment area wey dey di state.

translation.en: The Potato Value Chain Support Project of the African Development Bank (AfDB) initiative pegs Plateau as accounting for 90 per cent of the potato production in the country with countries like Chad, Ghana, Niger, Benin among others receiving large supplies of potato from Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di Potato Value Chain Support Project of di African Development Bank (AfDB)initiative don Plateau as state wey get 90 per cent of di potato production for inside di kontri as kontri like Chad, Ghana, Niger, Benin and oda ones dey get large supply of potato from Nigeria.

translation.en: The large potato production from Plateau State, according to PotatoPRO.com, a leading information source for the global potato industry, has made Nigeria the fourth biggest producer in sub-Saharan Africa.
translation.pcm: Di large potato production for inside Plateau State, according to PotatoPRO.com, wey be leading source for informate for global potato industry, don make Nigeria di nomba four big kontri for inside sub-sahara Africa.

translation.en: However, farmers say inadequate dams and road networks, and high cost of fertilizer and other farming inputs continue to pose a major setback in the production of sufficient potatoes for the nation and for export.
translation.pcm: However, farmer dem tok say dam wey no good reach and bad road network, plus as di cost of fertilizer and oda farmin input kontinu to dey stand as major setback for di production of potatoes for inside di nation and to export.

translation.en: Other challenges contributing to low yields and harvest losses to the potato value chain include diseases such as blight and bacterial wilt as well as poor seedlings.
translation.pcm: Oda challenge wey dey contribute to low yield and loss for harvest to di potato value chain include disease like blight and bacterial wilt, plus poor seedlings.

translation.en: According to the National Bureau of Statistics, Plateau State is among the 10 poorest states in Nigeria with over 70% poverty rate.
translation.pcm: According to di National Bureau of Statistics, Plateau State dey among di ten poorest state for Nigeria as dem poverty rate pass 70%.

translation.en: The state, however, has a comparative advantage to boost economic activities by improving the competitiveness of the potato commodity value chain.
translation.pcm: However, di state get comparative advange to take boost economic activities by improving di competitiveness of di potato commodity value chain.

translation.en: The Project Coordinator for the Potato Value Chain Support Project, Thomas Muopshin, said though the viability of the tuber crop is evident in nine local government areas of Plateau, Bokkos and Mangu LGAs are the state's potato hub.
translation.pcm: Di project Coordinator  for di Potato value Chain Support Project, Thomas Muopshin, tok say though di visibility of di tuber crop dey evident for nine local goment area inside Plateau, Na Bokkos and Mangu LGAs be di hub for potato.

translation.en: They produce more potatoes than any LGA in the country.
translation.pcm: Na dem dey produce potato pass any LGA fir di kontri.

translation.en: Muopshin, however, said adaptability research indicates that the state's remaining eight LGAs are equally viable to produce potato; making all of Plateau's 17 LGA potentials to produce the tuber, especially during the dry season.
translation.pcm: However, Muopshin tok say adaptability research indicate say di remainin eight LGA for inside di state also fit plant potato, dat one go make all 17 LGA wey dey for Plateau fit produce tuber, especially for inside dry season.

translation.en: The Association of Potato Farmers (APF) in the state, however, says unless challenges affecting the value chain are addressed squarely, increased production and export in potato would continue to elude the nation.
translation.pcm: However, di Association of Potato Farmers (APF) for inside di state, tok say unless dem address di challenge wey dey face di value chain, increase production and export of potato go continue to pass di national.

translation.en: Plateau State Chairman of APF, Lazarus Makut, in an interview with Daily Trust, said inadequate smaller dams, especially in remote areas where potato farming is viable as well as poor roads and high cost of farm inputs, continue to affect potato outputs.
translation.pcm: Chairman of APF for inside Plateau state, Lazarus Makut, for one interview wey he do wit daily Trust, tok say di inadequate small dam, especially for remote area wia dem dey plant potato, and bad road plus high cost of farm input kontinu to dey affect potato output.

translation.en: He said the cost of mechanised farming which could rapidly increase productivity has become expensive with the majority of farmers who are small scale producers unable to afford mechanization.
translation.pcm: He tok say di cost of mechanised farmin wey fit increase production quick quick don dey expensive as di majority of farmers na small scale producer wey dey unable to afford mechanization.

translation.en: Another farmer, Martha Mamgup, who grows potatoes in Ampang town in Mangu LGA, said inadequate water during the dry season affects potato farmers and leads to annual low yield.
translation.pcm: Anoda farmer, wey be Martha Mamgup, wey dey plant potatoe for inside Ampang town for Mangu LGA. tok say water wey no reach durin dry season dey affect potato farmer and harvest dey low evri year.

translation.en: Because of this, she said, the majority of farmers search for borehole locations to farm to access irrigation water for their farms.
translation.pcm: Bekos of dis, she tok say, di majority of farmers dem search for location of borehole to farm to take access irrigation water for dem farm.

translation.en: Martha explained also that the high cost of fertiliser prevents many farmers from improving quantity and quality of yield, adding that insufficient fertiliser affects the crops output.
translation.pcm: Martha also explain say di high cost of fertilizer dey prevent plenty farmers from improvin quantity plus quality of yield, she add say wen fertilizer no reach, e dey affect di crop output.

translation.en: The cost also prevents many of us from expanding the business.
translation.pcm: Di cost dey also prevent many of us from expandin di business.

translation.en: So, getting fertiliser has not been easy for us.
translation.pcm: So, to get fertilizer no be dey easy for us.

translation.en: She said the construction of more dams and boreholes for irrigation would lead to mass production of potatoes.
translation.pcm: She tok say di construction of more dam plus borehole for irrigation go lead to plenty production of potatoes.

translation.en: If the water is not sufficient for the crop, it would dry and eventually die and that is why some farmers who have the resources prefer to dig boreholes in Mangu purposely for irrigation because, without it, dry season farming becomes difficult, she said.
translation.pcm: If di watre no reach for di crop, e go dry and e go later die and day na why some farmer wey get di resources dey prefer to dig boreholes for Mangu for irrigation bikos, without am, season farmin go bekom difficult, as she tok.

translation.pcm: Irish potato for one market inside Jos

translation.en: Production to reach 7million metric ton after lab completion
translation.pcm: Production to reach 7million metric ton afta dem complete lab

translation.en: With Plateau State's potato production jumping from 1,656,650 metric tons in 2017 to 2,359,890 metric tons in 2020, the establishment of the Potato Value Chain Support Project and the construction of the tissue culture lab are expected to cause the tripling of production to over seven million metric tons by the end of 2021.
translation.pcm: Wit potato production inside Plateau State wey don jump from 1,656,650 metric tons in 2017 to 2,359,890 metric tons in 2020, di establishment of Potato Value Chain Support Project and dem expect make diconstruction of tisue culture lab kos make production triple pass seven million metric tons by di time wey 2021 go end.

translation.en: The Monitoring and Evaluating officer of the state's Potato Value Chain Support Project, Baleri Yakubu, told Daily Trust that the state is expected to commence production of six million metric tons of potato annually after the tissue culture lab is completed at the end of 2021 but expressed optimism that production could exceed seven million metric tons annually.
translation.pcm: Di officer wey Monitor and Evaluate state's Potato Value Chain Support Project for di state, Baleri Yakubu, tell Daily Trust say dem expect make di state start production of six million of potato evri year afta dem complete di tissue culture lab at di end of 2021 but e dey optimistic say production fit pass seven million metric tons evri year.

translation.en: Yakubu, however, said the state government should tackle other challenges faced by farmers especially those of fertiliser as well as more dams and road networks while farmers are expected to properly apply potato farming regulations to achieve the expected target.
