translation.pcm: However, Yakubu tok say mak di state goment tackle oda challenges wey farmers dem dey face, especially di one of fertilizer as well as dam and road network as dem dey expect make farmers dem apply proper potato farming regulation to take achieve expected target.

translation.en: Our correspondent gathered that the tissue culture lab, which is intended to improve potato yields in the state by providing clean seed which is resistant to pests and other potato-related diseases, is expected to commence operation fully in a few months.
translation.pcm: Our correspondent hear say di tissue culture lab, wey dem intend to take improve potato yield for di state by providing seed wey clean wey dey resist pest and oda disease dem wey relate to potato na im dem expect say go commence full operation in few month dem.

translation.en: Yakubu said the advent of the lab would certainly improve income for farmers and revenue for the state government while also aiding food security effort in the country.
translation.pcm: Yakubu tok say e dey certain say di advent of di lab go improve income for farmers and revenue for di state goment and e go also help food security for inside di kontri.

translation.en: Farmers in Plateau State, however, believe that the tissue lab, if fully equipped, would largely reduce the cost of treatment for the crops when they were affected by any disease.
translation.pcm: Farmer for inside Plateau State, however, believe say di tissue la, if e dey fully equipped, go reduce di cost of treatment for di crop when disease affect dem.

translation.en: They also hope that better quality seed would be available at an affordable price.
translation.pcm: Dem also hope say better quality seed go dey available for affordable price.

translation.en: FG yet to return £4.2m Ibori loot to Delta Accountant General
translation.pcm: FG neva return £4.2m Ibori loot to Delta Accountant General

translation.en: The Office of the Accountant General of the Federation (OAGF) revealed Wednesday that the Federal Government has not returned the £4.2 million loot recovered from former Governor James Ibori to Delta Government.
translation.pcm: Di Office of di Accountant General of di Federation (OAGF) reaveal for Wednesday say di Federal Goment neva return di £4.2 million loot wey dem recover from former governor James Ibori to delta Goment.

translation.en: The money is still being awaited after which the issues around it will be resolved before further action is taken.
translation.pcm: Dem still dey wait for di money afta dat dem go resolve di issues dem wey wit am before dem take any further action.

translation.en: For now, no money has been returned to Delta State, a statement from the Office, signed by the Director of Information, Press and Public Relations, Henshaw Ogubike, revealed.
translation.pcm: For now, dem neva return any moni enter Delta state,as one statement from di office reveal, wey di director of information, Press and Public Relations, Henshaw Ogubike sign.

translation.en: The statement said that the issue of the £4.2million Ibori loot has not been properly resolved.
translation.pcm: Di statement tok say dem neva resolve di issue of di £4.2million wey Ibori loot.

translation.en: On the previous comment of the Accountant General to the National Assembly that the loot had been returned to the Delta government, Henshaw Ogubike said: The AGF was only making general comments about recoveries relating to State Governments.
translation.pcm: For di previous comment wey Accountant General for di National Assembly make say dem don return di loot to di goment of Delta, Henshaw Ogubike tok say: Di Agf dey only general comment about money wey dem rcorver as e relate to state goment dem.

translation.en: Hardcore Super League trio defiant against UEFA coercion
translation.pcm: Di three Super League stronghead no gree against UEFA coercion.

translation.en: Super League trio Real Madrid, Barcelona and Juventus insisted on Wednesday they œremain committed to modernising football despite UEFA's threats of disciplinary action.
translation.pcm: Super League three Real Madrid, Barcelona and Juventus insist for Wednesday say dem remain committed to take modernise football even as UEFA dey threating to discipline dem.

translation.en: UEFA on Tuesday opened formal disciplinary proceedings against the three clubs which are still refusing to give up the aborted Super League project.
translation.pcm: UEFA don open formal disciplinary waka on Tuesday against di three clubs dem wey no gree to give up on di Super League project wey dem don abort.

translation.en: In a joint statement, Italian's Juventus and the two Spanish sides said they remain committed to modernising football through an open dialogue with UEFA.
translation.pcm: For one joint statement, Juventus for Italy, and di two Spanish side tok say dem remain committed to take modernise football through open dialogue with UEFA.

translation.en: FC Barcelona, Juventus FC and Real Madrid CF wish to express their absolute rejection of the insistent coercion that UEFA has been maintaining towards three of the most relevant institutions in the history of football, the statement read.
translation.pcm: FC Barcelona, Juventus FC and Real Madrid CF wish to express dem absolute rejection of di insistent coercion wey UEFA don dey mentain towards di three institution wey relevant pass for di history of futbol, as di statement tok.

translation.en: This alarming attitude constitutes a flagrant breach of the decision of the courts of justice, which have already made a clear statement warning UEFA to refrain from taking any action that could penalise the founding clubs of the Super League while the legal proceedings are ongoing.
translation.pcm: Dis attitude wey reach to raise alarm dey constitute breach of di decision wey courts of justice dem make, wey don make clear statement to warn UEFA to stop to take any action wey fit punish di clubs dem wey found di super League when dem still dey on top di legal matter.

translation.en: Therefore, the opening of disciplinary proceedings by UEFA is incomprehensible and is a direct attack against the rule of law that we, the citizens of the European Union, have democratically built up, while constituting a lack of respect toward the authority of the courts of justice themselves.â
translation.pcm: Therefore, as UEFA take disciplinary proceedings dey incomprehensible and na direct attack against di rule of law wey us, wey be citizen for European Union, don build up with democracy, e still be lack of respect toward di authority of di courts of justice sef.

translation.en: China administers nearly 140 million COVID-19 vaccines
translation.pcm: China don give reach 140 million COVID-19 vaccines

translation.en: China has administered 139.97 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines as of April 4, 2021, said the country's National Health Commission (NHC).
translation.pcm: China don administer 139.97 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines as of April 4, 2021, as di National Health Commission (NHC) of di kontri tok.

translation.en: China is working to ensure its vaccination efforts in major areas and key industries based on the overall plan of the country, inoculating the eligible population as widely as possible and progressing in stages, said Wu Liangyou, deputy director of the NHCs Disease Prevention and Control Bureau.
translation.pcm: China dey work to make sure say dem vaccination effort for major area and key sector industry as e base on di overall plan of di kontri, inoculating di eligible population as wide as dem fit reach and to make progress in stages, as Wu Liangyou, wey be deputy director of di NHCs Disease Prevention and Control Bureau.

translation.en: The country is gathering resources to ensure inoculation in large- and medium-sized cities, port cities, and border areas with high risks of infection, and priorities are given to key groups including public sector employees, students and faculty of colleges and universities, as well as service staff of large supermarkets, Wu said, adding that vaccination for other groups is also in progress.
translation.pcm: Di kontri don dey gather resources to ensure inoculation for city wey get large and medium size, city wey get prot, area wey get border wey get high risk of infection, plus dem give priority to key group wey include employee for inside public sector, student dem and faculty for inside college and universities, plus service staff for inside big supermarket dem, as Wu take tok, and e add say vaccination for oda group sef don dey for progress.

translation.en: At present, Beijing, Shanghai and some other places in China have administered COVID-19 vaccines to senior citizens above the age of 60 and patients with chronic diseases who are willing to be vaccinated and in good physical conditions.
translation.pcm: For present,  Beijing, Shanghai plus some oda places for inside China don give senior citizenswey wan kolekt di vaccine, wey dey above di age of 60 and patients wey get chronic diseases COVID-19 vaccines, wey get beta physical condition.

translation.en: He Qinghua, an official with the NHC, noted that the commission will advance the vaccination campaign in an order of priority, following the principle of informed consent, voluntary participation and free inoculation.
translation.pcm: He Qinghua, wey official for di NHC note say di commission go advance di vaccination campaign with order of importance, dem go follow di priciple of informed consent, voluntary participation and free inoculation.

translation.en: The country is coordinating regular prevention and control with its vaccination efforts, ensuring that the regulatory responsibility of local governments and the oversight responsibility are fulfilled, and advancing its vaccination campaign in a more secured, orderly and forceful manner, he said.
translation.pcm: Di kontri dey coordinate regular prevention and kontrol wit im vaccination efforts, to make sure say di regular responsibility of local goment dem and di one wey dem don komot eye dey fulfilled, and to dey advance dem vaccination campaign in manner weu dey more secured and orederly and forceful, as e tok am.

translation.en: Besides, China is also taking steps to include more people in its vaccination campaign to ensure their health, the official added.
translation.pcm: Besides, China don take step to take include more pipo for dem vaccination campaign to ensure dem health, di official add.

translation.en: So far, China has approved COVID-19 vaccines produced by five enterprises for conditional marketing or emergency use.
translation.pcm: So far, China don approve COVID-19 vaccines wey five enterprises produce for conditional marketing or for emergency use.

translation.en: Phase III clinical trials of three inactivated vaccines and one adenovirus vaccine showed that their efficacy met the requirements of China's National Medical Products Administration and the World Health Organization.
translation.pcm: Phase III of three vaccines dem wey dem neva activate and one adenovirus vaccine show say dem efficacy meet di requirement of National Medical Products Administration for China and di World Health Organization.

translation.en: Phase II trials of the recombinant protein subunit vaccine approved for emergency use showed the vaccine is safe and can induce a strong immune response.
translation.pcm: Phase II trial for di recombinant protein subunit vaccine wey dem appove for emergency use don show say di vaccine dey safe and e fit cause strong immune response.

translation.en: COVID-19 vaccines adopted by China have all gone through clinical studies in accordance with relevant standards, approved by national drug regulatory organisations and put into use after passing a strict examination, said Li Bin, deputy head of the NHC.
translation.pcm: All di COVID-19 vaccine wey China adopt don go through clinical studies wey follow relevant standard, wey national drug regulatory organization dem approve and dem begin dey use am afta e pass strict examination, as Li Bin wey be deputy head for NHC take tok.

translation.en: All vaccines must be monitored and have their temperatures recorded at regular intervals to ensure that they meet the requirements regarding temperature environment and transportation.
translation.pcm: All vaccines suppose dey monitor and make dem temperature get record from time to time to make sure say dem meet requirement on temperature environment and transportation.

translation.en: China's health regulators also enhanced efforts on the training of health workers, requiring them to strictly obey operating instructions, so as to guarantee the efficacy and safety of the vaccines, Li added.
translation.pcm: Li add say Health regulator for inside China don also enhance effort for di training of health worker dem, require say make dem obey operating instructions, so dem go fit guarantee di efficacy and safety of di vaccine.

translation.en: Wema Bank holds essay contest for kids
translation.pcm: Wema Bank dey do essay contest for pikin dem

translation.en: Wema Bank Plc is hosting a creative essay competition for children that will test the creative writing abilities of young school children aged five to 12 years.
translation.pcm: Wema bank Plc dey host creative essay competition wey go test di creative writing ability of young children wey dey age of five to 12 years.

translation.en: The 2021 Royal Kiddies Essay Competition tagged Write & Win, aims to develop writing skills, promote creativity, imagination capabilities, reward creativity, and drive them towards excellence in their learning process.
translation.pcm: Di 2021 Royal Kiddies Essay Competition wey dem tag Write and Win, aim na to develop writing skil, promote creativity, imagination capacity, reward creativity and drive dem excellence in dia learning process.

translation.en: Ten kids will emerge from a transparent, credible, and thorough screening process.
translation.pcm: Ten kids go emerge for inside screening process wey go dey transparent, credible and thorough.

translation.en: The top three Essays will each get Huawei tablets and Royal Kiddies branded T-shirts.
translation.pcm: Di three essay wey kom top go kolekt Huawei tablets and Royal Kiddies branded T-shirts.

translation.en: The seven other finalists will each get a N20,000 prepaid gift card for school supplies in addition to a branded T-shirt.
translation.pcm: Di remaining seven pipo wey enter final go get N20,000 prepaid gift card each for school supplies plus branded T-shirt.

translation.en: The essay competition is open to children whose parents have opened and funded a Royal Kiddies Account for their children or wards and will see entries close by May 24, 2021.
translation.pcm: Di essay competition go dey open to children wey dem parent don open, plus dey fund Royal Kiddies Account or wards, and entries go close bu May 24, 2021.

translation.en: From Hushpuppi to Abidemi Rufai Sandy Tangâ
translation.pcm: From Hushpuppi to Abidemi Rufai Sandy Tangâ

translation.en: Twelve months ago, Ramoni Abbas (37 years) popularly known as hushpuppi was arrested in June 2020 in Dubai for alleged money laundering from business email compromise fraud and other scams which targeted firms and an English premier league club.
translation.pcm: Twelve months ago, dem arrest Ramoni Abass (37 years) wey dem know as hushpuppi for June 2020 for Dubai alledge say im do money laundering  from business email compromise fraud and oda scams dem wey dey target firms and one English premier league club.

translation.en: He made a total sum of $435 million after defrauding 1,926,400 victims.
translation.pcm: Di total money wey im make na $435 million afta in dom defraud 1,926,400 victims.

translation.en: A year after, Abidemi Rufai (also known as Sandy Tangâ), a Senior Special Assistant on Special Duties to Ogun State Governor, Dapo Abiodun was also arrested by the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) at John F Kennedy Airport, New York over a criminal complaint of defrauding Washington State Employment Security Department of $350,000 (N144,375,000).
translation.pcm: Afta a year,  Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) also arrest  Abidemi Rufai (wey dem dey call Sandy Tangâ), Senior Special Assistant on Special Duties to Ogun State Governor, Dapo Abiodun for inside John F kennedy Airport, concerning criminal complain say e scam Washington State Employment Security Department of $350,000 (N144,375,000).

translation.en: The stolen funds were pandemic relief fund designed by the Washington State for people who might have suffered job losses as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.pcm: Di money wey dem tif na relief money for pandemic wey Washington state design for pipo wey fit don loss dem job bikos of di COVID-19 pandemic.

translation.en: The fraud incident occurred during the lockdown and the investigation bureau began tracking the alleged fraudster who would have been at Nigeria's Federal House of Representative making laws if he had not lost the Ijebu North/Ijebu East/Ogun Waterside Federal Constituency election to Adekoya Adesegun of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP).
translation.pcm: Na during lockdown di fraud apun and di investigation bureau begin dey track di alleged fraudster wey for be dey make law for Nigeria Federal House of Representative if e no loss di Ijebu North/Ijebu East/Ogun Waterside Federal Constituency election to Adekoya Adesegun wey be  Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) person.

translation.en: The fraud was perpetrated by stealing the identities of more than 100 Washington residents by filing falsified claims with the Employment Security Department (ESD) for pandemic-related unemployment benefits.
translation.pcm: Dem do di fraud by stealing identity of Washington residents wey pass 100 as dm dey fill false claim with di Employment Security Department (ESD) for pandemic-related unemployment benefits.

translation.en: For each identity stolen, a separate e-mail account was created so that the claims would be associated with different persons and it can escape automatic fraud detection systems.
translation.pcm: Dem create new e-mail account for each identity wey dem steal, make dem for identify di claim with different pesin to escape automatic fraud detection system.

translation.en: Thereafter, more than $288,000 was paid into his American bank account between March and August 2020.
translation.pcm: After dat, dem don pay pass  $288,000 so im bank account inside America between March and August 2020.

translation.en: Cybercrime is a global threat to individuals, organisations and countries.
translation.pcm: Cybercrime na global threat to pipo, organisation and kontri dem.

translation.en: Nigeria loses more than $128 billion to cybercrimes annually.
translation.pcm: Nigeria dey loss pass $128 billion to cybercrimes evri year.

translation.en: By the end of 2021, the world would have lost a total of $6 trillion.
translation.pcm: By di time 2021 go end, di world go don loss total of $6 trillion.

translation.en: Till date, over 40 Nigerians have been or are being investigated for their complicity in fraudulent scams by the FBI.
translation.pcm: Till date, e pass  40 Nigeria pipo wey dem dey or wey FBI  still dey investigate for dem complicity inside fraudulent scams.

translation.en: Rufai's alleged unemployment benefits fraud falls under what I have called COVID-419 frauds in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di allege unemployemnt benefit fraud wey Rufai do go dey under wetin I don call COVID-19 fraud for Nigeria.

translation.en: These are fraudulent scams leveraging on the loopholes created by the COVID-19 pandemic to scam people, government and organisations.
translation.pcm: Dis na scam wey dey use loopholes wey COVID-19 pandemic don cause to dey scam pipo, goment pr organization dem.

translation.en: During the COVID-19 lockdown in Nigeria, cybercriminals patterned their frauds along the interventions from government and private sectors and scammed many and some of these schemes still exist till date.
translation.pcm: During di COVID-19 lockdown for inside Nigeria, cybercriminals dey do dem frauds along di interventions from goment and private sectors and scamm plenty and some of di  scheme dem  still dey till date.

translation.en: There was Domino pizza fraud, federal government cash palliative fraud, N20, 000 Dangote relief fund fraud and promo sales fraud among others.
translation.pcm: Domino pizza fraud dey, federal goment cash palliative fraud, N20, 000 Dangote relief fund fraud and promo sales fraud among oda ones.

translation.en: While there are those who engage in cyber-criminality in the Diaspora, some youngsters do so within Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Wen some dey wey dey cyber-criminality outside Nigeria, some youngster dem dey do am inside Nigeria.

translation.en: They are regularly arrested, tried and convicted by the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC).
translation.pcm: Di Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) dey arrest dem, also try and convict dem.

translation.en: Understanding the cultures sustaining cyber-criminality may help a serious government in fighting the crime.
translation.pcm: To understand di culture wey dey sustain cyber-criminality fit help serious goment to fight di crime.

translation.en: The family is the microcosm of the larger society.
translation.pcm: Di family na di di small worldfor inside di larger society.

translation.en: It is the place where a normal human being is expected to be nurtured for the society.
translation.pcm: Na di place wey dem suppose nuture normal human beign for di society.

translation.en: Apart from the fact that many Nigerian families are in the dungeon of poverty and can hardly take care of their children, some of these children have become breadwinners, albeit, illegitimately.
translation.pcm: Apart from di fact say plenty family for Nigeria dey inside dungeon of poverty and e dey hard to take care of dem children, some of di  children don bikom breadwinners, as e be, e no legit.

translation.en: There is a challenge with ethical behaviour training in many homes as parents being arrested alongside their children who are involved in cyber-criminality.
translation.pcm: Ethical behaviour training for plenty house na challenge as dem don dey arrest parent plus dem children wey dem gather do cyber-criminality.

translation.en: Elsewhere, mothers of yahoo-boys are forming associations to celebrate their sons success and justifying their criminal behaviours.
translation.pcm: For some oda places, yahoo boys mama dem dey form association to take celebrate dem pikin success nd justify di criminal thing wey dem do.

translation.en: In the religious setting, depraved pastors, alfas and traditionalists create a home and benefit from yahoo-boyism proceeds.
translation.pcm: For di religious seting, pastors, alfa and traditinalist dey make home and dem dey benefit from yahoo-boyism.

translation.en: Moral teachings have given way to materialistic Pentecostalism.
translation.pcm: Moral teachingdon komt for materialistic Pentecostalism to enter.

translation.en: There is a viral video where some boys were shown spraying money while those who appeared to be shepherds in a supposed white garment church enjoyed the moment while the captive members of the church, led by their female youth wing recorded the shameful scene.
translation.pcm: E get one viral video wia some boys dey spray money while pipo wey be like say dem be shepherd for inside white garment church dey enjoy di captive di moment, as dem member wey di female youth wing of di church dey lead dey record di act of shame.

translation.en: A child born in 1999 when Nigeria returned to democracy is now 21 years old.
translation.pcm: Pikin wey dem born for 1999 wen Nigeria enter democracy again na 21 years now.

translation.en: Sadly, they grew up to appreciate lying as a way of life from the mouth of politicians (and in many cases from home) who deceive people to vote for them and do not fulfil or jettison the campaign promises.
translation.pcm: Sadly, dem grow to dey appreciate lie as a way of life from politician dem mouth (and for plenty cases from home) wey dey decieve pipo to vote for dem nd dem no dey fulfil di promise wey dem amke for compaign.

translation.en: Lying itself is the foundation of the sociology of hushpuppism.
translation.pcm: Lying sef na di foundation of di sociology of hushpuppism.

translation.en: Youths are daily being socialised to corruption and fraud by those holding public offices.
translation.pcm: Youth dey socialise daily for inside corruption by pipo dey dey for public office.

translation.en: They see how their systems provide a soft landing for  fraudulent persons (public or private).
translation.pcm: Dem dey see how di system dey give farudulent pipo soft landing (for public or private).

translation.en: Do they ask how many fraud and corruption allegations have been fully investigated and discharged with punishment when the accused are found guilty?
translation.pcm: Shey dem dey ask how many fraud and corruption allegation wey dem don investigate and discharge wit punishment when di accuse dey guilty?

translation.en: The majority of the cases ended with off-the-mic like the Nigeria Delta Development Commission (NDDC) case ended as a family affair.
translation.pcm: Di plenty of cases end wit off-the-mic like as di Nigeria Delta Development Commission (NDDC) case take end like family affair.

translation.en: The youths see flamboyant lifestyles being celebrated amidst the squalor.
translation.pcm: Di youth dem dey see as celebrate flamboyant lifestyle inside dirty.

translation.en: They see how once poor political aspirants transform into millionaires within months of inauguration.
translation.pcm: Dem dey see how poor politcal aspirant dey bikom millionaire withing months wey dem enter office.

translation.en: They see how traditional institutions have become cash and carry in awarding chieftaincy titles.
translation.pcm: Dem dey see how traditional institution don bikom cash and carry wen dem dey give chieftancy title.

translation.en: Tertiary educational institutions, with few exceptions, award undeserving honours in exchange for money.
translation.pcm: Tertiary educational institutions, with few exception dem, dey award undeserving honours in exchange for money.

translation.en: All those who mismanaged funds are provided with a soft landing.
translation.pcm: All of those weu mismanage monet dey get soft landing.

translation.en: Added to this list of cultures nurturing cybercrimes are the lyrical glamorisation of cybercrimes by some popular Nigerian musicians who present cyber-criminality as work and game that everyone is involved in and not a crime.
translation.pcm: To add to dis list of culture wey dey nuture cybercrime na di lyrical glamour wey some Nigeria musician dem dey give cybercrime as dem dey present cybercrime as work and game wey evribodi dey do and say no be crime.

translation.en: If we elect fraudsters as legislators, will they make laws against the crime they are involved in?
translation.pcm: If we elect fraud pesin enter legislator, e go make law against di crime wey e dey involve?

translation.en: The process of giving party nomination to the highest bidders by party leaders needs to be reviewed if we are to stop importing problematic tokunbo products into our already morally bankrupt political system.
translation.pcm: Di process wey parti leaders dem dey take give parti nomination to di pesin wey get high bid need review if we wan stop to dey import problematic tokunbo things enter awa political system wey don already loss moral.

translation.en: It is unfortunate that the critical reasoning of party leaders is lowered when money is dangled in their eyes.
translation.pcm: E dey unfortunate say di critical reasoning of parti leaders dem go low when dem show dem money.

translation.en: They provide a platform for dubious characters to cover up their tracks and our society is worse off through their actions.
translation.pcm: Dem provide platform for dubious character to take do cover up and di society dey worse with dem action.

translation.en: Greed also nurtures cyber-criminality.
translation.pcm: Greed dey also cause cyber-criminality.

translation.en: FBI agent investigating Rufai, Donald Voiret stated that greed is a powerful motivator.
translation.pcm: Di FBI agent wey dey incestigate Rufai, Donald Voiret tok say greed na powerful motivator.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the greed alleged to this defendant affects all taxpayers.
translation.pcm: Unfortunately, di greed wey dem allege dis defendant dem dey affect all taxpayer.

translation.en: Moving forward, we cannot live in sin and expect grace to abound.
translation.pcm: To move forward, we no fit dey live inside sin, dey expect grace to abound.

translation.en: Nigeria must sanitise her anti-corruption system and emplace an accountability policy that tracks lifestyle with material accumulations.
translation.pcm: Make Nigeria sanitise dem anti-coruption system and make dem put accoutability policy in place to take track lifestyle with material accumulation.

translation.en: We must give the youth hope in Nigeria by creating employment opportunities, reduce poverty and review reward systems.
translation.pcm: We must give youth for inside Nigeria hope by creating employment opportunity, reduce poverty plus review reward system dem.

translation.en: The EFCC needs to invest in technology and expose its detectives to modern cybercrime investigation procedures.
translation.pcm: Di EFCC need to invest inside technology and expose dem detective to modern cybercrime investigation procedure dem.

translation.en: The Commission needs to conclude investigations before arresting suspects as done by the FBI before arresting Ramoni Abbass hushpuppi and Abidemi Rufai Sandy Tang.
translation.pcm: Di commission need to finish investigation before dem go arrest suspect as FBI do before dem arrest huspuppi and Abidemi Rufai Sandy Tang.

translation.en: Unless the cultures sustaining cybercrimes in Nigeria are tackled through social engineering, cyber-criminality will continue to fester.
translation.pcm: Unless dem tackle di culture wey dey  sustain cybercrimes for inside Nigeria  wit social social engineering, cyber-criminality go kontinu to spread.

translation.en: Dr Tade, a sociologist wrote this piece via dotad2003@yahoo.com
translation.pcm: Dr Tade, wey be sociologist write dis piece pu for dotad2003@yahoo.com

translation.en: DRC president Tshisekedi assumes chair of African Union
translation.pcm: DRC president wey be Tshisekedi don enter chair for African Union

translation.en: President of the Democratic Republic of Congo, Felix Tshisekedi assumes chair of the African Union on Saturday.
translation.pcm: President for di Democratic Republic of Congo, Felix Tshisekedi enter chair for di African Union on Saturday.

translation.en: His assumption of office is on the first day of the 34th Ordinary Session of the Assembly of Heads of State and Governments in Addis Ababa.
translation.pcm: Im enter office for di first day inside di 34th Ordinary Session of di Assembly of Heads of State and Goment inside Addis Ababa.

translation.en: He succeeds South African president Cyril Ramaphosa, as the organization's rotating chairperson.
translation.pcm: Im dey kom afta president for South Africa wey be Cyril Ramaphosa as di rotating chair for di organization.

translation.en: The AU will be looking to address the devastating impact of COVID-19 on the continent.
translation.pcm: Di Au go aim to address di bad impact of COVID-19 for di continent.

translation.en: The Union's
translation.pcm: Di union

translation.en: official theme for 2021 is Arts, Culture, and Heritage: Levers for Building the Africa We Want.
translation.pcm: official theme for 2021 na Arts, Culture, and Heritage: Levers for Building di Africa We Want.

translation.en: Despite country and continent-wide control measures, the impact of COVID-19 has imposed enormous human, financial and socio-economic costs on the African People, Tshisekedi said.
translation.pcm: Despite kontri and continent-wide kontrol measure sem, di impact of COVID-19 don carry plenty human, financial and soci-economic cost put for Africa pipo, as Tshisekedi tok.

translation.en: This crisis, however, also gives us the chance to re-examine our socio-economic priorities and work towards a sustainable and inclusive economic growth which allows African women and girls to contribute to our societies to the fullest.
translation.pcm: Di crisis don however give us di opportunate to re-examine awa socio-economic priorities and work towards sustainable and inclusive economic growth wey go allow woman and girls dem to contribute to awa society for di fullest.

translation.en: We must be more self-reliant and find collective solutions to our problems.
translation.pcm: We must to rely on awasef more and dey find collective solution to awa problem dem.

translation.en: The DRC during its term as head of the Union is looking to elevate African voices, Tshisekedi said.
translation.pcm: Tshisekedi tok say di DRC during im time as head for di union dey look to elevate African voices.

translation.en: It will also focus on sustainable development by and for Africa.
translation.pcm: E go also focus on sustainable development by and for Africa.

translation.en: We will work to ensure their integral well-being, peace and security, health care and a strong response against COVID-19, as well as food security.
translation.pcm: We go work to make sure dem integral well-beign, peace and security, health care and strong response against COVID-19, plus food security.

translation.en: Agricultural transformation, education, gender equality, climate justice, the free movement of people and goods, and freedom of speech and religion, as well as the enhancement of our common heritage: languages, and memorial sites of the history of African people, will also be at the centre of our agenda, the president added.
translation.pcm: Agricultural transformation, education, gender equality, climate justice, for pipo and good to dey move freely, and freedom of speech and religion plus to enhance awa common heritage: language dem, and memorial sites of di history of pipo for Africa, wey go dey centre for ouw agenda , as di president take add.

translation.en: Fresh crisis in Lagos PDP over LG polls
translation.pcm: New wahala for inside Lagos PDP concerning LG polls

translation.en: A fresh crisis is brewing in the Lagos State chapter of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) over the release of guidelines for the conduct of the forthcoming local government elections by the state Chairman, Engr Deji Doherty.
translation.pcm: One fresh wahala don dey gather for inside  Lagos State chapter of di Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) concerning di release of guidelines for di conduct of di local goment elections dem wey dey kom wey di Chairman of di state wey be Engr Deji Doherty release.

translation.en: Engr Doherty who has been in a running battle with most of his colleagues in the State Working Committee (SWC), leading to his suspension recently, released the guidelines on Friday.
translation.pcm: Engr Doherty wey don dey get battle with plenty of im colleagues for di State Working Committee (SWC), wey lead to im suspension recently, be release di guideline for Friday.

translation.en: It would be recalled that the State Independent Electoral Commission (LASIEC) had released the timetable for the elections scheduled to hold on Saturday, July 24, 2021.
translation.pcm: E go fit remember say di State Independent Electoral Commission (LASIEC) don release di timetable for di elections wey go hold for Saturday, July 24, 2021.

translation.en: Amid the lingering internal strife in the state PDP, the chairman released the guidelines which, it was learnt, did not go down well with most of the executive members who said they were not carried along.
translation.pcm: Inside di internal strife wey dey linger for di State PDP, di Chairman release di guidelines, which as we hear no good for di eyes of most of di executive member wey tok say dem no carry dem long.

translation.en: A member of the state executive said the timetable was unilaterally planned and released by the chairman without the input of other executive members.
translation.pcm: One member for di state executive tok say di chairman plan di timetable unilaterally  and he no involve oda executive member dem.

translation.en: It was further learnt that the other factions of the party opposed to Doherty may counter the embattled chairman this week over the release of the guidelines.
translation.pcm: We later hear say di oda faction of di parti oppose Doherty fit counter di embattled Chairman dis over di guidelines.

translation.en: The executive member who spoke on condition of anonymity said the position of the aggrieved members would be made public during the week, insisting that key members of the executive were sidelined.
translation.pcm: Di executive member wey tok for condition to dey anonymous tok say di position of di member wey dey vex go enter public dis week, e insist say dem sideline key member of di executive.

translation.en: How it feels to give birth during the pandemic By Dil Afrose Jahan
translation.pcm: How e dey feel to born inside pandemic By Dil Afrose Jahan.

translation.en: When there is news of death everywhere, a new life brings happiness and hope
translation.pcm: When news of death dey evriwia, one new life bring hapines plus hope

translation.en: On January 1, 2020, a new morning, two red lines changed my life.
translation.pcm: For January 1, 2020, one new morning, two red line change my life.

translation.en: I was pregnant and happy.
translation.pcm: I get belle and I dey hapi

translation.en: It was an amazing start to a new year.
translation.pcm: Na mamzing start to new year.

translation.en: It was the most remarkable year of my life.
translation.pcm: Na di most remarkable year of my life.

translation.en: All of a sudden, everything changed.
translation.pcm: All of a sudden, evriting change.

translation.en: My daughter Roshomon Tara was born at the end of the first lockdown in Dhaka, Bangladesh; she is now nine months old.
translation.pcm: My daughter Roshomon Tara was born at di end of di first lockdown in Dhaka, Bangladesh; she is now nine months old. I born my pikin Roshomon Tara at di end of di first lockdown for Dhaka, Bangladesh; she don enter  nine months old now.

translation.en: She is the reason I became a mother in the middle of a global crisis.
translation.pcm: She be di reason I bekom mother for di middle of global crisis.

translation.en: It was not only her who was born, but it was also a new me, mother of Tara, who spent an entire pregnancy in lockdown at home and gave birth in an emergency condition within the emergency.
translation.pcm: No be only her dem born, but na also new me, mama tara, wey spend di whole pregnancy inside lockdown for house and born di pikin for emergency condition inside di emergency.

translation.en: Tara has seen the world with masks and isolation.
translation.pcm: Tara don see di world wit mask and isolation.

translation.en: Her grandmothers were also afraid of holding her or coming closer to her without wearing a mask.
translation.pcm: Her grandma dem dey also fear to touch her or kom near her if dem no wear mask.

translation.en: If there were no pandemic, my journey into motherhood would be completely different.
translation.pcm: If pandemic be no dey, my journey to take enter motherhood go different.

translation.en: This Mother's Day is very special as my daughter is now in front of me, smiling and staring at me.
translation.pcm: Dis Mother Day dey very special as my pikin don dey for my front, dey look me dey smile.

translation.en: Last Mother's Day, she was growing inside me.
translation.pcm: For di last mother day, she dey grow inside of me.

translation.en: The only thing that didn't change, meanwhile, is the pandemic.
translation.pcm: Di only thing wey no change, meanwhile, na di pandemic.

translation.en: I was 16 weeks pregnant when the pandemic struck, and the planet went into lockdown.
translation.pcm: Na 16 weeks belle dey inside me when di pandemic apun, and di world enter lockdown.

translation.en: I was struggling to survive the pandemic with my hormonal and physical changes.
translation.pcm: I be dey struggle to survive di pandemic with my hormonal and physical changes.

translation.en: Those 22 weeks were no less than a war.
translation.pcm: Di 22 weeks dem be like war.

translation.en: My husband Sina Hasan is a musician, and all his concerts were cancelled at that time.
translation.pcm: My husband, Sina Hasan na musician, and all im concert dey cancelled for dat time.

translation.en: I am a freelance journalist since January 1, 2020.
translation.pcm: I be freelance journalist since January 1, 2021.

translation.en: So, we were depending on what I had saved over the years, and spent all my savings.
translation.pcm: So we be dey depend on wetin I don save already, and we spend all my savings.

translation.en: Our parents and two journalists associations came forward to help for the time being.
translation.pcm: Our parent and two journalists association dem come forward to help for di main time.

translation.en: I was afraid of everything.
translation.pcm: I be dey fear evrithing.

translation.en: Most of the time, it was like death
translation.pcm: Most of di time, e be like say na die

translation.en: was knocking at the door.
translation.pcm: dey knock for awa door.

translation.en: I was adapting to a new online life where we clicked and got our things home-delivered.
translation.pcm: I be dey adapt to new life wey say na online we dey click and dem dey deliver awa things or home-delivery.

translation.en: I had to wait for a week to get groceries delivered this way.
translation.pcm: I get to dey wait for one week make dem for take deliver groceries like day.

translation.en: I was even afraid to send the only family member living with me  my husband  to go outside and buy food for storage.
translation.pcm: I even dey fear to send di only family member wey dey live wit me, my husband to komot go buy food storage.

translation.en: Thus, I was eating less.
translation.pcm: So, I no too dey eat.

translation.en: Besides, I could not go for my scheduled antenatal check-ups.
translation.pcm: Beside sef, I no fit go for my antenatal check-up as dem take give me time.

translation.en: And I was not sure if my baby was growing healthy or all development was taking place timely.
translation.pcm: And I be no dey sure if my pikin dey grow welwel abi if development dey take place timely.

translation.en: I was sorry for my unborn child, that I was bringing her into a more different world than ever.
translation.pcm: I be dey sorry for my unborn pikin say I dey bring am inside world wey different from as e ever be.

translation.en: Tele-medication helped me to pass some hard times during the last trimister.
translation.pcm: Na tele-medication help me pass some hard time for inside di last three month dem.

translation.en: I forgot my gynaecologist's face.
translation.pcm: I be forget di face of my  gynaecologist.

translation.en: I cannot remember how she looked without the PPE.
translation.pcm: I no fit imagine s she go take look if she no wear PPE.

translation.en: I needed information about risks, precautions, and how I could get emergency medical help.
translation.pcm: I need informate  about risks, precautions, and how I fit get emergency medical help.

translation.en: Lots of information was floating around.
translation.pcm: plenty informate be dey flow around.

translation.en: Within this chaos of information, experienced mothers, my mother, and mother-in-law could only help me by supporting me and not meeting me in person when I was pregnant.
translation.pcm: For inside dis informate wahala, mother dem wey get experience my mama, and my mother-in-law fit only dey support me and no be say dem meet me for pesin when i be get belle.

translation.en: Traditionally, experienced mothers and mostly older women in the family help new mothers with their experience and observation.
translation.pcm: Traditionally, experienced mothers and mostly older women for inside di family go help new mother dem wit dem experience plus observation.

translation.en: I have had several panic attacks due to a lack of information and understanding.
translation.pcm: I be don get plenty panic attack bikos I no get information and understanding.

translation.en: So, I dug for the experience of new mothers who gave birth during this time.
translation.pcm: So I be dig experience of mother dem wey give birth durin dis time.

translation.en: I found social media as a lifeline.
translation.pcm: I see social media as lifeline.

translation.en: I read many exciting experiences on social media while following a group of more than 100,000 pregnant and lactating mothers who supported each other to survive the pandemic.
translation.pcm: I read plenty exciting experience for social media when I be dey follow one group wey gey over 100,000 woman wey get belle and wey dey give pikin breast as dem dy support each oda to take survive di pandemic.

translation.en: Different media groups on this platform have helped more than 100,000 pregnant and lactating mothers by sharing their experience and information during the lockdown.
translation.pcm: Different media group for di platfrm don help pass 100,000 woman wey belle and di ones wey dey give pikin breast as dem dey share experience plus informate durin di lockdown.

translation.en: One of these groups helped me find a health care facility to do an emergency ultrasound after heavy bleeding during the lockdown.
translation.pcm: Na one di group help me find heakth care fcility to take do emmergency ultrasound afta heavy bleeding fir inside di lockdown.

translation.en: Another group helped me curb my anxiety during pregnancy and post-partum depression.
translation.pcm: Anoda group be help to stop anxiety and di depresion wey dey follow childbirth.

translation.en: I was upset that I couldn't meet my parents, relatives, or friends to share the joy of welcoming a new member in the family.
translation.pcm: I be dey vex say I no fit meet my parents, relatives, or friends to take  share di joy of say I welkom  new member inside di family.

translation.en: My daughter was born on August 25, 2020, at the same hospital, Azimpur Maternity, where I was born decades ago.
translation.pcm: My daughter was born on August 25, 2020, at di same hospital, Azimpur Maternity, wia I was born decades ago. I be born my pikin for August 25, 2020, for di same hospital, Azimpur Maternity, wia dem born me decades ago.

translation.en: And she met another child in person when she was four months old on December 31, 2020, when Tara and her father went to the rooftop with me to see the fireworks.
translation.pcm: And she meet anoda child one on one when she be enter four months old for December 31, 2020, when Tara and her papa go di rooftop with me to see di fireworks.

translation.en: Another family with two babies, apparently my next-door neighbour whom I met the first time, also went there to say goodbye to 2020.
translation.pcm: Anoda fimily with two baby, wey be my neighbour wey I dey meet for di first time also go dere to go tok byebye for 2020.

translation.en: Every day was, and is, a gift, considering the recent statistics of increased Covid-19 cases.
translation.pcm: Every day na, and e still be  gift, to consider di recent statistics of increased Covid-19 cases.

translation.en: When there was news of death everywhere, the new life brought happiness and let hope thrive.
translation.pcm: When news about death full evriwia, di new life bring hapines and hope.

translation.en: For mothers, it's no less than winning a war by giving birth to a child during a pandemic and taking care of the infant all alone, confirming the highest safety for their child.
translation.pcm: For mother dem, e no different from say dem win war as dem born pikin inside pandemic and dem dey care for di new pikin alone, to confirm di safety wey high pass for dem pikin.

translation.en: Socially, emotionally, and physically, this time can be challenging.
translation.pcm: Socially, emotionally, and physically, dis time fit challenge person.

translation.en: Thanks to the light in the shining eyes of the babies.
translation.pcm: Thanks to di light wey dey shine inside di eyes of di baby dem.

translation.en: Thanks to my baby, my daughter, for whom I am a mother and a successful fighter who survived this pandemic.
translation.pcm: Thank you my pikin, my daughter, for who I be mama and a successful fighter wey survive dis pandemic.

translation.en: Dil Afrose Jahan was a recipient of the National Geographic Society's Emergency Fund for Journalists.
translation.pcm: Dil Afrose Jahan don kolekt di National Geographic Society's Emergency Fund for Journalist dem.

translation.en: This work was supported by the National Geographic Society.
translation.pcm: Na  National Geographic Society support dis work.

translation.en: The national question, insecurity and the Asaba declaration
translation.pcm: Di national question, insecurity and di declaration for inside Asaba.

translation.en: By Segun Tomori
translation.pcm: By Segun Tomori

translation.en: Recently, Southern Nigeria Governors met in Asaba and made some far-reaching resolutions on the state of the nation, which is now famously referred to as the Asaba Declaration.
translation.pcm: Recently, governor dem for inside souther Nigeria be meet inside Asaba and dem make some kind resolution on top di state of di nation, which dem don dey call Asaba declaration.

translation.en: The meeting coming on the heels of worsening insecurity in the country, agitation by some ethnic jingoists and the unending menace of murderous herdsmen generated nationwide attention.
translation.pcm: Di meetin dey kom on top di matter as insecurity for di kontri don dey worse, agitation by some kind ethnic jingoist and as di matter murderous herdsmen menace dey generate nationwide attention.

translation.en: Indeed, the bi-partisan nature of the meeting and the unanimity displayed by the 17 governors showed they meant serious business.
translation.pcm: Indeed, di bi-partisan nature wey di meetin get plus di unanimity wey di 17 governor dem display show say dem mean serious business.

translation.en: Restructuring within the context of true federalism and the ban on open grazing formed the core of the declaration.
translation.pcm: Restructuring inside  di context of true federalism and di ban of open grazing form di koko of di declaration.

translation.en: Major highlights include the clamour for state police, devolution of powers, review of revenue formula in favour of federating units and the need for a national dialogue to discuss the national question.
translation.pcm: Major light follow be to bring state police, devolution of power, to review revenue formula to take favour federating unit plus di need for national dialogue to take discuss di nation question.

translation.en: While the foot-dragging of the governors on financial autonomy for state legislature and judiciary is condemnable and runs contrary to the spirit of true federalism to which they clamour, the bulk of their resolutions are actually a cardinal tenet of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) to which Gov. El-Rufai- led committee on True Federalism made far-reaching recommendations.
translation.pcm: As dem suppose condemn di way gobernos dem dey take drag leg on top financial autonomy for state legislature and judiciary and e no follow di spirit of true federalism which dem dey call for, planty for inside dem resolution na tenet for di ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) wey di committee wey Gov. El=Rufai lead on top true federalism recommend.

translation.en: One would have expected the leading lights of APC to take advantage of the bipartisan nature of the Asaba declaration, the overwhelming support of the major opposition party to kick-start the process of addressing the issues.
translation.pcm: One go expect say di leading light for inside APC go take advantage of di bipartisan nature of di Asaba declaration, and di support of di major opposition parti to take begin di process to address di issue.

translation.en: Instead, we saw attempts at playing to the gallery and in some quarters, subtle censure of the governors.
translation.pcm: Instead, we see attempt to take play to di gallery and for some quarter,  subtle censure of di governor dem.

translation.en: The El-Rufai Committee had recommended devolution of powers, resource control, state police, local government autonomy and review of revenue formula in favour of federating units among others.
translation.pcm: Di El-Rufai committee don recommend devolution of power, resource control, state police, local goment autonomy plus review inside revenue frmula for favour of federatin unit among dem.

translation.en: President Buhari had since given support for local government, state legislature and judiciary autonomy through backing amendment of the statutes and issuing Executive Order 010.
translation.pcm: President Buhari don give support for local government, state legislature and judiciary autonomy since, as im back amendment for inside di statutes and issue Executive Order 010.

translation.en: Given the state of the nation in which security and the economy have posed grave challenges, these twin sectors should receive the utmost attention, concurrently.
translation.pcm: As di state of di nation take be, wey security and economic don bikom big challenge, na dis two sector dem suppose get di untimate attention togeda.

translation.en: Despite the rating of Nigeria as the country with the highest GDP in Africa, we are yet to make sufficient efforts to translate that to improved standards of living for the majority of our citizens.
translation.pcm: Despite as dem rate Nigeria as kontri wey get highest GDP for inside Africa, we still neva make better effort wey reach to translate am to take improve standard of living or di majority of awa kontri pipo.

translation.en: Our annual budget of about $35 billion, for instance, is grossly inadequate to cater to the needs of an estimated 220 million Nigerians.
translation.pcm: For instance now, awa annual budget wey reach $35 billion, e dey very inadequate to take cater for di need of 220 million Nigeria pipo.

translation.en: South Africa with about 58 million people had a National budget of almost $75bn in 2019 with her Social Protection Programmes reaching 17m of its population
translation.pcm: South Africa wey get about 58 million pipo get National budget wey reach $75bn for 2019 and her Social Protection Programme reach 17m of im populatiom

translation.en: The efforts of the Buhari administration, though novel and commendable, still represent a drop in an ocean and are not adequate to make the required impact.
translation.pcm: Di effort wey di Buhari administration dey make, though na new way and e dey commendable, na just drop for inside ocean and e no dey adequate to make required impact.

translation.en: This is where devolution of powers and resource control come in.
translation.pcm: Na here devolution of power and resource kontrol go enter.

translation.en: Solid minerals and natural resources  have no business staying a day longer in the Exclusive list.
translation.pcm: Solid minerals and natural resource dem no get any business to stay pass one day inside Exclusive list.

translation.en: Almost all states in the country have commercially viable natural resources that can be exploited to create wealth and generate the needed foreign exchange for the country.
translation.pcm: Almost all di state wey dey di kontri get natural resources wey fit sell market wey dem fit explore to tak create wealth and generate di foreign exchange wey  di kontri need.

translation.en: The present system where states come cap in hand to Abuja to collect federal allocations in the country breeds indolence, runs contrary to the principle of true federalism.
translation.pcm: Di present system wia state dey go Abuja to go kolekt federal allocation for inside di kontri dey breed indolence, e no follow di principle of true federalism.

translation.en: Just as the El-Rufai committee proposed, the revenue formula should be reviewed in favour of states since more responsibilities will be added to them.
translation.pcm: Just as di El-Rufai committee take propose, say make dem review di revenue formula to take favour states since dem go add more responsibilities to dem.

translation.en: On state police, the fears of abuse and envisaged excesses by governors is understandable, but like Richie Norton said To escape fear, you have to go through it, not around it.
translation.pcm: On top  state police, e dey undesratndable say dem dey fear say governors dem go abuse am, but like Richie Nortondon tok, To escape fear, you have to go through it, not around it.

translation.en: For too long we have gone around fear of abuse of state police, we have tried to turn a blind eye to the obviously overstretched and over-centralised Nigeria Police force that has become not only overly inefficient, but largely a conundrum.
translation.pcm: For too long, we don dey waka round fear of abuse of state police, we don turn blind eye to di centralised Nigeria Police Force wey don dey overstretched and wey don bikom inefficient and big problem.

translation.en: Like Vice-President Osinbajo stated some years ago, State Police is an idea whose time has come.
translation.pcm: As vice-President Osinbajo tok some years ago, State Police na idea wey im time don kom.

translation.en: We have to address our fears and overcome it.
translation.pcm: We have to address awa fears and overcome it.

translation.en: One of the ways that can be done is by enacting a legal instrument for the establishment of the State Police Regulatory Commission (SPRC), alongside constitutional amendments that will permit State Police.
translation.pcm: One for di way na to enact legal instrument to take establish di State Police Regulatory Commission (SPRC), along wit constitutional amendments dem wey go permit state police.

translation.en: It would be similar in functions to the Federal Police Service Commission (PSC) but have wider powers to exercise appointive and regulatory functions.
translation.pcm: E go dey similar function wit Federal Police Service Commission (PSC) but e go get wider power to take exercise appointive plus regulatory function dem.

translation.en: The ban on open grazing though restated by the governors is not new and forms the fulcrum of the National Livestock Transformation Plan (NLTP) approved by the National Executive Council (NEC).
translation.pcm: Do ban on top open grazing wey di governors dem restate no be nwe thing, e dey part of di fulcrum of di National Livestock Transformation Plan (NLTP) wey National Executive Council (NEC) approve.

translation.en: The International Crisis Group (ICG) touts the NLTP as Nigeria's most comprehensive  effort to date to overhaul the inefficient and grossly underperforming livestock system.
translation.pcm: Di International Crisis Group (ICG) don put di NLTP as di most comprehensive effort wey Nigeria don make to date to take overhaul di inefficient and grosly underperforming livestock system.

translation.en: At the core is a strategy to curtail migratory or open grazing and thus lower the risk of conflict between herders and farmers It, therefore, beggars belief that some myopic, self-acclaimed ethnic champions choose to lampoon the ban on pre-historic, nomadic open grazing.
translation.pcm: For di core na strategy to take  curb migratory or open grazing and thus lower di risk of conflict between herders and farmersdem, therefore, beggars belief that some myopic, sef-acclaimed ethnic champions choose to lampoon di ban on pre-historic, nomadic open grazing.

translation.en: The federal and state governments should move swiftly to fully implement this novel plan so that we can put the perennial farmers-herders clashes behind us.
translation.pcm: Make  di federal and stae goment move very fast to fully implement dis new plan so we go fit put dis farmers-herders clash wey dey apun fromtime to time behind us.

translation.en: The convocation of a National Dialogue, a major demand of the Asaba declaration might not be necessary since there is a report of the 2014 National Conference and recommendations of the Gov. El-Rufai -led APC committee on True Federalism.
translation.pcm: Di convocation of National Dialogue, wey be major demand of di Asaba declaration fit no dey necessary since report from di 2014 National Conference plus recommendations of di Gov. El-Rufai -led APC committee on True Federalism dey.

translation.en: Both reports made far-reaching recommendations that our elected governors and their legislators in the National Assembly can reach a consensus on, instead of wasting scarce resources on another jamboree.
translation.pcm: Di two report be make far reaching recommendation wey di governor dem wey we elect and dem legislator for inside di national assembly fit agree on, instead of make dem waste resource wey no dey on top anoda jamboree.

translation.en: On the issue of separatist agitations, there should be modalities for convening a referendum spelt out in the constitution.
translation.pcm: On to di issue of separatist agitations dem, make dem bring modalities  to take do referendum as e be inside di constitution.

translation.en: It is almost certain that a vast majority of Nigerians want to live together, our differences, notwithstanding.
translation.pcm: E dey almost certain say plenty majority of Nigeria pipo wan live togeda, dem no mind awa differences.

translation.en: Doing this will take the sail out of the wind of divisive elements, fanning embers of hate and discord.
translation.pcm: To do dis go take di sail komo for di wind of divisive elemnet dem, wey dey fan fire of hate and discord.

translation.en: The Southern Governors have affirmed their commitment to a United Nigeria on the basis of justice, fairness and equity, so must every patriotic Nigerian.
translation.pcm: di Southern Governor dem don affirm dem commitment to one United Nigeria on top basis of justice, fairness and equity, so must evri patriotic Nigerian.

translation.en: Though we have challenges like every other country, we must listen to ourselves, like US President Joe Biden often says.
translation.pcm: Though we get challenge dem like evri oda kontri, we must listen to awasefs as US President Joe Bidden dey often tok.

translation.en: Tomori resides in Abuja
translation.pcm: Tomori dey live for Abuja

translation.en: Two officers killed as IPOB militants set Anambra police station on fire
translation.pcm: Two officer dem don die as IPOB jaguda pipo put fire on top police station

translation.en: Barely 24 hours after the newly appointed Commissioner of Police in Anambra, Christopher Adetokumbo Owolabi, resumed duty, gunmen attacked Obosi Police Station in Idemili North local government area of the state and killed two officers.
translation.pcm: E neva reach 24 hours afta di new commissioner of police wey dem appoint for inside Anambra, Christopher Adetokumbo Owolabi, resume, na im jaguda pipo attack Obosi Police Station in Idemili North local government area for inside di state and kill two officers.

translation.en: The gunmen attacked the police station late Wednesday, freeing all detainees before setting the station on fire.
translation.pcm: Di jaguda pipo attack di police station late for Wednesday, dem free all di pipo wey dem detain before dem set di station on fire.

translation.en: A source within the affected police station said the gunmen in large numbers stormed and attacked the station around 11pm.
translation.pcm: One pesin for di police station wey di thing affect tok say plenty jaguda pipo enter and attack di police station around 11pm.

translation.en: He simply identified the deceased officers as Inspectors James and Awalu.
translation.pcm: Im identify di officer wey die as Inspector James and Awalu.

translation.en: The source said the victims were killed inside a non-functional filling station close to the police station.
translation.pcm: Di source tok say dem kill di victims inside one filling station wey no dey function again ey dey close to di police station.

translation.en: The source also said when other police officers on duty noticed unusual movement of the unknown gunmen, they took to their heels while the attackers had a field time burning down the police station.
translation.pcm: Di source also tok say when oda police officer dem wey dey on duty be notice unusual movement of di unknown gunmen, dem run and di pipo wey attack get time to take burn di police station down.

translation.en: Meanwhile, the police in Anambra have confirmed the killing of two of their personnel.
translation.pcm: Meanwhile, di police for inside Anambra don confirm di killin of two of dem men.

translation.en: DSP Tochukwu Ikenga, the command's Public Relations Officer (PPRO), who confirmed the attack, said the state Commissioner of Police had dispatched a tactical team for on the spot assessment of the incident.
translation.pcm: DSP Tochukwu Ikenga, wey be di Public Relations Officer (PPRO)for di command, wey confirm di attack, tok say di state commissioner of police don dispatch one tactical team to take assess di incident on di spot.

translation.en: The tactical team led by an the Assistant Commissioner of Police was directed to have on the spot assessment of the place.
translation.pcm: Di tactical team wey di Assistant Commissioner of Police lead di tactical team get instruction to see on di spot assessment of di place.

translation.en: The team was equally told to possibly identify and apprehend the hoodlums that perpetrated the the attack, he said.
translation.pcm: Dem also tell di team ti try identify and catch di jaguda pipo wey do di attack, as he take tok.

translation.en: Ikenga, who added that the bodies of the two killed policemen have been deposited at a nearby morgue, said investigation into the matter has begun.
translation.pcm: Ikenga, wey add say di bodi of di two police don dey for nearby morgue, he tok say dem don start investigation on top di matter.

translation.en: NEPC, Commonwealth collaborate on production of professional service export data
translation.pcm: NEPC, Commonwealth collaborate on  top production of professional service export data

translation.en: The Nigeria Export Promotion Council (NEPC) and the Commonwealth Secretariat London are collaborating to produce reliable data on export of professional services in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di Nigeria Export Promotion Council (NEPC) and di Commonwealth Secretariat London wan collaborate to take produce reliable data on top export for professional service for inside Nigeria.

translation.en: Speaking at the inaugural meeting of the National Consultative Committee on the International Trade-in-Services (NCCITS) held under the auspices of the Commonwealth Secretariat London, the Executive Director/Chief Executive Officer of the NEPC, Mr. Olusegun Awolowo, said Nigeria has no readily accessible and reliable data or statistics on trade-in-services.
translation.pcm: When e dey tok for di inaugural meeting of di National Consultative Committee for di International Trade-in-Services (NCCITS) wey hold under di Commonwealth Secretariat London, di Executive Director/Chief Executive Officer of the NEPC, Mr. Olusegun Awolowo, tok say Nigeria no get readily accessible and reliable data on top trade-in-service.

translation.en: Awolowo said there had been previous attempts to create awareness on the Trade-in-Service sector of the economy, including the creation of the National Strategy for Export of Professional Services in 2010.
translation.pcm: Awolowo tok say dem don try before to create awareness on top di trade-in service sector of di economy, including as dem create National Strategy for Export of Professional Services for 2010.

translation.en: The Commonwealth in 2016 assisted Nigeria to develop a road-map for the service sector, he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say di Commonwealth don help Nigeria to develop one road-map for di sector for 2016.

translation.en: The NEPC boss said the current focus of collaboration with the Commonwealth Secretariat is on data/statistics collection and management.
translation.pcm: Di oga for inside NEPC tok say di current focus for collaboration wit di Commonwealth Secretariat na on top data/statistics collection and management.

translation.en: This is critical to our export effort as this would fill the gaps in collecting or capturing data from relevant institutions in order to generate analyse and use statistical information on Trade-in-Services in line with the global trend, he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say dis one dey critical to awa effort for export as e go fill di gap for collecting or capturing data from relevant institution in order to take generate, analyse and use statistical information on top trade-in Service dem as e take be globally.

translation.en: NITDA, firm to launch tech startup fund July
translation.pcm: NITDA, firm go launch tech startup fund for July

translation.en: The National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA) and a United States-based firm Mass Challenge have signed an agreement to financially support between 10 and 15 start-ups from July, to reach their full potential within 12 months.
translation.pcm: Di National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA) and one firm wey bease for United States Mass Challenge don sign agreement to financially support between 10 and 15 start-ups from July, to reach dem full potential withing 12 months.

translation.en: Director General of NITDA, Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi said this on Tuesday during a virtual media stakeholder engagement with officials of MassChallenge.
translation.pcm: Director General for NITDA, Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi tok  dis on Tuesday durin one virtual media stakeholder engagement wit officials of MassChallenge dem.

translation.en: The initiative is designed to identify and accelerate top start-ups based in Nigeria and grow their businesses to serve the Nigerian and global market, Abdullahi said.
translation.pcm: Abdullahi tok say dem design di initiative to take identify and accelerate top start-ups dem wey base for Nigeria and grow dem business to serve di Nigeria and global market.

translation.en: The NITDA DG who said the initiative would be launched in July added that it would improve tech innovation and entrepreneurship across the country.
translation.pcm: Di DG fo inside NITDA wey tok say dem go launch di initiative for July add say e go improve tech innovation and entrepreneurship for inside di kontri.

translation.en: A vibrant start up ecosystem is highly critical to the future of our country and it's vital to finding solutions to our various challenges.
translation.pcm: Start up ecosystem wey dey vibrant dey highly critical to di future of awa kontri and na Vital to take find solution to awa various challenge dem.

translation.en: Innovation is a prominent way of creating prosperity for all and lifting countries out of poverty.
translation.pcm: Innovation na prominent way to take create properity for all and to take lift kontri dem komot for inside poverty.

translation.en: The CEO of MassChallenge, Siobhan Dullea, said the firm had supported over 2,900 start-ups in 54 countries across the world and that these firms have generated $3.6 billion revenue and created 86,000 jobs.
translation.pcm: Di CEO of MassChallenge, Siobhan Dullea, tok say di firm don suport over 2,900 start-up across di world and say di firms dem don generate $3.6 billion revenue and create 86,000 jobs dem.

translation.en: Kidnapppers abduct 2 women in Abuja council
translation.pcm: Kidnapper dem carry two woman inside Abuja council

translation.en: Kidnappers have abducted two women, Christiana Isa Attah and Favor David, behind Anguwar Kpokpolobi community in Naharati, Abaji Area Council, FCT.
translation.pcm: Kidnapper dem don carry two woman, Christiana Isa Attah and Favor David, behind Anguwar Kpokpolobi community inside Naharati, Abaji Area Council, FCT.

translation.en: Mother of the two victims, Mrs. Ruth Attah, a retired school teacher, told our reporter at her residence yesterday, that the incident happened around midnight on Saturday.
translation.pcm: Mama wey born di two victim, wey be Mrs. Ruth Attah, na retired school teacher, tell awa reporter for her house sayna around midnight for Saturday di incident apun.

translation.en: She said she was asleep and her daughters were in their room when the kidnapppers entered the house after scaling through the low fence.
translation.pcm: She tok she be dey sleep and di pikin dem dey inside room when di kidnapper dem enter di house afta dem jump fence wey no too high.

translation.en: She said they broke one of the windows and went to the room where her two daughters were asleep  and bundled them away at gunpoint.
translation.pcm: She tok say dem break one window to take enter di room wey her pikin dem dey sleep and carry komot wit gun for hand.

translation.en: When the girls noticed that the kidnapppers were breaking down the window,  they ran to my room to hide, but the gunmen followed them to my room and took us away, she said.
translation.pcm: When di girls notice say dem dey try to break window, dem run come my room to hide, but di kidnappers be follow dem come my room, and dem carry all of us komot, as she take tok am.

translation.en: According to her, the kidnappers spared her some few metres away from the house after noticing that she could not trek for long due to her old age.
translation.pcm: According to her, di kidnapper be leave her afta dem some few metres wey dem don pass house when dem notice say she no fit waka bikos of old age.

translation.en: It was after we crossed the river and I could no longer trek that the other gang members who were behind me asked me to go back home while they went away with my two daughters, she added.
translation.pcm: Na afta we cross river, wey I no fit waka again na im di oda gang member tell me say make i dey go back house as dem komot wit my two pkin dem, she add.

translation.en: A resident of the area, who preferred anonymity, said the kidnappers carried out the operation for over an hour while shooting into the air to scare people from engaging them.
translation.pcm: One pesin wey dey stay di area, wey wan dey anonymous, tok say di kidnapper do di operation for more than one hour as dem dey shoot up to scare pipo from dem.

translation.en: No security man came here when the kidnapppers were shooting into the air for over one hour, he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say no security man come here when di kidnapper dem be dey shoot inside air for pass one hour.

translation.en: Daily Trust learnt that until that fateful day, the woman and her children had always passed the night at neighbours house and returned home in the morning for fear of kidnappers as her house was just few metres away from a river.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust hear say until dat very day, di woman and her pikin dem dey always sleep for neighbour dem house and dem dey go back home bikos dem dey fear kidnapper as dem house na just few metre from di river.

translation.en: It was also gathered that one of the woman's daughters, who is a class teacher in the area, was preparing for her wedding next month.
translation.pcm: We also gather say of di di daughter of di woman, wey be class teacher for di area be dey prepare to do wedding for next month.

translation.en: The spokesperson of the FCT police command, ASP Maryam Yusuf, did not pick calls or reply to a text message sent to her phone to confirm the latest kidnap incident in the area.
translation.pcm: Di toktok pesin for di police command inside FCT, that one na ASP Maryam Yusuf, no gree pick call or reply text message wey dem send to her fone to take confirm di latest kidnap incident for di area.

translation.en: Why I'm in race for Anambra  govship Anglican Priest
translation.pcm: why I dey run for gov inside Anambra Anglican Priest

translation.en: An Anglican Priest, Rev Godwin Okonkwo, has said he is in the race for the November governorship election in Anambra State because he wants to bring the fear of God and knowledge of prudent use of resources to bear on governance in the state.
translation.pcm: One Anglican Priest, Rev Godwin Okonkwo, don tok say im dey race for di November governorship election inside Anambra state bikos im wan bring di fear of God and knowledge of prudent use of resources to show on top governance matter for di state.

translation.en: Okonkwo who spoke with Daily Trust on Wednesday shortly after addressing his supporters in Awka, the Anambra State capital, said the state was lagging behind in terms of good governance.
translation.pcm: Okonkwo wey follow Daily Trust tok on Wednesday shortly afta im follow im supporter dem tok for Awka, di Anambra state capital, tok say di state dey lag behind in terms of good governance.

translation.en: The people who are there now have not brought to bear in managing the resources of Anambra State for the good of Anambra people.
translation.pcm: Di pipo wey dey dere for now neva begin manage di resources of Anambra state for di good of di Anambra pipo.

translation.en: I believe we can do better in managing the state resources.
translation.pcm: I believe say we fit do better pass as we dey manage di resources of di state.

translation.en: It is high time we moved from a lukewarm attitude of leadership to good leadership.
translation.pcm: Time don reach make we move from lukewarm attitude of leadership to better leadership.

translation.en: I am in APC now to change the poor outing of the party in the state over the years, he said.
translation.pcm: I dey for Apc to change di poor outing wey di parti get for di state for past years, as he tok.

translation.en: Barty beats Kvitova to set up last-four clash with Badosa
translation.pcm: Barty don beat Kvitova to take play last four match with Badosa

translation.en: Ashleigh Barty will take on Paula Badosa in the semifinals of the Madrid Open after beating Petra Kvitova 6-1, 3-6, 6-3 on Wednesday.
translation.pcm: Ashleigh Barty go take on Paula Badosa for di semifinal of Madrid Open afta beating Petra Kvitova 6-1, 3-6, 6-3 for Wednesday.

translation.en: World No 1 Barty is chasing her fourth singles title of the year after her triumph in Stuttgart 10 days ago.
translation.pcm: World No 1 Barty dey  chase her fourth singles title for di year afta she win for  Stuttgart 10 days ago.

translation.en: In the last four she faces the woman who knocked her out in the quarterfinals in Charleston in early April.
translation.pcm: For di last four she go face di woman wey beat am komot for inside quarterfinal for Charleston in early April.

translation.en: On Wednesday, the Australian came out on top against two-time Wimbledon champion and 2015 and 2018 Madrid winner Kvitova.
translation.pcm: For Wednesday, di Australian be komot as top against pesin wey don win Wimbledon two times plus 2015, 2018 Madrid open winner Kvitova.
