translation.en: Wildcard Badosa became the first Spanish woman in the tournament's 12-year history to make the semis with her 6-4, 7-5 win over eighth seed Belinda Bencic.
translation.pcm: Wildcard Badosa become di first Spanish woman for di tournament wey don dey for  12-year to make di semi with her 6-4, 7-5 win over eighth seed Belinda Bencic.

translation.en: 22 Pharaoh mummies on parade in Egypt
translation.pcm: Dem parade 22 mummies of Pharaoh dem inside Egypt

translation.en: Twenty-two pharaoh mummies walked the streets of Cairo on Saturday evening in a stunning royal procession from the Egyptian Museum on Tahrir Square to the new National Museum of Egyptian Civilization (NMEC) in Fustat.
translation.pcm: Na twenty-two mummies of pharaoh wlk for di street of Cairo on saturday evening for one stunning royal procession from Egyptian Museum on Tahrir Square to di new National Museum of Egyptian Civilization (NMEC) in Fustat.

translation.en: The event marked the official launch of NMEC.
translation.pcm: Na di event mark as dem take launch NMEC officially.

translation.en: Against the backdrop of fireworks, the mummies“ 18 kings and four queens“ travelled in order of age on purpose-built gold-colored pharaonic chariots, equipped with an air ride suspension system to absorb vibrations, and bearing the name of their occupants in Arabic, English, and hieroglyphics.
translation.pcm: Against di backdrop of fireworks, di mummies“ 18 kings and four queens“ travelled in order of age on purpose-built gold-colored pharaonic chariots, equipped wit an air ride suspension system to absorb vibrations, and bearing di name of dia occupants in Arabic, English, and hieroglyphics.

translation.en: Seqenenre Tao II, who reigned over Upper Egypt around 1,600 BCE, led the parade, while Ramses IX, who ruled in the 12th century BCE, brought up the rear.
translation.pcm: Seqenenre Tao II wey rule Upper Egypt around 1,600 BCE, lead di parade, as Ramses ix, wey rule for di 12th century BCE bring up di rear.

translation.en: In line with strict international standards for the transport of artifacts, the royal remains were placed in state-of-the-art sterile display cases to guarantee their immaculate preservation.
translation.pcm: As e follow di strict international standard for di transport of artifacts, dem place di royal remain for state-of-the-art sterile display cases to guarantee dem immaculate preservation.

translation.en: Accompanying the mummies were 60 motorcycles, 150 horses, and a pharaonic music ensemble conducted by renowned Egyptian maestro Nader Abbassi.
translation.pcm: Na  60 motorcycles, 150 horses, and a pharaonic music ensemble wey  renowned Egyptian maestro Nader Abbassiconduct follow di mummie.

translation.en: The procession commenced with a 21-gun salute, circled the obelisk at the nearby Tahrir Square, and then proceeded along the Nile to NMEC, where Egyptian President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi personally welcomed the mummies to their new permanent home in Fustat, the National Museum of Egyptian Civilization.
translation.pcm: Di procession start with a 21-gun salute, circled the obelisk for di  Tahrir Square wey dey close, and then proceeded along di Nile to NMEC, wia Egyptian President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi personally welkom di mummies to dia new permanent home in Fustat, di National Museum of Egyptian Civilization.

translation.en: The 40-minute parade drew participation of 12 Egyptian celebrities, being broadcast by 200+ global TV channels.
translation.pcm: Di parade wey last for 40-minutes catch participation of 12 celeb for inside Egypt, as 200+ global TV channels broadcast am.

translation.en: The priceless artifacts will spend the next two weeks in NMECs laboratory, where they will be prepared for installation inside the Royal Mummies Hall, modeled on the Valley of the Kings.
translation.pcm: Di pricelees artifact dem go spend di next two weeks for di NMECs laboratory, wia dem go prepare dem for installation inside di Royal Mummies Hall, wey dey for di valley of di kings.

translation.en: The Royal Mummies Hall will open to visitors on April 18, coinciding with World Heritage Day.
translation.pcm: Dem go open di Royal Mummies Hall to visitors for April 18, wey don jam with World Heritage Day.

translation.en: To promote its launch, NMEC offers a 50 percent discount on entry ticket prices to the Central Exhibition Hall for all visitors from April 4 to 17.
translation.pcm: To promote di launch, NMEC dey offer 50 percent discount for entry ticket price to di Central Exhibition Hall for visitor from April 4 go enter 17.

translation.en: In addition, representatives of local and international media have the opportunity to photograph and film the artifacts inside the Central Exhibition Hall for free on April 4 and 5.
translation.pcm: To add join, representatives of local and international media get di opportunity to take picture and video di artifacts inside di Central Exhibition Hall for free on April 4 and 5.

translation.en: Overlooking Ain Al Sira in the heart of the historical city of Fustat near the Babylon Fortress, NMEC is one of the largest and most important archeology museums in the world, and the first to span the entirety of the Egyptian civilization.
translation.pcm: Overlooking Ain Al Sirafor di heart of di historical city of ustat wey near Babylon Fortress, NMEC na one of di largets and most important archeology museums wey dey di world. and di first to last for di whole civilization for inside Egypt.

translation.en: Uproar in Kano prison over illicit drugs
translation.pcm: Uproar apun for Kano prison concerning illicit drugs

translation.en: There was pandemonium in Kano central prison at Kurmawa on Thursday evening over illicit drugs.
translation.pcm: Pandemonium be dey inside Kano central prison for Kurmawa for Thursday evening over bad drug.

translation.en: The uproar is said to have started when the prison warders detected and seized cannabis, allegedly brought to the inmates Thursday evening.
translation.pcm: Di uproar begin when di warder dem for inside di prison be detect and sieze cannabis, wey dem allege say dem bring for inmate for Thursday evening.

translation.en: When contacted, the Public Relations Officer of the Nigerian Correctional Service (NCoS) in Kano state, Musbahu Lawal Kofar Nasarawa, confirmed the issue, adding that they have already set up a committee to find out how the cannabis got into the centre.
translation.pcm: When dem contact am, di Public Relations Officer of di Nigerian Correctional Service (NCoS) inside Kano state, Musbahu Lawal Kofar Nasarawa, confirm di matter, e add say dem don set committee to take find out how di cannabis take enter into di centre.

translation.en: He said, Someone brought cannabis to the prisoners and our operatives confiscated it, so they started an uproar, asking for us to give them.
translation.pcm: He tok say, pesin bring cannabis enter di prison and awa operative dem kolekt am, so dem begin shout, dem tok say make we give dem.

translation.en: We have already set up a committee to find out how such an illicit drug got into the house; whether it was put in some of the food brought to the prisoners or someone connived with our operatives.
translation.pcm: We don set up committee already to take find out how dat kind illicit drug get into di house; whether dem put am inside di food wey dem bring come for one of di prisoner or pesin conive wit some of awa operatives.

translation.en: The action has nothing with jailbreak, it is just an uproar we have already reinforced order back to the custodial centre, he added.
translation.pcm: Di action no get anything with jailbreak, na just uproar, we don already reinforce order back for inside custodial centre, as e add.

translation.en: There were rumours however that the prisoners wanted to break the jail in their attempt to escape while resisting the food they say they are being served to break their fast, despite collecting huge donations from philanthropists.
translation.pcm: Rumour e dey say di prisoner dem wan break di jail to take attempt to escape as dem dey reject di food wey dem give dem to take break fast, on top say dem kolekt bug donation from philantropist dem.

translation.en: The NCoS spokesperson however debunked the rumours, describing them as baseless.
translation.pcm: Di toktok pesin for NCoS don debunk di rumour, e describe dem as baseless.

translation.en: Daily Trust reports that the over 100 years prison situated at Kurmawa area, just behind Emir's Palace in the metropolis is the biggest custodial centre in the state.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust be report say di 100 years prison wey dey for Kurmawa area, behind Palace of Emir for di metropolis na di biggest custodial centre for inside di state.

translation.en: FG seeks global action against terrorism, drug trafficking
translation.pcm: FG dey call for  global action against terrorism, drug trafficking

translation.en: The federal government has urged world leaders to strengthen international cooperation as part of efforts to successfully combat terrorism and drug trafficking as well as other forms of crimes.
translation.pcm: Di federal goment don urge world leaders dem to give international cooperation strength as part of effort to successfully fight terrorism and to dey carry drugs, plus oda kind of crimes dem.

translation.en: This is even as Nigeria expressed concerns over the incidence of illicit financial flows from developing to developed economies of the world.
translation.pcm: Dis one na even as Nigeria take express concern over di incident of bad financial flow from economy wey dey develop to economy wey don already develop for di world.

translation.en: These were parts of the positions presented by Nigeria at the ongoing conference by the United Nations Commission on Crime Prevention and Criminal Justice, taking place in Vienna, Austria.
translation.pcm: Dis one dem dey part of di position wey Nigeria present for di conference of United Nations Commission on Crime Prevention and Criminal Justice wey dey go on, for inside Vienna.

translation.en: Spokesman of the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA), Femi Babafemi, quoted the Chairman/Chief Executive of the agency, Brig-Gen.
translation.pcm: Toktok pesin for National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA), Femi Babafemi, be tok as di Chairman/Chief Executive of di agency, Brig-Gen.

translation.en: Mohamed Buba Marwa (Retd), who presented Nigeria's positions on items 6C and 7 at the meeting as saying that while nations deepen cooperation and strengthen the processes of combating the financing of terrorism and prevention of terrorists from benefitting from ransom payments, it was also important for them not to overlook the trafficking in illicit drugs.
translation.pcm: Mohamed Buba Marwa (Retd), wey present di position of Nigeria for item 6C and 7 for di meeting as im tok say as nation dey deepen cooperation and strengthen di processes of combating di financing of terrorism and prevention of terrorists make dem no for benefit from ransom payments, e also dey important for dem make dem no overlook trafficking of bad drug dem.

translation.en: It is also imperative to keep an eye on and control the proliferation of illicit traffic in narcotic drugs, psychotropic substances and other substances of abuse that serve as conflict multipliers leading to escalation of both the scope and intensity of violent activities.
translation.pcm: E also dey necessary t put eye on top and control as illicit traffic dey spread, drug wey dey affect brain, wey dey lead to violence.

translation.en: Nigeria is also worried about the existing and growing links between terrorism and other forms of crime such as corruption, illicit financial flows, money laundering, illicit trafficking in drugs, cybercrime, trafficking in persons and smuggling of migrants, Marwa said.
translation.pcm: Nigeria also dey worry say di link wey dey between terrorism and oda form of crime like corruption, bad flow of money, money laundering, don dey grow, illicit trafficking in drugs, cybercrime, trafficking in pesin dem and smuggling of migrants, as Marwa take tok.

translation.en: Delivering Nigeria's statement on item 6C on Wednesday, Marwa said that as nations renew their desire to improve international cooperation to address all forms of crimes, Nigeria urges all states, once again, to make sincere efforts, to address the root causes, which include; poverty, economic deprivation, inequality, drug abuse, and other socio-economic factors.
translation.pcm: When e dey deliver statement from Nigeria for item 6C on Wednesday, Marwa tok say as nation dem dey renew dem desire to take improve international cooperation to address evri kind crime, Nigeria dey urge all state, once again, to make sincere effort, to address di cause from di root, wey include; poverty, economic deprivation, inequality, drug abuse, plus oda socio-economic factors.

translation.en: While presenting the country's statement on item 7 on Thursday, Marwa said, Nigeria notes with great concern the incidence of illicit financial flows, which go through the financial systems annually, particularly from developing to developed economies.
translation.pcm: When e dey present di statement of di kontri on item 7 for Thursday, Marwa tok say, Nigeria notes with great concern di incidence of illicit financial flows, we dey pass through di financial system evri year, from developing and developed analysis.

translation.en: To dissuade the perpetrators of this anomaly, including financial institutions who act as enablers, state parties should ensure that illicit financial flows, when tracked, do not remain in the custody of enabling financial institutions but should be transferred into an escrow account, preferably in development banks pending return to countries of origin.
translation.pcm: To take advice di pipo wey dey do dis bad, wey include financial institutions wey dey act as enablers, make state parti dem make sure say illicit financial flow, when dem track am, no remain for di custody of financial institution but make dem transform am into escrow account, preferably in development banks pending return to countries of origin.

translation.en: In this regard, we call for the implementation of the recommendations of the FACTI panel in support of asset recovery and the agenda 2030 for sustainable development.
translation.pcm: For dis regard, we dey call for implementation of di recommendation of di facti panel wey dey for support of access recorvery and di agenda 2030 for sustainable development.

translation.en: Timipre Sylva, Kurfi celebrate Chelsea's Champions League victory
translation.pcm: Timipre Sylva, Kurfi celebrate as Chelsea take win  Champions League

translation.en: Two prominent Nigerians, the former Governor of Bayelsa State and present Minister of State for Petroleum, Mr. Timipre Marlin Sylva and the Chairman of Katsina State Football Association, Alhaji Aminu Balele Kurfi were in celebratory mood on Sunday minutes after Chelsea football club won their second UEFA Champions League title.
translation.pcm: Two prominent pipo for inside di former Governor of Bayelsa State and present Minister of State for Petroleum, Mr. Timipre Marlin Sylva and di Chairman of Katsina State Football Association, Alhaji Aminu Balele Kurfi dey better celebrate mood on SUnday afta Chelsea football club don win secodn champions league title.

translation.en: In an all English finals, former champions Chelsea stunned Manchester City 1-0 at the Estadio
translation.pcm: For final wey be all English, former champions Chelsea shock Man City 1-0 for di Estadio

translation.en: do Dragao in Porto to win their second trophy.
translation.pcm: do Dragao for Porto to take win dem second trophy.

translation.en: Kai Havertz, one of the expensive additions from last Summer, scored the decisive goal just before half-time to inflict a third consecutive defeat on Pep Guardiola's City.
translation.pcm: Kai Havertz, wey be one of di expensive addition from last summer, na im score di goal wey decide to put third defeat in a row  on pep Guardiola's City.

translation.en: Moments after the match, the former governor tweeted I supported Chelsea FC for UCL trophy, and it came at no regrets.
translation.pcm: Moments afta di match, di former governor tweet I I supported Chelsea FC for UCL trophy, and I no regret.

translation.en: Kurfi who watched proceedings in Abuja along with Sylva said he created time to watch the match with the former Bayelsa State governor to support and celebrate with him after the match.
translation.pcm: Kurfi wey watch proceedings for Abuja with Sylva  tok say im create time to take watch di match wit di former Bayelsa State governor to support and celebrate wit amm afta di match.

translation.en: I had to go and support him because he is an avid fan of Chelsea.
translation.pcm: I need go support am bikos na avid fan of Chelsea.

translation.en: I am also happy that in the end, he had cause to celebrate.
translation.pcm: I also dey api say for di end, he get reason to fit celebrate.

translation.en: Not many people are aware that His Excellency Timipre Sylva is passionate about sports, especially football.
translation.pcm: No be evribodi know say His Excellency Timipre Sylva get passiona for sports, especially football.

translation.en: On my part, as the Chairman of Katsina State Football Association, I am a father to all supporters of the different clubs in my state.
translation.pcm: For my path, as di Chairman of Katsina State Football Association, I be father to all supporter of different club for my state.

translation.en: I was with Chelsea from where I was loaned to Katsina United.
translation.pcm: I dey wit Chelsea from wia dem loan me go Katsina United.

translation.en: From United, I was loaned to Kurfi Tigers FC and at the moment, I am for every club, said Kurfi on a lighter mood.
translation.pcm: From United, dem loan me go Kufri Tigers, and presently, I dey for every club, as Kufri take tok like play like play.

translation.en: Uganda election: President Museveni in early lead, rival alleges fraud
translation.pcm: Election for inside Uganda: President Museveni dey get early lead, rival dem tok say na fraud

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni took an early lead in Uganda's presidential election, according to preliminary results released on Friday morning by the electoral commission.
translation.pcm: President Yoweri Museveni don take early lead inside pesidential election for Ugand, according to result wey first dey enter from di electoral commission for Friday morning.

translation.en: This is as his main rival said he had proof that the poll had been marred by fraud.
translation.pcm: Dis one na as im main rival don tok he get proof say fraud don enter di election.

translation.en: With 29.4 per cent of votes from Thursday's ballot counted, Museveni had won 1,852,263 votes, or 63.9 per cent while main opposition candidate Bobi Wine had 821,874 or 28.4 per cent, the commission said just after 11.00 a.m. (0800 GMT).
translation.pcm: As e don get 29.4 per cent of votes from ballot wey dem vote on Thursday, Museveni don win 1,852,263 votes, or 63.9 per cent as main opposition candidate wey be Bobi Wine get 821,874 or 28.4 per cent, as di commission take tok just afta 11.00 a.m. (0800 GMT).

translation.en: Wine alleges fraud
translation.pcm: Wine allege fraud

translation.en: Wine, a singer-turned-lawmaker who has galvanised young Ugandans with calls for political change, told a news conference on Friday he had filmed proof of fraud during voting and that he wanted a peaceful outcome to the vote.
translation.pcm: Wine wey be singer wey kom becom lawmaker wey don kolobi young Uganda pipo wit call for political change, tell news conference on top Friday say he get video of proof say fraud dey durin di vote, and say na as di vote go end in peace im want.

translation.en: He had said in a tweet early in the day that he was confident of victory despite widespread fraud and violence.
translation.pcm: He don tok am for one tweet early say he get confidence say im go win despite say fraud and violence plenty.

translation.en: Museveni, who has led the East African country with a population of nearly 46 million for 34 years, had not made any statement by noon.
translation.pcm: Museveni, wey don lead di kontri for inside East Africa for wey get 46 million pipo for 34 years neva tok anytin as at noon.

translation.en: Internet blackout
translation.pcm: Internet blackout

translation.en: On Wednesday, the government ordered an internet blackout until further notice, a day after banning all social media and messaging apps.
translation.pcm: For Wednesday, di goment order say make dem block internet till further notice, a day afta dem ban all social media and messagin app dem.

translation.en: Wine and his supporters used Facebook to relay live coverage of his campaigns and news conference after he said many media outlets had declined to host him.
translation.pcm: Wine and im supporters use Facebook to take show live coverage of im campaigns and news conference afta he tok say many media outlets no gree to host am.

translation.en: The election campaign was marred by deadly crackdowns by security forces on opposition candidates and their supporters.
translation.pcm: Dem spoil di election campaign wit deadly crackdown on top opposition candidates and dem supporters dem.

translation.en: Uganda's normally bustling capital Kampala was quiet on Friday, a public holiday after Thursday's poll, with shops mostly closed.
translation.pcm: Di capital for Uganda wey be Kampala wey dey buble normally dey quiet for Friday, wey be public holiday afta di vote for Thursday, as dem close most shop dem.

translation.en: Soldiers patrolled on foot in the rain in a suburb visited by Reuters.
translation.pcm: Soldiers dem patroll wit  leg  for  inside rain in a suburb wey Reuters visit.

translation.en: Commission head, Simon Byabakama, assured the nation on live TV on Thursday evening after polls closed that results were arriving at the national tally centre despite the nationwide internet blackout.
translation.pcm: Commission head, Simon Byabakama, assure di nation on top live TV for Thursday evening afta polls don close say result don dey  enter for di national tally centre despite di nationwide internet blackout.

translation.en: We are not using local internet to transmit our results, we are using our own system, he said, without giving details of that system.
translation.pcm: We no dey use local internet to take transmit result, we dey use awa own system,  as e tok, without say we give details of di system.

translation.en: Don't worry, results will come, Byabakama added
translation.pcm: No wori, result go come, Byabakama tok join

translation.en: New wave of pandemic hits more of Japan's prefectures
translation.pcm: New wave of pandemic don hit more for inside Japan prefecture dem.

translation.en: Japan is set to expand the current state of emergency to three more prefectures, the government said on Friday,
translation.pcm: Japan donreadi to expand di present state of emergency to cover three more prefectur dem, as di goment tok for Friday.

translation.en: This is as the coronavirus infections continued to hit wider regions of the country ahead of this summer's Tokyo Olympics.
translation.pcm: Dis dey follow as di infection of coronavirus don dey wide for inside di kontri ahead of Tokyo Olympics for summer.

translation.en: The prefectures of Hokkaido, Okayama and Hiroshima were likely to be under the measure from Sunday to the end of May, Economic Revitalisation Minister, Yasutoshi Nishimura, told reporters.
translation.pcm: Di prefecture for inside Hokkaido, Okayama and Hiroshima dey likely to get di measure from Sunday go enter end of May, as Economic Revitalisation Minister, Yasutoshi Nishimura, tell news pipo.

translation.en: A panel of experts endorsed the proposal, said Nishimura, who was in charge of the government's coronavirus response.
translation.pcm: One panel of experts endorse di proposal, as Nishimura wey dey in charge of di coronavirus response by di goment take tok.

translation.en: The northern island of Hokkaido reported a record 712 new infections on Thursday while the western prefecture of Hiroshima also saw a record 219 new cases on Wednesday.
translation.pcm: Di northern island of Hokkaido report recordof  712 new infection on  Thursday as di western prefecture of Hiroshima also see record of 219 new cases for Wednesday.

translation.en: Surging infections prompted Hiroshima and Okayama to cancel next week's torch relay on their public roads.
translation.pcm: As di infection dey grow make Hiroshima and Okayama cancel torch relay wey suppose apun for nest week for dem public road dem.

translation.en: International Olympic Committee President, Thomas Bach, was scheduled to participate in a torch relay event in Hiroshima on May 17.
translation.pcm: International Olympic Committee President, Thomas Bach, suppose to participate for di torch relay event in Hiroshima on May 17.

translation.en: However, Bach's travel to Japan ahead of the Games has been postponed, local organisers said.
translation.pcm: However, local organizer dem tok say dem don postpone Bach travel to Japan before di games.

translation.en: The postponement is coming as the government extended the state of emergency in Tokyo and three other prefectures until the end of May and added two more regions Aichi, Fukuoka to the measure.
translation.pcm: Di postpone na as di goment take extend di state of emergency inside Tokyo plus three oda prefectures dem until until di end of May, and dem add two more regions wey be Aichi, Fukuoka for inside di measure.

translation.en: The government declared the state of emergency in the four prefectures in late April, requesting bars and restaurants refrain from serving alcohol and offering a karaoke service.
translation.pcm: Di goment declare di state of emergency for di four prefectures dem for inside April, dem request make bar and restaurant stop to dey serve alchohol and make dem no dye offer karaoke service again.

translation.en: Experts warned of the rapid spread of more contagious variants, especially as the roll-out of coronavirus vaccines has been extremely slow in Japan since its launch in mid-February.
translation.pcm: Experts dem don give warning of say variants wey dey more contagious fit spread quick, especially as dem dey take roll coronavirus vaccine dey very slowsince dem launch am for mid-February.

translation.en: Only one per cent of Japan's
translation.pcm: Only one per cent of Japan's

translation.en: 125 million populations have been fully vaccinated.
translation.pcm: Dem don vaccinate 125 million of pipo fully.

translation.en: Jigawa's mechanised farm to benefit local farmers
translation.pcm: Farmers go benefit from mechanised farm for inside Jigawa

translation.en: The Malam Alu Agro Allied Company, a farm sitting on a 100-hectare land in Faru village, along Maiduguri road, Birnin Kudu Local Government Area of Jigawa State, is changing the perception of mechanised farming in Nigeria, Mansur Dau Aliyu, the company's Group General Manager (GGM) said.
translation.pcm: Di Malam Alu Agro Allied Company, wey be farm wey dey on top 100-hectare of land inside Faru village, along Maiduguri road, Birnin Kudu Local Government Area of Jigawa State, don dey change di prception inside mechanised farming for Nigeria, di GM for di Mansur Dau Aliyu tok.

translation.en: The establishment of the farm almost five years ago, it was gathered, was a direct response to the call by the President Muhammadu Buhari-led administration for Nigerians to return to agriculture as the mainstay of the nation's economy, rather than relying solely on oil as the only source of revenue for the country.
translation.pcm: As dem take establish di farm almost five years ago, as we gather, na direct response to di call by di administration of President Muhammadu Buhari tok say make Nigeria return to agriculture as di mainstay of di economy for inside di nation, pass as dem dey rely on top iol as di source of revenue for inside di kontri.

translation.en: Each cattle has a number tag attached to its ear
translation.pcm: Each cattle get nomba tag wey dem attach to am for ear.

translation.en: The company's founder, Farouk Adamu Aliyu, a former member of the House of Representatives keyed into this, the GGM added.
translation.pcm: Founder for di company, Farouk Adamu Aliyu, wey be former member for inside House of Representative key into am, di GGM add.

translation.en: We do greenhouse farming.
translation.pcm: We dey do greenhouse farming.

translation.en: We have a 10,000 square-metre fully automated soilless greenhouse, where we produce tomatoes.
translation.pcm: We get 10,000 square-metre wey be fully automated soilles greenhouse, wia we dey produce tomato.

translation.en: We also have two 250 square-metre greenhouses where we produce other greenhouse vegetables, and another 500 square-metre greenhouse, which is being used as a nursery.
translation.pcm: We also get two 250 square-metre greenhouses wia we dey produce oda greenhouse vegetable dem, plus anoda 500 square-metre greenhouse, wey we dey use as nursery.

translation.en: These greenhouses are all foreign-oriented, which have been installed to produce a variety of vegetables.
translation.pcm: Dis greenhouse dem na all dey foreign-oriented, wey we don install to take produce variety of vegetable.

translation.en: We produce only tomatoes from the 10,000 square automated soilless greenhouses; and we produce an average of 10 to 11 tons of tomatoes every week.
translation.pcm: Na only tomato wey dey produce for di 10,000 square automated soilless greenhousedem; and we produce an average of 10 to 11 ton of tomato evri week.

translation.en: We also have another 10,000 square-metre locally fabricated greenhouse.
translation.pcm: We be get anoda 10,000 square-metre locally fabricated greenhouse.

translation.en: We also have a livestock section, where we have about 300 herds of cattle, some camels, goats and sheep, he said.
translation.pcm: We also get livestock section, wia we get over 300 herds of cattle, some camel, goat and sheep, as e take tok am.

translation.en: Daily Trust gathered that the farm also has a fishery unit, with about 50,000 fishes inside the pond.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust hear say di farm also get fishery unit, with about 50,000 fish inside di pond.

translation.en: Similarly, a forty-ton per hour fertilizer blending plant installed earlier in the year, it was gathered, now produces close to 300 loads of NPK fertilizer under the Presidential Fertilizer Initiative.
translation.pcm: Similarly, one forty-ton per hour fertilizer blending plant wey dem install for early part of di year, as we take hear, don dey produce reach 300 loads of NPK fertilizer under di Presidential Fertilizer Initiative.

translation.en: We have also imported equipment for the installation of 120,000 capacity poultry system.
translation.pcm: We don import equipment wey fit install 120,000 capacity for poultry system.

translation.en: We hope to be producing between 3,000-4,000 crates of eggs daily, Mansur said.
translation.pcm: We hope say we go dey produce reach between 3,000-4,000 crates of egg for inside one day, as Mansur take tok.

translation.en: The farm, he said, also has a diary production plant, which is for the production of about 2,000 litres of milk a day, adding that there are also about 150-200 hectares of land elsewhere meant for open field farming for real cultivation of rice and other crops.
translation.pcm: He tok say di farm, also get plant wia dem dey do diary, wey dey produce 2,000 litres of milk inside one day, he add say dem also get about 150-200 hectres of land elsewia wey dem leave for open field farming plus cultivation of rice and oda crops dem.

translation.en: Mansur disclosed that the major clientele for the tomato are premium customers, notably big hotels in Abuja, Lagos, and some other locations.
translation.pcm: Masur tok say major pipo wey dey buy di tomato na premium customers, notably, big big hotel for inside Abuja and Lagos, plus some oda location.

translation.en: He confirmed, however, that the main market for the products was mainly in the eastern part of the country, such as Enugu, Onitsha, Owerri.
translation.pcm: He confirm, however, say di main market for di product na mainly inside eastern part of di kontri like Enugu, Onitsha, Owerri.

translation.en: He admitted, however, that besides the few customers they have in Kano, their tomato products are rarely seen in the local markets for some reason.
translation.pcm: However, he admit say apart from di small customers dem wey dem get for Kano, dem no too dey see dem tomato product for local market fpr some kind reason.

translation.en: First is the fact that the tomato produced from the farm is of special species and the second reason is the fact that Jigawa is a major tomato-producing area.
translation.pcm: First na di fact say di tomato wey dem produce form dem farm na special specie and di second reason be di fact say Jigawa na major area wey dem for dey produce tomato.

translation.en: You know that tomato is a common product around here, so our price is a little higher than what is obtained normally in the open market.
translation.pcm: You know say tomato na common product for here, so ouw price high small pass wetin dey open market.

translation.en: So, essentially, people don't actually look at us, they feel apprehensive of what we have because they believe they are expensive.
translation.pcm: So, essentially, pipo no actually dye look awa side, dem dey fell apprehensive wit wetin we get bikos dem believe say e dey cost.

translation.en: And when you have a product that is commonly available, people will surely go for the cheaper brand.
translation.pcm: And when you get product wey dey available for evriwia, e sure say pipo go buy di one wey cheap pass.

translation.en: A farm hand feeds the fishes
translation.pcm: Na one farm hand dey feed di fish dem.

translation.en: Asked of the average lifespan of their tomato products, he said, If you give the tomato all it requires, I mean nutritional supplements you feed it with while it is growing, if you give it all those things, this tomato could last up to three weeks post-harvest.
translation.pcm: As dem ask about di average lifespan of dem tomato product, he tok say, if you give di tomato evritin wey e take, i mean say nutrional supplement wey you take feed am as e dey grow, if you give am all of dis things dem, di tomato fit last reach three weeks afta harvest.

translation.en: But even without that, it lasts for a minimum of a week, not under any refrigeration, but surely not under intense pressure and heat.
translation.pcm: But even without am, e go last for minimum of one week, no be for refrigeration, and no be for inside presure and plenty heat.

translation.en: You can keep it on the table where you have good ventilation.
translation.pcm: You fit put am on top table wia better ventilation dey.

translation.en: It can last an average of 10 days, but with everything provided as required (all nutrients) it could last up to one month.
translation.pcm: E fit last for average of 10 days, but if dem provide evritin as e take require (evri nutrient) e fit last reach one month.

translation.en: This we have experimented, but then, you don't get it as you always want it.
translation.pcm: We don experiment am, but then, e no dey apun as you dey always want.

translation.en: The farm is also a source of employment for as many as 200 people in the village where it is located.
translation.pcm: Di farm na source of employment for pipo wey reach 200 inside di village wia dem locate am.

translation.en: He also said the company got some people to train the youth in the area on information technology skills.
translation.pcm: He also tok say di company get some pipo to kom train di youth for di araea on information technology skil dem.

translation.en: He further said most of the equipment used on the farm were imported from Turkey, except the fertilizer-blending machine, which was imported from China.
translation.pcm: He tok further say most of di equipment wey dem use for di farm na from Turkey, except di fertilizer-blending machine, wey dem import from China.

translation.en: Even the farming method is modeled after the Turkish style of operation because we have a Turkish partner that is helping in maintaining the standards, he said, but quickly added that the company was conscious of the need to have Nigerians run the technical aspect of its operations.
translation.pcm: He tok say even di farming method na like as e be for Turkey, bikos dem get Turkish partner wey dey help dem to maintain di standard, but quickly he add say di company dey conscious to allow Nigeria pipo to dey run di tachnical aspect of im operation.

translation.en: Reflecting on the effect of COVID-19 on the operations of the company, Mansur said, Malam Alu, just like other corporate entities in the country, suffered from the devastating effects of the virus.
translation.pcm: As e dey reflect on top di effect of COVID-19 on top di operation of di company, Mansur tok say, Malam Alu, as oda corporate entities for di kontri, suffer from devastating effect of di virus.

translation.en: For Mansur, youths in Nigeria have no excuse to remain unemployed with the opportunity provided by agriculture, noting that those hoping to secure a white-collar job should adjust to the reality and go back to agriculture.
translation.pcm: For Mansur, youth for Nigeria no get excuse to remain unemployed with di kind opportunity wey agriculture dey provide, e note say di pipo wey dey lokk for white-collar job make dem adjust to di reality and go back to agriculture.

translation.en: He believes Nigeria is now doing what it ought to have done a long time ago, noting that if the country had taken this step, the current economic crisis would have been averted.
translation.pcm: He believe say Nigeria don dey do wetin im suppose to done do long time before, e note say if di kontri don take dis step, dem for don corner di present economic wahala.

translation.en: 2023: Lawmaker seeks better deal for Southern Kaduna
translation.pcm: 2023: Lawmaker to seek better deal for Southern Kaduna

translation.en: The member representing Jaba Constituency in the Kaduna State House of Assembly, Samson Monday Dikko, has called on people of goodwill to come together and map out strategies that would salvage the Southern Kaduna Senatorial District and its people in 2023.
translation.pcm: Di member wey dey represent Jaba Constituency for di State House of Assembly for inside Kaduna, wey be Samson Monday Dikko, he call on better pipo to kom togeda and map out strategies wey go salvage Southern Kaduna Senatorial District and dem pipo for 2023.

translation.en: Speaking after a meeting with stakeholders in Kagoro, Kaura Local Government Area of Kaduna State at the weekend, Dikko, who is aspiring to be a senator on the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), said Southern Kaduna people have been abandoned by those who ought to take care of them.
translation.pcm: As e tok afta one meeting wit stakeholders for Kagoro, Kaura Local Government Area for Kaduna State for di weekend, Dikko, wey dey aspire to be senator for inside di Peoples Democratic party (PDP), tok say di pipo wey suppose care for Southern Kaduna pipo don abandon dem.

translation.en: This is the time for the entire Southern Kaduna people to get it right.
translation.pcm: Na di time for di entire Southern Kaduna pipo to get am right.

translation.en: We need to transform our region and improve security, education, health, agriculture, economy, employment and empowerment for the teeming youths in conjunction with reputable non-governmental organizations, he added.
translation.pcm: We need to transform awa region and improve security, education, health, agriculture, economy, employment and empowerment for di teeming youth and we go do am wit non-governmnetal organization wey get name, as e take add.

translation.en: The Director-General of the Dikko Campaign Organisation, Timothy Chindo Kwassam, said the destiny of the people of Kaduna South Senatorial District would be in their own hands if Dikko represents them at the Senate in 2023.
translation.pcm: Di Director-General of di Campaign Organisation for Dikko, wey be Timothy Chindo Kwassam, tok say di destiny of di pipo of Kaduna South Senatorial District go deu dem own hand if Dikko represent dem for inside senate for 2023.

translation.en: For everything under the sun, there is a season.
translation.pcm: For evrithing wey dey under di sun, e get reason.

translation.en: So, the coming of Dikko at this critical period of time is not a mere coincidence, but a divine plan by God to liberate the region from all that has hindered it from growing and competing with other regions, Kwassam said.
translation.pcm: So as Dikko dey kom for dis critical period of time no be ordinary coincidence, but na divine play from God to take liberate di region from evrithing wey dey hinder am from growing and to compete with oda region dem, na so Kwassam tok.

translation.en: 3 Africans, no Nigerian as City, Chelsea contest UEFA Champions League finals
translation.pcm: 3 Africa pesin, no Nigeria pesin dey among, as City, Chelsea dey contest UEFA Champions League final

translation.en: Without doubt, enthusiastic football fans in Nigeria are eagerly awaiting tonights finals of the 2020/2021 UEFA Champions League finals to be contested between two English clubs, Manchester City and Chelsea at the Estadio do Dragao, Porto in Portugal.
translation.pcm: No doubt say football fans dem for inside Nigeria dey wait eagerly for di 2020/2021 UEFA Champions League finals wey go apun tonight wey two English clubs dem Manchester City and Chelsea go contest for inside di Estadio do Dragao, Porto in Portugal.

translation.en: In view of the fact that the UEFA Champions League is one of the world's biggest football competitions only next to the FIFA World Cup and the Olympics football event, there is increasing level of expectations as the giants of the English Premier League get set to tussle for the prestigious diadem.
translation.pcm: With view of di fact say UEFA Champions League na one of di biggest football competition only next to FIFA World Cup and di Olympic football event, level of expectation don dey increase as giant for inside English Premier League don dey set to fight for di di prestigious diadem.

translation.en: While Manchester City are yet to win the Champions League title, Chelsea won their first and only title so far in 2012.
translation.pcm: As Manchestre City neva win Champions league title before, chelsea win dem first and only title for 2012.

translation.en: Therefore, even as football pundits have tipped City who have just won their seventh Premiership title to win tonight, Chelsea will be coming into the contest with better credentials.
translation.pcm: Therefore, even as football pundits dem don tip City wey just win premiership number seven to win dis night, Chelsea go enter into di contest wit betta credentials.

translation.en: They are former champions.
translation.pcm: Dem be former chsmpion.

translation.en: However, while Thomas Tuchel who leads the Chelsea technical crew is yet to taste Champions League victory, his opponent in the Manchester City dugout, Pep Guardiola is a two time winner.
translation.pcm: However, as Thomas Tuchel wey dey lead technical crew for inside Chelsea neva win Champions league, im opponent for inside Manchester City dugout, Pep Guardiola don win am two times.

translation.en: He won it in 2009 and 2010 with Barcelona.
translation.pcm: He win am with Barcelona for 2009 and for 2010.

translation.en: Therefore, there is so much to expect from the actors who will be out there on the field of Estadio
translation.pcm: Therefore, plenty dey to expect from di actors dem wey go komot enter di field for Estadio.

translation.en: do Dragao in Porto and the men in charge of the technical areas.
translation.pcm: do Dragao for Porto and di men dem wey go take charge of di technical area.

translation.en: Interestingly, even as both contestants parade only three African players in Riyad Mahrez (Algeria, Manchester City), Hakim Ziyech (Morococo, Chelsea) and Edourad Menday (
translation.pcm: Interestingly, even as both contestants get only three African players in Riyad Mahrez (Algeria, Manchester City), Hakim Ziyech (Morococo, Chelsea) and Edourad Menday (

translation.en: Senegal, Chelsea) Africans interest in the finals has dropped.
translation.pcm: Senegal, Chelsea) di interest of Africa for di final don drop.

translation.en: Here in Nigerian where Chelsea and Manchester City enjoy a large following from passionate football fans, expectations have reached feverish point, leading to interesting re-alignments.
translation.pcm: For Nigeria here, wia Chelsea and Manchester City dey enjoy plenty followers dem from passionate football fans dem, expection don dey cause fever, and e don lead to interestin realignment.

translation.en: Fans of those European clubs that were eliminated from the Champions League at different stages have re-aligned themselves with either Chelsea or Manchester City based on divergent interests.
translation.pcm: Fans of di oda clubus wey dem don komot for oda stages of di Champions League do re-align demselve with either Chelsea or Manchester City as dem interest take dey diverse reach.

translation.en: Consequently, the finals is one of the most discussed topics in sporting circles in Nigeria at the moment as fans of the Premiership clubs continue to predict what would be the final result.
translation.pcm: Di consequence be say di final na one of di topic wey dem dey tok pass for inside sports at di moment and fans of di premiereship club don kontinu to dey predict as di finalresult fit be.

translation.en: However, while almost everyone is waiting to savour the football artistry that is possibly going to be on display, some pundits are worried by the increasing decline in the number of African players in the finals of one of the biggest football competitions on earth.
translation.pcm: However, as be like say almost evribodi don dey wait to savour the football artistry wey dem fit display, some pundits dem dey as nomba of African players for di final of di biggest football competition for earth don dey reduce.

translation.en: Going by the history of the UEFA Champions League, only 24 African footballers have contested and won the trophy with their European clubs.
translation.pcm: If we follow history for inside UEFA Champions League, na only 24 African footballer dem don contest and win di trophy with dem European clubs.

translation.en: Sadly African football  legends like Liberia's George Weah who was voted World Footballer of the year in 1995,
translation.pcm: E sad say African football  legends like Liberia's George Weah wey dem vote as World Footballer of di year for 1995,

translation.en: Nigeria's Rashidi Yekini, Egypt's Mohamed Aboutrika, Roger Mila of Cameroon, Jay-Jay Okocha, Sunday Oliseh, Taribo West and Victor Ikpeba of Nigeria, Rigobert Song of Cameroon and Hassam Hassan of Egypt failed to win the Champions League despite their football prowess.
translation.pcm: Rashidi Yekini of Nigeria, Mohamed Aboutrika of Egypt, Roger Mila of Cameroon, Jay-Jay Okocha, Sunday Oliseh, Taribo West and Victor Ikpeba of Nigeria, Rigobert Song of Cameroon and Hassam Hassan of Egypt no win Champions League as dem sabi ball reach.

translation.en: Although Mo Salah (Egypt), Sadio Mane (Senegal), Joel Matip (Cameroon) and Naby Keita (Guinea) were on the big stage when Liverpool won their 6th UEFA Champions League title in 2019, the first African to have won the trophy was Bruce Grobbelaar of Zimbabwe.
translation.pcm: Although Mo Salah (Egypt), Sadio Mane (Senegal), Joel Matip (Cameroon) and Naby Keita (Guinea) dey di big stage when Liverpool be win dem 6th UEFa Champions league title for 2019, di first African wey win di trophy na Bruce Grobbelaar of Zimbabwe.

translation.en: He achieved the feat in 1984 with Liverpool.
translation.pcm: He achieve di feat with Liverpool for 1984.

translation.en: He was followed by Algerian legend Rabah Madjer who won it with FC Porto in 1987 and Abedi Pele (Ghana) in 1993 with Olympique Marseille before Nigeria's
translation.pcm: Na Algerian legend Rabah Madjer wey win am with FC Porto for 1987 and Abedi Pele (Ghana) for 1993 with Olympique Marseille follow am, before Nigeria

translation.en: duo of George Findi and Nwankwo Kanu lifted it with Ajax Amsterdam in 1995.
translation.pcm: duo of George Findi and Nwankwo Kanu lift am  with Ajax Amsterdam for 1995.

translation.en: It is also on record that Geremi Njitap of Cameroon was the first African to win the title twice in 2000 and 2002 with Spanish giants Real Madrid before Samuel Eto'o of Cameroon won it thrice with Barcelona 2006, 2009 and 2010 with Inter Milan.
translation.pcm: E also dey record say na Geremi Njitap of Cameroon be di first African to win di title twice in 2000 and 2002 with Spanish giants Real Madrid, Samuel Eto'o of Cameroon kom win am three times with Barcelona 2006, 2009 and 2010 with Inter Milan.

translation.en: Other African winners of the highly coveted trophy are Ibrahim Tanko (Ghana)
translation.pcm: Oda African wey don win di highky coveted trophy na Ibrahim Tanko (Ghana)

translation.en: Borussia Dortmund 1997, Samuel Kuffour (Ghana) Bayern Munich 2001, Benni McCarthy (South Africa) FC Porto 2004, Djimi Traore (Mali
translation.pcm: Borussia Dortmund 1997, Samuel Kuffour (Ghana) Bayern Munich 2001, Benni McCarthy (South Africa) FC Porto 2004, Djimi Traore (Mali

translation.en: ) Liverpool 2005, Yaya Toure (Cote d'Ivoire)
translation.pcm: ) Liverpool 2005, Yaya Toure (Cote d'Ivoire)

translation.en: Barcelona 2009 & 2011, Seydou Keita (Mali) Barcelona 2009 & 2011, Sully Muntari (Ghana)
translation.pcm: Barcelona 2009 & 2011, Seydou Keita (Mali) Barcelona 2009 & 2011, Sully Muntari (Ghana)

translation.en: Inter Milan 2010 and McDonald Mariga (Kenya) 2010.
translation.pcm: Inter Milan 2010 and McDonald Mariga (Kenya) 2010.

translation.en: John Mikel Obi (Nigeria), Michael Essien (Ghana), Salomon Kalou (Cote d'Ivoire), Didier Drogba (Cote d'Ivoire) who won it with Chelsea in 2012 and Achraf Hakimi (Morocco), with Real Madrid 2018 complete the list of Africans who have won the UEFA Champions League.
translation.pcm: John Mikel Obi (Nigeria), Michael Essien (Ghana), Salomon Kalou (Cote d'Ivoire), Didier Drogba (Cote d'Ivoire) wey win am with Chelsea for 2012 and Achraf Hakimi (Morocco), with Real Madrid 2018 complete di list of Africans wey don win di UEFA Champions League.

translation.en: Coming closer home, the last time a Nigerian won the trophy was in 2012 when Mikel Obi was among the quartet of Africans who lifted it with Chelsea at the expense of Bayern Munich.
translation.pcm: To come close to home, di last time wey Nigeria pesin win di trophy na 2012 when Mikel Obi dey among AFricans wey lift di trophy with Chelsea at di expense of Bayern Munich.

translation.en: After that achievement by the former captain of the Super Eagles, Nigeria has seen the rise of other immensely talented players like Ahmed Musa, Wilfred Ndidi, Kelechi Iheanacho, Alex Iwobi, William Troost-Ekong, Leon Balogun, Ola Aina, Isaac Success, Chigozie Awaziem, Tyrone Ebuehi, Moses Simon and lately Victor Osimhen
translation.pcm: Afta dat achievement by di former captain of Super Eagles, Nigeria do see oda talented players dem rise, like Ahmed Musa, Wilfred Ndidi, Kelechi Iheanacho, Alex Iwobi, William Troost-Ekong, Leon Balogun, Ola Aina, Isaac Success, Chigozie Awaziem, Tyrone Ebuehi, Moses Simon and lately Victor Osimhen

translation.en: but none is yet to feature in the finals of Europe's biggest club competition.
translation.pcm: But none of dem don feature for di final of biggest club competition for Europe.

translation.en: The reason for this is not farfetched.
translation.pcm: Di reason no dey clear.

translation.en: The competition is dominated by the top five clubs in Europe, Real Madrid, Bayern Munich, Barcelona, Manchester United and Liverpool.
translation.pcm: Na di di top five club for Europe Real Madrid, Bayern Munich, Barcelona, Manchester United and Liverpool dominate di competition.

translation.en: Unfortunately, Nigerian players have over the years failed to get into these highly rated European clubs.
translation.pcm: Unfortunately, Nigeria players dem don fail to enter highly rated clubs dem for Europe.

translation.en: It is, therefore, the hope of Nigerian football stakeholders that in no distant future the new generation of players will break all barriers and begin to play for clubs that have potential to win the UEFA Champions League.
translation.pcm: Na hope of Nigeria football stakeholder say very soon di new generation of players dem go break barrier and begin to play for clubs wey get potential to win di UEFA Champions League.

translation.en: If this fails, then football fans in Nigeria will continue to live with the agony of watching finals of the UEFA Champions League come and go without the presence of any Nigerian player.
translation.pcm: If dis one fail, den di football fans wey dey for Nigeria go kontinu to dey live with di agony of watchin finakls of di UEFA Champion League dey kom and dey go, without di presence of any Nigeria player.

translation.en: As Nigerians wait for the next Super Eagles player who will rise to the pinnacle of European club competition the way Find George, Nwankwo Kanu did with Ajax in 1995 and Chelsea's Mikel Obi in 2012, the 2021 all English clubs finals is a few hours away.
translation.pcm: As Nigeria pipo dey wait for di next Super Eagle player wey go rise to di top of di European club competition di way Find George, Nwankwo Kanu do am with Ajax for 1995 and Mikel Obi for 2012, na few hours remain for di 2021 all English clubs final.

translation.en: For di end, victory go dey for di Manchester club wey dey hunt for dem first title ot di Londeners wey dey prime for di second itle and di football league wey dem dey watch pass for di world, Premiership go be ultimate winner.
translation.pcm: For di end, victory go dey for di Manchester club wey dey hunt for dem first title ot di Londeners wey dey prime for di second itle and di football league wey dem dey watch pass for di world, Premiership go be ultimate winner.

translation.en: Enyimba force FC IfeanyiUbah to 2-2 draw in Oriental derby
translation.pcm: Eyimba don force FC IfeanyiUbah to 2-2 draw for di Oriental derby

translation.en: Enyimba FC came from behind to secure a well deserved 2-2 draw in their rescheduled Week 14 fixture against Oriental brothers FC IfeanyiUbah at the Aba International Stadium, Aba,
translation.pcm: Enyimba FC be kom from behind to secure one 2- draw wey dem deserve for dem week 14 fixture wey dem reschedule against oriental broda dem FC IfeanyiUbah for di Aba international stadium,

translation.en: The Oriental Derby saw Enyimba make three changes to the team that lost at Rivers United on Sunday.
translation.pcm: Di orietal derby see say Eyimba make three changes to di team wey loss for Rivers United on Sunday.

translation.en: Sadiq Abubakar returned after weeks of layoff while Anthony Omaka and Victor Mbaoma were restored to the starting lineup.
translation.pcm: Sadiq Abubakar be return afta weeks wey dem don lay am off while Anthony Omaka and Victor Mbaoma enter di starting line up again.

translation.en: The first 28 minutes of the game saw both sides seeking to hit first but the visiting side drew the first blood in the 29th minute through Saidu Adamu who poked home from close range after Uche Onuoha had headed Evans Ogbonda's cross to his path.
translation.pcm: Di first 28 minutes of di game see as both sides dem dey try to hit first but na di visitin side draw first blood through Saidu Adamu wey pokee am home from close range afta Uche Onuoha be head Evans Ogbonda cross go meet am.

translation.en: With the away side in full control of the game, their confidence grew more leaving the hosts scrambling to get back into the game as the first half ended 1-0 in favour of the visitors.
translation.pcm: As di away side get full kontrol of di game, dem get more confidence and dat one leave di host to dey scramble to get back into di game as di first end for 1-0 in favour of di visitors.

translation.en: At the restart of the second half, IfeanyiUbah continued to press for the second goal and were duly rewarded when Saidu Adamu got his brace after getting Awazie's square pass over the line in the 61st minute.
translation.pcm: As dem restart di second half, IfeanyiUbah kontinu to dey press for di second goal and dem get di reward wey dem deserve when Saidu Adamu get im brace afta im get Awazie square pass over di line for di 61st minute.

translation.en: Stung to life by the second goal, Enyimba began to throw in everything in their arsenal to get back into the game.
translation.pcm: As di second goal sting dem to life, Eyimba begin throw evrithing for dem arsenal to get back inside di game.

translation.en: In the 78th minute, their pressure paid off when Reuben Bala reduced the deficit for Enyimba in a rather fortuitous fashion.
translation.pcm: For inside di 78th minute, dem presence pay off as Reuben Bala reduce di deficit for Eyimba for one lucky fashion.

translation.en: His initial header was kept out by Sharp Uzoigwe but the ball ricocheted back to him and over the line.
translation.pcm: Na Sharp Uzoigwe keep out im initial header but di ball roll back to am and ovr di line.

translation.en: The goal gave Enyimba some hope as they continued to press in numbers to at least secure a point
translation.pcm: Di goal be give Eyimba some hope as dem kontinu to press for plunty nomba to secure a point at least

translation.en: and this they got in the 90th minute through Imoh Obot.
translation.pcm: And dem get dis for 90th minute through Imot Obot.

translation.en: Following this result, Enyimba have moved up to 5th position with 31 points from 17 games with two more outstanding matches.
translation.pcm: Following dis result, Eyimba don move up to 5th position with 31 points from 17 games with two more outstandin matches dem.

translation.en: Meanwhile, FC IfeanyiUbah are still rooted in the relegation zone with 17 points from 19 games.
translation.pcm: Meanwhile, FC IfeanyiUbah still dey inside relegation zone as dem get 17 points inside 19 games.

translation.en: Farmers apprehensive as planting season begins with erratic rains
translation.pcm: Farmers dem dey apprehensive as planting season begin with erratic rain dem

translation.en: As wet season begins in most parts of the country, farmers have commenced, planting, albeit with fear following erratic rains, which may threaten production.
translation.pcm: As wet season don begin for most part of di season, farmer don begin palntin with fear as rain dey erratic and e fit threaten production.

translation.en: The rains have been unstable in Benue, Nasarawa, Niger, Kaduna and parts of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), and many farmers have planted their crops.
translation.pcm: Rain dey unsatble for Benue, Nasarawa, Niger, Kaduna and part of di Federal Capital Territory (FCT), and plenty farmer dem don plant dem crop.

translation.en: In the 2019/2020 wet season, erratic rains in the North and mid-season draught in the South-West made farmers lose their money due to crop failure.
translation.pcm: For di 2019/2020 wet season, erratic rain for di north and mid-season draught for di south-west make farmers dem loss money due to crop failure.

translation.en: Musa Yohana and Halima Thomas, farmers in Doma and Lafia, Nasarawa State, said they had planted maize, groundnut and other tuber crops like cassava and yam, but feared they might have another horrible experience like last season when they were forced to plant maize and groundnut two times.
translation.pcm: Musa Yohana and Halima Thomas, farmers for  inside  Doma and Lafia, Nasarawa State, tok say dem don plant maize, groundnut plus oda crops dem like casava and yam but fear say dem fit get anoda horrible experience like last season when dem dey forced to plant maize and groundnut two times.

translation.en: I lost most of my yams last year due to excessive heat as a result of inconsistent rainfall.
translation.pcm: I loss my yam last year due to heat wey dey too much bikos rain no fall welwel.

translation.en: This year, we are in the second week of May but we are yet to have stable rains.
translation.pcm: Dis year, we don dey second week for May but rain neva dey fall welwel.

translation.en: And I have planted 15 measures (about 20kg) of groundnut already.
translation.pcm: And I don already plant 15 measure (about 20kg) of groundnut.

translation.en: If it continues like this for another week, I may lose the seeds, Mr Yohana said.
translation.pcm: If e kontinu like dis for anoda one week, I fit loss all di seed dem, as Mr Yohana take tok.

translation.en: Like them, many farmers around the FCT have also planted, but the fear of crop failure is heightened by their experiences of last year.
translation.pcm: Like dem, plenty farmer around di FCT don plant too, but dem get big fear for crop failure as experience last year.

translation.en: In Benue State, our correspondent reports that farmers have begun to cultivate their lands and plant crops amid complaints of scanty rainfall.
translation.pcm: For Benue state, For Benue state, awa correspondent reprot say farmer don begin to cultivate land and plant crop on top complain say rain no fall.

translation.en: Some farmers who had prepared their farms earlier in the year said they could not start planting crops until one week ago, while others have just begun to till their lands at the wake of rainfall (thrice) within the past two weeks.
translation.pcm: Some farmer wey don prepare dem farm earlier in di tear tok say dem no fit begin to dey plant until one week ago, as odas dem just begin to clear land at di wake of di rainfall three times withing two weeks wey pass.

translation.en: A farmer in Otukpo, Ada Hyacinth, said the ground was still too strong to cultivate because the rains hadn't been frequent.
translation.pcm: One farmer for Otukpo, Ada hyacinth, tok say di ground still dey too strong to cultivate bikos di rain no dey fall frequent.

translation.en: Another farmer, Felix Tor, in Makurdi, said he had just planted melon and maize on his recently ploughed farm despite the inconsistency of the rains.
translation.pcm: Anoda farmer wey be Felix Tor, for Makurdi tok say im just plant melon and maize on di farm wey im just clear despite as rain no dey consistent.

translation.en: Tor, however, expressed fears that the nature of the rainfall might affect the well-being of the crop.
translation.pcm: Tor be however express fear say di nature of di rainfall fit affect di well-being of di crop.

translation.en: He prayed that the yield would turn out good in the end.
translation.pcm: He pray make di yield do better in di end.

translation.en: But Vitalis Tarnongu, who is currently ploughing his 1,000 hectares of farmland at the Federal University of Agriculture, Makurdi (FUAM), posited that the manner of rainfall this year would require him to begin sowing maize towards the end of May.
translation.pcm: But Vitalis Tarnongu, we don dey clear im 1,000 hectares of farmland for di federal Unversity of Agriculture, inside Makurdi (FUAM), tok say as di rain dey fall dis year go make am begin to plant maize towards di end of May.

translation.en: Tarnongu said a plant breeder in the university had advised him to wait until May 20 to begin planting his maize because the nature of the rainfall since the season set in suggested that there could be a two-week drought.
translation.pcm: Tarnongu tok say one plant breeder for inside University don advise am to wait until May 20 to start to dey plant im maize bikos di nature of di rainfall since di season don suggest say e possible make rain no fall for two weeks.

translation.en: The state chairman of the All Farmers Association of Nigeria (AFAN), Aondongu Saaku, described farming as a business worth taking risk on.
translation.pcm: Di sate chairman of di All Farmers Association of Nigeria (AFAN), Aondongu Saaku, describe farmin as business wey worth make dem take risk on.

translation.en: Saaku said farmers who saw it as business had already taken the risk to plant their crops because without such risk, they won't reap at the end of the day.
translation.pcm: Saaku tok say farmers wey dey see am as business don take di risk to plent dia crop already bikos without dat kind risk dem no go reap at di end of di day.

translation.en: Meanwhile, Dr Teryima Iorlamen, a seed systems specialist at the FUAM, said farmers could go ahead to plant their root and tuber crops in line with the NIMET's rainfall prediction for this year.
translation.pcm: Meanwhile, Dr Teryima Iorlamen, wey be seed system specialist for FUAm, tok say farmers dem fit go ahead to plant dem root and tuber crops as e follow di prediction of rainfall wey NIMET make dis year.

translation.en: Iorlamen said the period during which the farmers were expected to wait awhile before sowing had gone, stressing that NIMET's prediction for rainfall pattern in Benue State, which they (experts) work with, indicated that the rains would stabilise in the state between April 18 and 30, 2021.
translation.pcm: Iorlamen tok say di period wey dem expect say farmers dem go wait don pass, e stress say di prediction of NIMET on top rainfall pattern inside Benue State, which dem (experts) dey work wit, don indicate say rain go stabilise for di state between April 18 and April 30, 2021.

translation.en: We can assure farmers now that the rains have stabilized, according to NIMET predictions.
translation.pcm: We fit assure farmers now say rain don stabilise, accordin to prediction wey NIMET make.

translation.en: Anything otherwise now would be dry spell.
translation.pcm: Anything wey different for now go be dry spell.

translation.en: I have advised farmers to check water logging capacity in their fields so that they plant their crops accordingly.
translation.pcm: I don advise farmers dem to check water logging capacity for inside dem field so dem go fit plant dem crops as dem suppose plant am.

translation.en: Rice loves much water, so it is not yet time to plant it.
translation.pcm: Rice like plenty water, so time neva reach to plant am.

translation.en: But farmers can go into roots and tubers now, such as yam, cassava, maize and melon.
translation.pcm: But farmers dem fit enter root and tuber now, dat one include yam, cassava, maize and melon.

translation.en: We believe that the rain have stabilised.
translation.pcm: We believe say di rain don stabilise.

translation.en: Senate mourns late Army chief, Ahmed Gulak
translation.pcm: Senate dey mourn late Army Chief, Ahmed Gulak

translation.en: The Senate, on Tuesday, held a minute silence in honour of the demise of a former presidential aide, Ahmed Gulak, who was gruesomely murdered on Sunday in Owerri, Imo State capital.
translation.pcm: Di Senate, on Tueday, be hold one minute silence to take honour di demise of former presidential aide, Ahmed Gulak, wey dem kill with strong eye on sunday for Owerri, Imo state capital.

translation.en: This followed a motion by Deputy Senate President and Chairman of the Senate Constitution Review Committee, Ovie Omo-Agege, on the floor of the Red Chamber.
translation.pcm: Dis one follow motion of  Deputy Senate President and chairman of di senate on top senate Constitution review Committee, Ovie Omo-Agege, for di floor of di Red Chamber.

translation.en: Omo-Agege drew the attention of his colleagues to the assassination of Gulak, who, the lawmaker said, was hired to assist his committee to work on the amendments being sought by Nigerians to the constitution.
translation.pcm: Omo-Agege be draw attention of im colleagues dem to di kill wey dem kill Gulak, wey di lawmaker dem hire to assist im committee on top di amendment wey Nigeria pipo one do for inside di constitution.

translation.en: Gulak served as a consultant to the committee and was in Owerri for the public hearing on the review of the 1999 constitution.
translation.pcm: Gulak be serve as consultant to di committee and e enter Owerri for di public hearin on top di review of di 199 constitution.

translation.en: Though the programme ended on Thursday, Gulak stayed behind and left on Sunday.
translation.pcm: Though di programme be don  end on Thursday, Gulak stay behind and komot on Sunday.

translation.en: He was murdered on his way to the airport in Owerri en route Abuja.
translation.pcm: Dem kill am as e dey go airport for Owerri  on im way to Abuja.

translation.en: Omo-Agege described Gulak as a detribalised Nigerian, who gave his best to the service of the country.
translation.pcm: Omo-Agege described Gulak as Nigerian wey no dey do tribal something, wey give im best to di service of di kontri.

translation.en: Also on Tuesday, the Senate urged the federal government to immortalise the late Chief of Army Staff, Lt. Gen. Ibrahim Attahiru.
translation.pcm: Also, on Tuesday, di Senate be urge federal goment to immortalise di late Chief of Army Staff, Lt. Gen. Ibrahim Attahiru.

translation.en: The red chamber also observed a one minute silence in honour of Lt. Gen. Attahiru, who died in a plane crash near Kaduna International Airport.
translation.pcm: Di red chamber be also observe one minute silence to take honuor Lt. Gen. Attahiru, wey die for plane crash near Kaduna International Airport.

translation.en: This followed a point of order raised by the Chairman, Senate Committee on Army, Senator Ali Ndume.
translation.pcm: Dis one follow point of order by di Chairman, Senate Committee on to Army matter, Senator Ali Ndume.

translation.en: NIN/profile code: NANS raises alarm over disenfranchisement of students by JAMB
translation.pcm: NIN/profile code: NANS don raise voice concerning disenfranchisement of students by JAMB

translation.en: The Kaduna State Chapter of the National Association of Nigerian Students (NANS) on Tuesday said thousands of candidates would not take part in this year's Joint Admission and Matriculation Board (JAMB)
translation.pcm: Di Kaduna State Chapter of di National Association of Nigerian Students (NANS) for Tuesday tok say thousands of candidates no go take part for di Joint Admission and Matriculation Board (JAMB) dis year

translation.en: examination due to hitches in their NIN/Profile code.
translation.pcm: examination on top  hitches for dem  NIN/Profile code.

translation.en: The state NANS chairman, Axiz Huziafa Bello, in a statement issued yesterday in Kaduna, disagreed with the JAMB.
translation.pcm: NANS chairman for inside di stste, Axiz Huziafa Bello, for inside one statement weu dem issue  yesterday for Kaduna be disagree with di JAMB.

translation.en: Bello called for an extension of the electronic registration instead of risking students lives to travel to JAMB headquarters in their respective states for manual registration.
translation.pcm: Bello be call for extension of di electronic registration instead of as dem dey risk di life of students dem to travel to di headquarter of JAMB for dem states for manual registration.

translation.en: He noted that the news bulletin released on Monday, May 31, 2021, titled Issues surrounding the 2021 UTME registration: Option available for genuine candidates who made attempts but could not register, showed that the management had failed to show empathy for the hardship and agony of the candidates.
translation.pcm: He note say di news bulletin wey dem release on Monday wit di title Issues surrounding the 2021 UTME registration: Option available for genuine candidates who made attempts but could not register, show say di management don fail to show sorry face for di hardship and agony wey di candidates dem dey face.

translation.en: He appealed to prominent Nigerians to prevail on the management of JAMB to desist from unleashing hardship on Nigerian students in their noble quest for higher education and self-development.
translation.pcm: He appeal give prominent Nigeria pipo to prevail on top di management of JAMB to stop to make things hard for students dem inside Nigeria as dem dey try to get higher education and develop demsef.

translation.en: He urged the examination body to extend the registration period and postpone the exam in the interest of justice and fairness.
translation.pcm: He urge di examination bodi to extend di registration period and postpone di exam to do justice and fairness.
